2a1(dkon brtsegs): nges par bstan pa/ yang dang sas mdzelang zhes bya ba// bam po thog ma// 
2a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya du la ga na mo mas/ yA sU tra/ 
2a3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ 'phags pa yang dang sras mjal ba zhes byang theg pa chen
2b1(dkon brtsegs): mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos
2b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad l-i pa ge 'a ra'o// 'di skad ba dang/ gis thos pa
2b3(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/ grol bgrol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
2b4(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dul ba'i khor dang ldan pa/ zhi bzhi nga'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgal brgal
2b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i'i khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan
3a1(dkon brtsegs): pas tha sa par pa yang ya ra pa'i 'phe dang mam byin
3a2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'khor dang lda dang / dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon ngas pa bcol pa/ na mangs pa ma pa'i 'o
3a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ dge sted/ dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig stsal sdig stsal ba'i 'khor
3a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ tshangs pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pasbal po'i rjes cad/ sdug
3a5(dkon brtsegs): bstsal pa'i ngas can gyi 'kho dang ldan pa/ rig can/ rig saran gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus
3b1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ dus byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrogs pa po/ sgrogs pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byung ba
3b2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs po byung ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yin lag lnga rnam par sprul pa/ yan lag ste rnam par stsal ba'i 'o khor
3b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ slob ba dang rnam par bral ba/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yid rnam
3b4(dkon brtsegs): bar re / sprid bar dang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan reg drug dang ldan pa/ yan lag
3b5(dkon brtsegs): drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen pasri nga dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
3b6(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bgicig pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa/ dran pa'i sgra
4a1(dkon brtsegs): srungs phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ ston pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ ston pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi
4a2(dkon brtsegs): che ba'i bden pa stsal pa/ nyi tshe ba'i bden pa stsal pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spangs pa/ btsal ba spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa/ mthar/ 
4a3(dkon brtsegs): byin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan
4a4(dkon brtsegs): gakun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa sa/ na tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ rnam par rtog pa
4a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la
4a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mos pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan
4a7(dkon brtsegs): ga shes rab shin tunam par grol pa/ shes rab shin tu par grol pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa/ 'jigs pa'i lakhong nga ldan pa/ yal ga dang
4b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mdapam dang lcug ma dang / shun grags kyi skyon dang bral ba/ dag pa snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas/ shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na/ lnga sde dang / grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / stang rgyas
4b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung chu klung 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / sha ri'i bu dang / me'u dgal gyi bu las sgrogs pa dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs
4b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ khur por
4b4(dkon brtsegs): ga/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu nar grol ba/ seM ni thaMd kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang / thabs gcig ste/ de'i tshe na nam gyi tho rab kyi res la/ 
4b5(dkon brtsegs): bac+doMs dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / dge slong gi 'o/ 'dun gyis bzlas te/ bla gab med pa na bzhug go/ de'i tshe brjos cang mi gsung bar thad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun mi smra ba la gzinas
4b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dag 'dun la gzigs nas dge slong na la bka' stsal gdage slong dag dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas cing mamangon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta 'ga' zhig tshal cig de nas tsho dang ldan pa kun gyi
4b7(dkon brtsegs): ko'u din n+ya stan las ladra te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar nas/ pus mo ga yA pa'i lha nga sa la btsug te/ bac+doMs ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bac+do~Ms la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs bdag gi rgyal po zas gtsang mngon par dad par
4b8(dkon brtsegs): dkyi'o de skad ces gsol pa dang / c+doMs kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun sh+lo ko'u din rgyal 'di sad du bka' stsal to// dan khyod blar bram bya rmo ldarang bgyu pa yini rtsi du cig de ni rje chu dang ring che dang / grag sbyin dang lteng rgyal 'o srung dang u 'od srung dang / ga ya'od
5a1(dkon brtsegs): sru dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bru dang / me'u gal gyi bu chen pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dziskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
5a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
5a3(dkon brtsegs): me'u dgar gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal ngo zas gtsang ma mngon par dang
5a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das bzhing snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u gal gyi bu chen pos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bul mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar
5a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa dgongs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par
5a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ khang pa brtsegs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogasu lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la
5a7(dkon brtsegs): shar ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa re'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing / dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par
5a8(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed do// zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa me 'dagal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las 'das te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad
5b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis
5b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad pa skyed cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa re'u
5b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dang par bya bar shin tu dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs rnams ni lhag par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba ste// tshe dang
5b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ 'di lta ste dper na/ shing khur/ gcu 'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum nu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing / 
5b5(dkon brtsegs): skam la lo mang du lon bzhig yod la/ de la mi la la zhig gis rma sa btang na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis gtor na/ me'o/ 
5b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po de bas ches che bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam/ drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar
5b7(dkon brtsegs): dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du/ rgyal po rgyal
5b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs su po nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces spraso// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
6a1(dkon brtsegs): ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no// smras pa
6a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa me'u gal gyi bu chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
6a3(dkon brtsegs): slong 'char ka ni/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do zhes dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i
6a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang nangs dad parabya'i/ yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o// 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na/ khyod ni 'di ltar rigs
6a5(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos// khyod ni rig
6a6(dkon brtsegs): nga byed mchog rab yin gyis// shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' ba skyed pa yin// rgyal po'i dam pa myur du dung par byos// rgyal po'i rab de dang par byas na ni// rigs bu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la// mtha'
6a7(dkon brtsegs): dpung med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi'i dam pa myur du dngad par byos// da lta na ni shakya'i bdag pong // mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams// ri yi ngos nas dbab 'dril ji bzhin du/ 
6a8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa rjes dran byed pas// yid la gnod 'gyur sems dang yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag/ rjesu dran zhing nyon mongs
6b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa bzhin// lha'i gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // lha rdzas 'dod pa rjesu dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing // rgyal po bde nyams snying rjer smre sngags 'don// nga'i rin po
6b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sna bdun dang // mi'i phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang // longs spyod dag ni rjesu dran byed cing // sa bdag de ni snying rjer smre sngags 'don// mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis// ji ltar ma
6b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig yongasu non gyur na// bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes ltar// sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no// te se'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na// ji ltar mi dag bltar bya mi mthong ba// de bzhin
6b4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba 'i mthong ngo // gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos gyur pa'i// dmis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos
6b5(dkon brtsegs): myos gyur pas// rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyim thabs shi bas myos pa yi// bud med snying rjer smra sngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur/ 
6b6(dkon brtsegs): pas / rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don// de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskal bar byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan
6b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa bslang bar gyis// 'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi// 'gro ba dag na skal mthur spyad med pas// rgyal po'o sems ni rab tu dang bya bar// gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med/ 
6b8(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus na sa'i khams bdag po zhig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste// sa skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung // de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog
7a1(dkon brtsegs): / chags bye ba khrag khris rnams kyis mchod// rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'is 'jon// chos dang ldan par rgyal po ngas kyang // grong du grong khyer dag kyang mdab cining / gzar
7a2(dkon brtsegs): shing 'bras bu ma tog rgyas par gang // 'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shes las skyes// sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong dum tsher ma rtsa shing ngan pa med/ 
7a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan// drang srong tshogs brgya rjesu chub ste// skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs// dran song la mngan
7a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rab tu bocang // de gnas sems can thams cad lha gnas/ 'dod // rgyal po de la bu dag yod pa ni// sngon gyi sangs rgya des 'byung ba mthong ba ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can// yon
7a5(dkon brtsegs): tran mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros can// mngon blo gros snying po zhes ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can// mi dag khyim na gnas kyang
7a6(dkon brtsegs): dben la dga'// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des// lha'i pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir// na chung tshogs kyis kun nas bdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu yi
7a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa khyod la nga yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci'i phyir// ma mos pas khyod myur du smros// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas gyos te// bu khyod rin chen
7a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim la dga' ba bskyed// bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs kyis te// yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis// dka' thub nag na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag ma
7b1(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun// rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra
7b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yi/ gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo 'dral sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa// rol mo sgra yi tshul dang glul mkhas// bsnyen bskur sems
7b3(dkon brtsegs): shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog/ mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdog 'dra ma chu mdzes yid du 'ong // so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang // 'bral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug/ brlan
7b4(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i sna yang 'dra// brag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan// rag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog/ so na mo byin gyis phra bar legs dang ldan// lceni zangs mdog 'dral
7b5(dkon brtsegs): srab cing dag/ tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// son thags bzangs so rnams rang rod med// mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan// lto ba phyang nger 'dug cing lte bsdug
7b6(dkon brtsegs): sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po che'i so 'dra zhing // mda' rgyu snying po lags par skyes pa bzhin// dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan// gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod
7b7(dkon brtsegs): la lta/ rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan// gzhon nu snying rje ltos la brtse ba byos// bu gcig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang ngar la bab pa yang // shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin ltung gis/ 
7b8(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal thong la 'dod bsten par gyis// blo gros snying po ldan des sme ba yi// pa dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras// yab gcig khyod ni meng par gsung ba lags// gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad
8a1(dkon brtsegs): rang/ yod ta rnams lams pa bdag po tshig/ pas ma ste gtan la bapal rgyal logason// dza ltar tshul man sa med ma dag/ sems mangs nang ma mas de 'drag so/ 
8a2(dkon brtsegs): pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags ste// mi mkhas skye bo'i ngag gis yang dag bsams// mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad// long ba ma lags tse yi rgyu zhig gis// 
8a3(dkon brtsegs): long ba'i chog gis lam gol 'dzin par bgying // thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na// mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed// grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi// tshig gis btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyi
8a4(dkon brtsegs): sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyam ngar gnas pa drod pa skyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing // 'dod pa'i long spyod dag gis chus khyer ba// long
8a5(dkon brtsegs): ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'dra brda/ gni de snyam bgyid// mi'i bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin/ bdag ni gas byed par mthong ba lags// khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos
8a6(dkon brtsegs): khyer ba lags// bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam par spong // 'dod pa rnams ni dug gi lom bzhin// sbrul gyis mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra// me'i phung po shon
8a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du// smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi pags rnying rjes pa
8a8(dkon brtsegs): dzi 'dra dang // ngar snabs rul pa'i thal ba bzhin spadras ste// blo gros skyong po ldan pa chags med pa// sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// blon po'i bu zhig rje su rab byung / 
8b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjesu rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskrad nas ni// grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga/ 
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na// mi'i seng ge de ni 'dod khams 'das// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya phyir// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas/ 
8b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na// pa de bul ma ngang par gyur pa dang // zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyapa sems// de'i tshe blo
8b4(dkon brtsegs): gros sring po gzhan sum mam// nga nyid de yi chen der gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji sam sems// bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam 'a
8b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi che// rgyal po bden pa 'phel/ zhes bya bar gyur// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ rjes rab phyung zlas byin gzhan snyam mam// khyod nyid der de yi ngas
8b6(dkon brtsegs): na ni/ bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur
8b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blang so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas// snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos// lhung bzed thogs te/ 
8b8(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na// shakya stong tsam zhig dgos pa zhig gi cheng du 'dus shing 'khod ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang
9a1(dkon brtsegs): mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas byor na/ ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na/ shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu thu
9a2(dkon brtsegs): bas bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par bya'o// gal te gzhon du de khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rna par rgyal ba ros dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po
9a3(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te// de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che
9a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no// de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa// yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'dzem pa stong yang chang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ des gling chen po bzhi pa'i
9a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing / mtshon gyi mnga' ba/ med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing / chos dang 'dun pas legs par phab nas/ bskal pa rdzogs par legs par
9a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par
9a7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des de snyam bsams nas/ 
9a8(dkon brtsegs): shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed pa su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na// de lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do// de'i
9b1(dkon brtsegs): rnge shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der seng ste/ tshe dang
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'am ra ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ngur byod/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa leg so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ri shig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan
9b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ sdebs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byed tam/ shin tu ma spel tam/ bsod snyoms
9b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'o ma rgyal tar// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so// dga' ba'i bzhin de bzhin te/ cor ldan 'dra
9b5(dkon brtsegs): la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan ro// bde bar bzhug so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byen to// mnyel ba med do// bsod cem kyis 'o brgyal ba med
9b6(dkon brtsegs): do/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang / shAkya'i bu dga' bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan gcig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ 
9b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byed te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa leg so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring mo zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ 
9b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la snyun mo mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byod tam/ shin tu ma srel tam/ 
10a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sa pal 'di skad ces saso// shin tu legs par sa dpe pa te/ ba
10a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang lnga'o// bde bar bzhug so// mi bde ba ma mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba medo// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba re do// shAkya'i bu
10a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sang gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der
10a4(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa leg so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring shig na byon to// tshe dang
10a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ stong sa dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de lanyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar
10a6(dkon brtsegs): byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smraso// mya ngan medang
10a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan bral/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldano// bde bar bzhug so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'ong rgyal ba
10a8(dkon brtsegs): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / 
10b1(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus so// de
10b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ nga'i bu la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na lus la gnod pa'i chad
10b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gcad do zhes dka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nuso// de nas tshe dang ldan
10b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'a di ni shin tu yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na / ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya sbar nas/ des 'di snyam du bsam so// 
10b5(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang bdag gis na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la/ steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas
10b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des/ na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal
10b7(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas
10b8(dkon brtsegs): shing 'ong ba mthong nas/ de la thal mo sbyar te/ tshigasu bcad ras smras pa/ tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gnas 'ongs// khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos// khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin/ 
11a1(dkon brtsegs): / brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigasu bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/ 
11a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la chas dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te// bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bskuro// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba// khyod la mi mchog
11a3(dkon brtsegs): sras mnga' grags pa 'thob// gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun du 'bar// ston gyi nyi ma gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ji ltar sprin med namakha'i nyam ni// phyogs rnams kun du 'od zer mngon par 'bar// de bzhin rgyal
11a4(dkon brtsegs): do glang po khyed kyi sras ye shes mngar bas phyogs rnams kun du snang // ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na// srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras/ 
11a5(dkon brtsegs): stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs// ji ltar nyi zil non skar ma'i rnams// nyin par 'ong stor lam mer mi rung ba// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis// zil gyis mnan pas
11a6(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs gzhan mi snang // ji ltar nyi ma'i zol non zla ba ni// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stor nyin mi snang // de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams// nyi ma'i zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med// seng ge'i nga ro thos na
11a7(dkon brtsegs): bra mo rnams// shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du// ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas// stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'// de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i gsung // bdag med nga ro mu
11a8(dkon brtsegs): stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang // gsung thos nas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal// snang
11b1(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang dkyil mngon par bshad// bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan// lam dang grol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan// lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du bcu// 
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la 'thor// ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni// spang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lngar bcas chos kyis ngoms
11b3(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad// ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri lung nags// rtswa dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang // 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis sa mdzes pa// de bzhin stobs bcu
11b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs mang rab dang // ma 'dres bcwo brgyad chos mnga'i sdong pol// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras dus smras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzeso// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na/ 
11b5(dkon brtsegs): lhun po'i ro// lnga'i gnas gyur mo skul rnam par mdzes// de ba zhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang narna ma par mdzes// bde stsogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po// lha'i
11b6(dkon brtsegs): snyan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin glang po rgyal po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te// thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng ring
11b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas// dran pa nyer bzhag char rgyun ma dpa'akhrigs te// rgyal bkru mchog de ni chos char 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer// ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms zhing / 
11b8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes nyi zer sring pa'i sred pa skems// rgyal ba'i 'o chen 'gro ba rnam par mdzes// ting 'dzin tshul khrims gzings dang gu chen te// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nor babyin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin
12a1(dkon brtsegs): chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs// thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya// tshul khrims rnam ngas rtsab brtan par ga/ ting 'dzin lom dran pa yan lag ma ba/ bya
12a2(dkon brtsegs): chu ba yan lag me tog spyong pa'i sdong// bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po ste// chul khrims nags mtha' ston pa'i stobs chen po// ting 'dzin ni ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod
12a3(dkon brtsegs): yul can// rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras// thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas// byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags ste// khyod kyi sras
12a4(dkon brtsegs): ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin// tshul khrims gter dang yon tand byog gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar rab skyabs// ye shes kyis bsrung thar pa'i spyod yul can// rgyal bacho
12a5(dkon brtsegs): dpon gtso bor nor gtong mdzad// dge ba yongasu bzung bas sdig bcom ste// nyon mongs ni mdzad dge bsnyen bka' stsol bas// lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyod kyi
12a6(dkon brtsegs): sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul khrims mchog sprin blo gros glog 'byin cing // yan lag brgyad lam char chen rlan gyis spangs// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol// khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug/ 
12a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra sgrogs// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam// de yi lus la ngal bas dbu med dam// thang nas ud pa la bzhin ma rnying sa ma/ 
12a8(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs lngas bsam gtan spyod yul ran// dgyes shing bde bas yan lag/ yongs rgyas te// thub pazhi pa'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas// gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi
12b1(dkon brtsegs): rnying rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te// bud med glu'i dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na// da ltar sa ngan sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'char kas smras
12b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin gi yul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// mnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// 
12b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog bshams pa la// mi mar sdong pos kun nas mthar bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na// da ltar mun par nyal na ci'i mo rmongs/ 
12b4(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzim sra pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar rab zhengs// dga' ba'i gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na// srid med
12b5(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar// bstan bcos ma khas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te// gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du
12b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' byas na// nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa/ chos kyis byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun dbyudar// zhi ba'i dgon par zhi bsnyen mdzad
12b7(dkon brtsegs): pas ston pa 'jigs bral de ni de dgye so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad bzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar bzhin blugs te// rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas te// nags kyis
12b8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' na thub pa su mas bkru/ 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gcang 'ab ba stegs chos mu rjing bus// thub pa des bkrus gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad// skul mig she 'gras dang bca su 'jog/ rang yang rgal
13a1(dkon brtsegs): / la skye bo ngal chen sgrol// rgyal pos spras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os mchog bzang gos gtsang gyon// tsan dan nyim pas shing mdab legs par
13a2(dkon brtsegs): bris/ nags chen de gseb thub pa su yi brgyan// 'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan// khrel yong na bza' ti dzin bsam gtan brgyan// mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan
13a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku// rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos spras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshan dang ral gyi mtshon thogs pa'i// dpa' bo g.yul du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs ste// bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu gdang
13a4(dkon brtsegs): gangab pa// gcig pu nag na 'dug na su yis bsrung // 'char kas/ smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs ste// de dpung ye shes nyan thos na 'bring g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la
13a5(dkon brtsegs): nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcud dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs parnyed// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan dkyis spras/ chos legs spyod cing dubu med brjod pa thos// khyod
13a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdag kyang mi'i dbang po ltar 'gro'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan
13a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni/ tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog dge sbyong gi tshogs sgo du sdud pa/ dra srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po 'am me ldan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di
13a8(dkon brtsegs): ste peran/ zla ba yar gyi ches bcwo lnga la zla ba nya ste yongasu rgyas pa'i tshe/ skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas skor ba ni lam me lhan ne lhang ngo'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ 
13b1(dkon brtsegs): lam me ldan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ste dper na/ nyi ma ni sngon gyi dus na/ shin tu lam me lhan ne lha de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ shin tu lham
13b2(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lam me lhane lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhane lha de'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 
13b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzang lha'i mdunas na gnas na la me lhane lnga'o'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na la me ldan ne lhanga'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu rab
13b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral dang / lha'i bu yongasu dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab la/ phrul dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang nal me lhan ne lha de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi
13b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhanga'o// 'di lta ste dpe na/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis skor na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang
13b6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhane lha nga'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i
13b7(dkon brtsegs): thos su zad na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsa' ba nyid kyi tshe/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu
13b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu raH u/ ldeg rab tu ldeg// kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che mche ma rab tu chem che ma/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ bum 'un rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs
14a1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing / snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos/ bcas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten pa ras la gom pa bdun bor ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam gnyis/ 
14a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / bcas pa byung ba lta'ang ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad
14a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe btsas na/ gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul pa med pa/ rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par brtson 'grus
14a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa yang dag par smras pa/ bslu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gi su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs brar sangs rgyas te/ rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos sku
14a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa 'i dam bcas pa de dran nas/ tshigasu bcang ba 'di dag smras// / blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltam ma thag/ nor ba med pa'i gsung na
14a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod mdzad// gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgon pos mnyam pa med
14a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung brjod pas// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// su zhig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsung te// ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid
14a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis// gser gyi phung po gangs rimanyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar mi nus shing // gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ mtshon non 'dra ba'i ngag tsug
14b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shig/ zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur bas// gang zhig thul bar nus par ma
14b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pas// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang // longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang shig bcing bar nus par ma
14b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgya dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug nam yang ma nus te// dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mi mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches
14b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig sman pa// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang // gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig ying mchis// don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan
14b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i chog rnams kyis// gang gi ga bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yi dam ches// dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa// gang zhig grong
14b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer mchog nas byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su// 'chi med rgyu
14b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// lo drug bar du dka' thub drag spyad pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// 'jig rten la ni phan dang
14b8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i phyir// byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba ni// lo drug lon pa'i tha mar cod ku gsol// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ste glags btsal
15a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de la grags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig ying mches// gang zhig 'dod chag zhe sdang bral gyur cing // sul chung zad tsam yang ra slong la// 'jig rjen dag gis don
15a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mo ches// gang zhig gzhan las gsan pa ma mdzad par// rtog par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas par// de'i gsung la su zhig
15a3(dkon brtsegs): yid ni ches// gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi tshig gsan te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa ni// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la
15a4(dkon brtsegs): thugs rtse don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byor gyur te/ shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang
15a5(dkon brtsegs): gis sngon gyi thugs das bcas pa dgengs mdzad// bdag cag/ srid pa'i rgyud las sgrol mdzad na// de yi gsung la su shig yid mi ches// dengs dbab de ltar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan
15a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i dus mkhyen te// 'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa'o// de yi gsung la su zhig ying mi ches// mi yi 'dre ba yi ni sku mchog la// blta ba'i don dubyadag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gi sem
15a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis su// de snyam du ni rje su bsam pa byas// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas// de ltar ring shig tu rje su bsams nas// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos// de skad ces smras pa dang / 
15a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal ngo zas gtsang ma la tshigasu bcang de sngar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du byas ma byas te// khyod nyid dang bar bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bcur nga' la dang pa'i sems bskyed na/ 
15b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bung med dag kyang mthe ris 'dong // stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshang med ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir byon rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang // khyod kyi grags pa tshang reng 'jig rten
15b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung / khyed kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba// chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par// stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod mdzad pa// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las
15b3(dkon brtsegs): rgal gyur nas// 'gro ba mang po chu ba che las sgrol// rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang pa bskyed// srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te// sman pa'i gtso bo skya dgu
15b4(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu 'byin// gse ba byed pa mkhas pa pad+ma'i mchog/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pa ma mdzad de// nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas/ 
15b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// grol ba grol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi med zhi ba mi dbang bshang gsol zhes// mi dbang la
15b6(dkon brtsegs): ni lnga dbang gsol 'debs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang pa skyed// phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te// ston pa dang g.yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can bye ba tshang med 'dul
15b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzod kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni ngang pa bskyed// rnam ngag spyan mnga' don 'gro ba dag/ mun pa rang ribastug pos bsgribs pa yi// mi sbyor rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang
15b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la// rga shi meng mchog mi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi meng gnas sems can 'dod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// me chen gsum chu
16a1(dkon brtsegs): bsreg pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mes tshigs la sprin chen cha rang bzhin// bzhini gnyis ngam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dngang skyed // dri gsum dri ma spangs shing skyor
16a2(dkon brtsegs): bsal te// dri ma gsum las skye bo 'grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rnam par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye dgu kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byam
16a3(dkon brtsegs): par dgongs// thugs rje thugs brtses sems can 'grel mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni ngang pa skyed// bcom ldan de na ma dul sems can 'dul// thugs rje ranga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad kyang // rgod pa rnams kyang nyon
16a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs ni mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dngang bskyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems// rgya mtsho las ni lha bus ji lta bar// stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa
16a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog la ni dang pa skyed// tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa// thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyod// yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dngang
16a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// nor bu rin chen chu'ang byed pa bzhin// rgyal po skye bo dang bar spyod mdzad cing // mi'i 'tha rog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni ngang pa bskyed// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs dag pa// mkhas pa'i/ 
16a7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dga' ba yongasu bskyed// rgyal ba de bzhin skyon gsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongasu bskyed// 'jig rten gcol dang pa thob gyur na/ mi dang lha ngag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor// srid pa
16a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu spangs zhi ba mchog tu 'dong // 'dren pa mi mchog la ni ngang pa bskyed// bdag gi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni// na mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar byin min/ 
16b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mamaches la ni dang pa bskyed// dengs rgyal po bas gtsang mas// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ga las legs par bshang pa yang thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzang pa sem nang sa burang cang kyis dang/ 
16b2(dkon brtsegs): dumathong // sngon bdag rgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes dam bcas pa yang rjesu dran nas// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la ngang pa thob par gyur to// de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis/ tshe dang
16b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smraso// dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na// khyod bdag zan zol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos khyer te song shig/ nga yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
16b4(dkon brtsegs): phyi bzhin 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
16b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang na/ no/ dge slong 'char kas dad par byas te/ deng skye bo phal rdo che'i don du 'gyuro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'ad
16b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bshos khyer te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char
16b7(dkon brtsegs): ka la leg so legaso ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas/ khyod kyi bsod nams mang du bskyed// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par
16b8(dkon brtsegs): ngang bar byas pa'i bsod rnanams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la/ gal te gzugs shig yod nan phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po
17a1(dkon brtsegs): shod ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po don de tsam du dngag tu med do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ 
17a2(dkon brtsegs): bam pa gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas// phyag bcabs lhung bzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzango // mtshan ma'i rnam pa de mdzad pas/ rgyal po chen po rnam
17a3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du byangar nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskam pa tsam
17a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
17a5(dkon brtsegs): byang phyogasu brten te/ steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi chog sa ba skor nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen
17a6(dkon brtsegs): po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
17a7(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'am / shar phyogs log su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen
17a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'bag rtse po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdu cung byudar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
17b1(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs log su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slos dge 'dun la mchod cing 'jug par
17b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// rgyalapo chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi
17b3(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs logasu brten te/ steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing
17b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang / sum du rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdunang byud nas/ snga ma bzhin steng gi bar snang
17b5(dkon brtsegs): la thal po sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge' dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// de bzhin du lha'i rgyu/ po rab 'thab bral dang / yongasu dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul
17b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam
17b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la re re zhing
17b8(dkon brtsegs): yang g.yog lnga'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyang / 
18a1(dkon brtsegs): / snga ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug sung nga ldan cig// 'di lta ste per na/ skyes bu spobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las skum patsam gyis lnga ma yin
18a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
18a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// bya'i rgyal po mad ba bzangs brgyad khri phrag stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar
18a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge bdun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan du stegs can
18a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khams tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam 'a yongasu dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du/ ma lus rdzogs gyur rlab
18a6(dkon brtsegs): nya ba yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// na mkha'i zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba// mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'dzem// rtog ge can tshegs
18a7(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya'i lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su// nyi ma
18a8(dkon brtsegs): ni papA la yang 'byed// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po dag zil g+his mnan nas ni// mi'i tsam rnam par mdzes gyur cing // nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed// lha
18b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni// 'dudu sar lha'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// lnga'i 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// bde stsogs khyim thab spyon ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sdug spobs bcul pa/ 
18b2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong tshogs kyis mngan mngar stong gsum na// rtog go tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// lha'i rgyal po 'thab bral dbang byed pa// 'thab bral bzang po lhas
18b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod btsun byas pa// 'thab bral bzang po lha tshogs nang zhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngan ngan 'gror dong bzal mnan nas/ 
18b4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing // stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha'i rgyal po yongasu dga' ldan te// dga' nga ldan gnas na lha'i tshogs kyis bskor// lha tshogs mang po zil
18b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsabs rab tu mdzes// de bzhin/ lha dang lha min bla ma yang // lha min lha min tshogs kyis bla ma/ ra byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// skyes pa
18b6(dkon brtsegs): seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha'i dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nasu// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na// gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin
18b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po// ma ngal 'angal mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur byed
18b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ lha gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spong ba dag/ sngan chad spyad pas lha
19a1(dkon brtsegs): mthol ma nan te/ sngon gyi dge pa rtsa da'i gzi brjid byas// rgyal bden rab tu rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'dzag rtenan na tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis tshal man te/ 
19a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad pa dag/ yongasu brjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa badrar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis// mdun du bdar te bden pa gtam
19a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung zhing // 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon du mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis
19a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu ston pa mdzad// bya lam na mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rang yang sring // ri rab srang brgyar gcal du rung yang srid // sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi
19a5(dkon brtsegs): nus so// rgyal po mngon par ngang bar byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po mtsho/ na par// rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba// grog
19a6(dkon brtsegs): po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni// gang 'di dmar reng 'char ba'o// dmar reng shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhin du/ dge slong 'char ka yang / bcom ldan 'das
19a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/ dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni// nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin// grogs po dag de lta bas na/ bzhon pa'i mchog rnams stong nges
19a8(dkon brtsegs): gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu bltan sdug pa de lta zhing 'dong ngo // lha leg so zhes gsol nas/ shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ thes
19b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mchog rnams myur du bstan to// re che rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas dang / n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing / byem gcang
19b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'angal du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba dang / me tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / 'phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabasu gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / gyang ba dang / bum rnga thegs pa dang / 
19b3(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / glu'i cha byang dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la
19b4(dkon brtsegs): le ba'i spyi ba gyi bu chen mo thugs rjod de da pag pa de ma na nami gtu pa 'dod 'i cho se bu ni ge 'i sung gi bdag kya rjog sngon rnam gyi dram dag rgyan rnams kyang grol dri yug se dri sa brgya ga 'khor rgyan bye bcan kyis no ga gdugs dang / rang kri dang thod dang
19b5(dkon brtsegs): nor ba can gyi rnga yab dang / lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tsa ram bcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing / rgyan sngon po thogs pa 'a zhal tang rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lhag
19b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs dang / khring ba dum dang ldan pa// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/ shing rta re re shing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shAkya la la'i bzhon pa ni rnam pa 'di lta
19b7(dkon brtsegs): bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas/ thams cad du dmar ba dang / thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad bkra ba dang / shing rta re re shing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor
19b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar nga snam bzhino// shing rtang dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa// gser gyi rgyal mtshan can// gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ 
20a1(dkon brtsegs): / glang ba che ba rgyad khri bo dag gi steng ngutsun po ches bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkrab/ bldan sdug brgyad khri gas nas 'dod bar gyur to// gla mo che brgyang khri ba de dasas bya bzhin rnams
20a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyis brgyan pa gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rkyen dang ldan pa brgyad khri ba shams te 'dong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAk+Sha rnam rgya
20a3(dkon brtsegs): po nas 'ong ba gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong ngag khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gos/ shAk+Sha ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di ga la
20a4(dkon brtsegs): ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shakya rnams serasgra'i gnas nas byung ba ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang / rje su mthun no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
20a5(dkon brtsegs): ser skya zhes bya ba'i grong khyer dam pa nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma khyu mchog te/ 'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'od gyur // de ltar bstan gyis khyed cag de nyon cig/ shing rnga brgya ste
20a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang // rta yang sngo zhing sgo
20a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo// lhag kyang sngo zhing thag srad rnams kyang sngo// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni
20a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta ser zhing rgyan kyang ser ba dang // rta yang ser zhing ser ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste/ 
20b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lcag kyang ser shings srang rnams kyang ser// dril bu g.yer ka'i drab rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan ser po bslang bar mdzes par byas
20b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rdzang ma ri nang rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar mo'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar// lcag kyang dmar zhing thag srang rnams kyang
20b3(dkon brtsegs): dmar/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar ni rgyan kyang dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing
20b4(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste/ de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcag kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang
20b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta bkra zhing rgya na kyang bkra ba dang // rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ 
20b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkrab ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang kra/ lcag kyang bkra zhing thag srang rnams kyang bkra/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal
20b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rtang mar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar shing dmar mo'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang
20b8(dkon brtsegs): dmar/  lcag kyang dmar shing thag srang rnams kyang dmar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can ste// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing
21a1(dkon brtsegs): dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcag kyang dkar zhing
21a2(dkon brtsegs): thag srang rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta bkra shing rgyan kyang bkrab
21a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra/ lcag kyang bkra zhing thag srang rnams kyang bkra/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams
21a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas// ma rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal ma tshan khra bo bsnang bas mdzes par byas// shing rtang dag rnams kyi byor bzhin du// glang pa brgyad khrir tshang ba bshams
21a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni'agaser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan// glang chen rnams ni gser gyis tshol par brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag
21a6(dkon brtsegs): nas su/ rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// shing rta rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams// de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan// rgyal
21a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i chas 'os rgyal po 'tsham stabs can// glang po de dag rnams kyi bya bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri nam khwa dog lnga pa yi// me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi ldalnga ldi dag kyang rab tu bres// bdug
21a8(dkon brtsegs): spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// glu mkhan rnams dang gyang rnams dang / bum rnga thogs kyis mdzes par byas// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin
21b1(dkon brtsegs): 'brang rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang // shAkya rnams rta blas sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang
21b2(dkon brtsegs): thang gi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun bangar te n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas/ mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi
21b3(dkon brtsegs): namakha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am ring du 'cha
21b4(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i kam ring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongasu dga' ldan
21b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed du mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yog par gyur to// rgyal po chen
21b6(dkon brtsegs): po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'angs 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi theg ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang smad nas// bcom
21b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang / bcom ldan
21b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thob pa la/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
22a1(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhar 'phrul/ 
22a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba 'byor// steng gi bar snang la gnas ste/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i man ngar ba dang / min
22a3(dkon brtsegs): ngar ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi bye mar rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i rol po sil sran dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// mi
22a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang steng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma'i char yang 'bab
22a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas/ lha dang mi rnams kya nga gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
22a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad// de nas rgyal po zas gcams/ lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtses sa kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du
22a7(dkon brtsegs): sems ste/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis/ legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar
22a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi ste/ nga ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bde
22b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag gon mo'i 'khor can du zad / bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang ma'i 'khor can du gyur to snya so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
22b2(dkon brtsegs): ldang sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brtan par sa chen po la gom pa bdun
22b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhud de/ phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/ nga ni 'jig rten gtso/ nga na 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs pa
22b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe yang / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyi so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong ngu bzhud nas/ 'dzam bu'i grib ma bsil ba la
22b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa'i cha/ nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skum btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug wa' / sbyar nas/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang / bangs
22b6(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyiso// nga yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshalo zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smraso// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bldan nas
22b7(dkon brtsegs): sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhung ngo de// nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang che thub chen ning pa'i grong bzhung ngo // 'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa
22b8(dkon brtsegs): ma btang zhing // lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btung gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// nga yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje che mnga' lha ris
23a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod nga gtso/ khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos// mtshan ni don grub lags shes sngon brjod pa// pa da ma yis bsams sde btags pa lags// khyod kyi bas ma rdzog
23a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsing brnyes pas na// don grub lags par bdag gis gdod 'tshal// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri// lha'i yang bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba// rnam
23a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogasu spel ba bsham so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin ras bcos bus yog par bting ngo // steng du yang lnga'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bre so// de nas
23a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ gdan khri bshams pa la bzhug so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngas
23a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyodapa'i lha'i bu rnams dpa' gas kyo 'i tshul marjod kyi skabs la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bar snang la 'khod par gyur te// 'di
23a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces pa'o// ser skya zhes bya grong khyer dam pa yi// n+ya gro nga yi ra ba nyam dga' bar// rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de'i tshe/ 
23a7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang // klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus / 
23a8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci'i cho gas ci rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khamasu gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris
23b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang // 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang // 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gsas dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang // spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang // gcer bung dang mu stegs
23b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mang po// log lam rjesu 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems// yongasu smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de'i tshe na 'das pa chen
23b3(dkon brtsegs): por gyur// sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongasu tshim par mdzad// nga ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la// rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzheng // bac+doMs
23b4(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhonu khyo nis bdag chen po yi// rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol pa/ gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los
23b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mched// rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shings yang skyong
23b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ gling bani dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi'i bdag dang mi'i sa mchod par 'ong // lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal
23b7(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig spras kyis/ rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa'i rgyal srid kyis// bdag la bslu bar mdzad par bzhed/ 
23b8(dkon brtsegs): pas na// de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod// bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi ri// rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rul sbal gcig gcig 'phangs// rgya mtsho'i
24a1(dkon brtsegs): rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa dang // rusbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung // de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gang nas 'dir 'ongs ke/ nga yi the tsom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir// myur du
24a2(dkon brtsegs): nga la smos shes de skad smras// khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal de nyid la// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo chen des smras pa// nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir ni nga ring bor bar gyur// rgya mtsho
24a3(dkon brtsegs): rlabs chen de ni phyir log song // nga ni slar log 'gro bar mi nus te// nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na// ru sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho de ni khron
24a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di tsam ma mo// 'on te khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig/ dris lan pa la myur du smros shes smras// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo rgya chen po des// khron pa'i ru sbal de la tshig smras pa// khron pa'i ru sbal
24a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni byos pa ste// blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan// nga ni lan tsa can gyi chu der btsas// yun ring ngas nas den skye skye yang / rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma nus na// dbus lta shes par
24a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la nus shes smras// de ltar mi'i bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugasu ma chud de// gling bzhi pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis ni// khyod kyis bdag la bslu ba mdzad par bzhed// bdag ni
24a7(dkon brtsegs): chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad pas mi gtsang mtshon chas bda' med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul
24a8(dkon brtsegs): stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas// de'i phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang // sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad// rgyal po zas gtsang / 
24b1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni mgu bya phyir// thugs kyis yongasu bsku ba mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par// de'i tshe na der ni 'dus par gyur// rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum po'o// 
24b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris// bcom ldan 'das la mched pa bya ba'i sems thob mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag
24b3(dkon brtsegs): bzangs ris lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas bcom ldan 'das la mchod po thog mar byas te/ des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang / 
24b4(dkon brtsegs): rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir phul lo// rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po den med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te/ mchod
24b5(dkon brtsegs): bar phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rtakhrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dang / re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon
24b6(dkon brtsegs): bar sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can// rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar
24b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dab can// gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha snga go// rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir// rin po che sna bdun gyi byi ru dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi mamam
24b8(dkon brtsegs): sha sta go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re dag kyang / stag gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te// shing rta de dag 'dod na ni rje su 'dong shing rta de dag sdong na ni sdod pa sha sta go/ yid bzhin gyi
25a1(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i bla re dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir// rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon par spyang so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i
25a2(dkon brtsegs): dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul to// shing rta'i rgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gi skyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ 'ad
25a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na/ rol mo sil snyan brgya dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas sgra byung na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyanan bde ba de bzhin du/ shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
25a4(dkon brtsegs): bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la/ mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shing rta de dag gi 'ang rang gis kyang / steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te
25a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod par gyur to// shing rta de dag gis phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjesu 'brang bar gyur to// shing rtade dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis
25a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa dag 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan len/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ud pa la'i bye ma
25a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thor/ la la ni a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni man dar ba dang / man dar ba chen po
25a8(dkon brtsegs): dang man rdzu sha ka dang / man rdzu sha ka chen po dang / bai ru ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya sngar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen
25b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog dang / bai dUr+ya me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu
25b2(dkon brtsegs): tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang
25b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyan 'bulo// la la ni sku rags dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdu bu dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tha ma dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skub
25b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / gya nor dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to// dal la ni tshong tshong bshibs pa/ la la ni mgo rgyan/ la la ni rdza
25b5(dkon brtsegs): gdubu kor/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches smras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis smras pa/  dgase wang ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thog so// la la ni gser
