25b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bai dur+ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs dang / spug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang
25b7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po thog so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la la ni pa
25b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to// mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshalo// khyod la do zla yod/ 
26a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis// 'jig rten gsal 'phyag 'tshalo// ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshalo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshalo// 
26a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshalo// spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba
26a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid/ nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshalo// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul te// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag
26a4(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu mngon par sprul te// bzhugs sa de dag re re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba// blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug gcu ma
26a5(dkon brtsegs): bar sprul to// ba ga ma de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkrab// blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khras/ khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa
26a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba// blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gser gyi khams rnams kyi gdung lcam ni dngul// gral bu
26a7(dkon brtsegs): dang sgo 'phar ni bai dUr+ya/ theg pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni spug/ ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ dngul gyi khyams rnams kyi dngul lcam ni gser/ gral ba
26a8(dkon brtsegs): dang sgo 'bar ni bai dur+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ban spug/ kA nu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhin rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha sta go/ bai dur+ya'i khyams rnams kyi dngul lcam ni shel/ glal
26b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / sgo 'bar ni gser/ them pa dang kha la khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni spug/ ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha sta'o// shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung lcam ni bai dar+yA/ gral ba
26b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgo 'bar ni spug/ them pa dang khal khyer ni rdo'i snying po ka ba ni gsar/ ka ku ni dngul/ sa gzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha sngago// spug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung lcam ni rje'i snying po// gral
26b3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / sgo 'phar ni mu tig dmar po/ ther ba dang khal khyer ni gser/ ka ba ni dngul/ ka zhu ni shel/ sa gzhi ni bai dUr+ya'i rang ba zhin can sha sta'o/ mu tig dmar po'i khams rnams kyi gdung lham
26b4(dkon brtsegs): ni spug/ gral bu dang / sgo 'bar na rdo'i snying po/ them pa dang / khal khyer ni dnguma?/ ka ba ni gser/ kawA nI bai dur+ya/ sa gzhi ni kai ru'i rang bzhin can sha sA go/ rdo'i snying po'i khyams
26b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdung lcam ni mu tig dmar po/ gral bu dang / sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa dang / khal khyer ni dngul/ ka ba naM bai dur+ya/ ka Ta na kai ke ru/ sa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin can sha stag go// khyams
26b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag tu yang seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ ka tsa lin da'i stong g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyisu rten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag
26b7(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag drug su drug cu ngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khring dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la/ ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / 
26b8(dkon brtsegs): srin byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / shun spags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu kye drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// seng
27a1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i khri de dag re re'i ngos gnyis yang lda ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab/ thegs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par
27a2(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon
27a3(dkon brtsegs): bar sprul to// khyams de dag re re zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gsar gyi khyams rnamasu ni/ rgyal mtshan sngon po la yu ba ser po
27a4(dkon brtsegs): shel gyis spras bdag btsugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams ni/ rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnas
27a5(dkon brtsegs): su ni/ rgyal mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ shel gyi khyams rnams ni/ rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai dur+ya gser gyis spras pa dag bcus
27a6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnamasu ni/ rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai dur+yas spras pa dag btsug so// de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni rtog ser po/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni rtog sngon
27a7(dkon brtsegs): bo rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po// rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni tog dmar po/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stago/ rin po che'i pho brang
27a8(dkon brtsegs): gi rdal de dag par snang gi na mkha' la lding shing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po sa srung gi bu
27b1(dkon brtsegs): ni bar snang gi na mkha' las 'gre zhing / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal yongasu sa rdol du nye bar 'jog go// de bzhin du ngo brang gi rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das
27b2(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba bye // rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang / ba gam de dag dang / bzhugs sa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de dag dang / seng ge'i khri de dag dang / gdugs de dag
27b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal ra tshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ka ru'i phye ma yi char 'bab par gyur to// me tog ma dang rang dang / mnad rang chen po dang / man rdzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka
27b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang /  gas/ gag na po dang / skya sngar dang / skye snar chen po dang / skya sngar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur
27b5(dkon brtsegs): to// gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdorje snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos pa'i
27b6(dkon brtsegs): char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus/ lha ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char 'bab par 'dod pa de dag las mngon par 'bab par gyur to// de'i tshe ser skya'i
27b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang / 
27b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po yang mi 'greng bdun tsam du me tog man nga ra bas rgyas par
28a1(dkon brtsegs): gang bar gyur to// spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stongs sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dro ngas khyab par gyur to// steng gas
28a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chu
28a3(dkon brtsegs): tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag na smos kyang mi dgeso// de nas ldu ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris/ rin po che sna bdun gyi/ shing rta la zhon te/ lan gsum bskor ba byis nas/ bcom ldan 'das la can
28a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan gyi bye mas mngon par gtor te/ tshig su bcad bdag gis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub dam pa don du gnyer spa ru/ sbubs kyi ngam par 'atu mi sprul pa// lhar bcas 'jig rten mi 'dzis
28a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ngo bo// khyod la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi// gang la dag ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na// log lhung dag tu lhung b.rami 'gyur ba// de la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi// dpe med byung
28a6(dkon brtsegs): chub 'tshal ba'i slanga'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni ba shig bcom zhing // mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la// 'dren pa gzhan gyi drong la mi 'jog pa// khyed la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchis/ 
28a7(dkon brtsegs): rga dang 'chi bas nyen par gyur pa yi// lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// gang la skyabs song phyis yang mi skye ba// khyod la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag bzangs
28a8(dkon brtsegs): ris kyis// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ rta'i rgyan de dag dang / shong rta'i rgyan de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyi rgyan de dag / 
28b1(dkon brtsegs): bla re dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i rkyen de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las// sgra nyan cing yid du 'ong la/ mnyanan dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te// 'di ltar dper na/ rol mo sel snyan yan lag brgyad pa/ mkhas
28b2(dkon brtsegs): pas sgra phyung ba bzhino// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bas pa'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang la lha'i tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ka ru dang / 
28b3(dkon brtsegs): tam la'i le ma'i bye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man jug
28b4(dkon brtsegs): ka dang / man dzu shi ka chen po dang / ba ru dang / ba rug ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog da/ ra chen po dang / skya snur dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya sA khra bo dang / skya sAr bkra chen gyi mo
28b5(dkon brtsegs): tog rnams dang sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par ba ba bo// steng gi bar snang las gser dang / dngul dang / bai du r+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i sring po dang / mu ti ga dam
28b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bababo// lha'i dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par ba'o// spos chu'i char dbab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu
28b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur to// spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis spos
28b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dring tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag bzangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
29a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sol sran gyi sgra dag byung // sil sran de dag gis sgras kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu grag par
29a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir po ldog par gyur to// de lta ba / 
29a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag
29a4(dkon brtsegs): bzangs ris kyis 'khor bya ba'i phyir// la la ni glu len// la la ni sil snyan nying / la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / u dpal dang / a ka ru dang / tam
29a5(dkon brtsegs): la'i lo ma'i byem 'thor/ la la ne lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / man dzu sha kaM dang / man dzu shaka chen dang / ba ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / 
29a6(dkon brtsegs): mdog dkar chen po dang / skya sAr dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / sgyu snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dur+ya dang / shel dang / spuH/ 
29a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor shing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'tho ro// la la ni na bza' dang / rkang gdubya dang / sku rigs dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / 
29a8(dkon brtsegs): sor rngub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / sau mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul
29b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / tsheng tshong gshegs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang / phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lnga ldi dang / nor bu'i lnga ldi dag 'thor zhing / me tog gi bla re dang / sdes kyi bla re dang / 
29b2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i bla re dag thog so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'beb so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'beb so// la la ni ru tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po ches
29b3(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa bkang / la la ni gser gyis sdom pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// tshigasu bcad pa 'di yang smra so// gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas/ gang zag mchog la mched gyur pa
29b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba'i grogs po dang / rtag par rgyun tu phrad par shog/ lham yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis// ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang // bcom
29b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon/ te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed nga / tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
29b6(dkon brtsegs): bar sdod pa/ stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la bag 'tshalo// mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khong la phag 'tshalo// chos lam 'dres nges par gyur pa po// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la bag 'tshal// kun sbyor
29b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshalo// mthar byon thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga'
29b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing / 'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol to// pad+ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po// blo thob bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong cing bsten// rnam pa kun du mtshan mthang
30a1(dkon brtsegs): bshig/ khyod ni gang yang smon pa yongs mi mnga'// mi gnas na mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshalo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis// ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin/ 
30a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / gser phye dag gis gtor
30a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang // bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar bzung nas phyin
30a4(dkon brtsegs): ci log zhugs pa'i// 'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen// 'di na byed pa tshor ba sems can med// gang zag med cing bad ga gir bya ba med// chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben// 
30a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med cing g.yo med ni zhes bstan// su zhig bdeg / gas bstan pa 'dir mos te// chos kun byas pa med pa'i rje sa 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i srasu gyur pa ste// ji ltar bstan pa
30a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin yab ltar spyod// rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes te// ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir// 'gro ba stsal gyis thams
30a7(dkon brtsegs): cad sangs rgyas grub par shog// 'phags pa dkon pachog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gra pa stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po gsum pa// lha ma yin gyi
30a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po shing rta bzang gis/ ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das
30b1(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu las pha rol rnam rgal ba// rga
30b2(dkon brtsegs): nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa// spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtug/ mi mchog khyed kyis 'gro ba thams
30b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kun tu mkhyen// phyin ci log lha thibs por rab zhen blo ldan te// 'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la// mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad// mi mchog
30b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos rnam thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu 'dra zhing mi g.yo ra mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyis sras mchog bskyed// srid pa gsum po dag na ma chag
30b5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spong // dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang // gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur// mi dbang khyod
30b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod // lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po dgra gcan gyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po ches
30b7(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi shing la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi mchog khyod
30b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku yis ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan// ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos pa rjes chu bzhi no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// gzugs kyi gzugs kyi dam pa dang / 
31a1(dkon brtsegs): / gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan// dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan kyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me man
31a2(dkon brtsegs): nyi mas me khyer zil brlag bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun zil kyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas zla 'od zil rlag bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang pa sgra
31a3(dkon brtsegs): gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
31a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byed cing / me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bsted pa// 'dren pa blo gros zhib po// zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro
31a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yis 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad// char pas rdul rnam/ zhi bgyid cing / 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// glags sprin gyis ni me bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing
31a6(dkon brtsegs): sreg ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba sreg/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// dpag tud par dge rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'jom mdzad de// bdud rtsis lus zhugs dug bzhi no// mun pa mun nag
31a7(dkon brtsegs): sel mdzad de// mun kung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi
31a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / rin po che yi me tog rnams
31b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gtor nas/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// gdul dka' mi bzang sems ni khyod kyis btul// g.yul la dpa' bos g.yul ngor dpa' ba bzhin// shin tu char/ 
31b2(dkon brtsegs): bcang rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom// gdu yang mi bsnyengs mo bskyed bde ba bsres// khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi
31b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs// rnam pa kun du dag ni ma lus bcom// mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te// khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig/ 'gro ba
31b4(dkon brtsegs): kun du khyod na bzhung mi mnga'// shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sra dpe bskams// shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags ma mnga'// thams cad
31b5(dkon brtsegs): zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med// lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis kyang / bcom
31b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mched pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'dal gter chen po yang phul nas/ tshogasu bcad pa
31b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyed pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni brdar brtags tshig tu
31b8(dkon brtsegs): zang 'a chos rna chos kying po yis// rnam pa kun du ma dmig so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs// ming ni ming gis dben pa ste// mtshan nyid kyang ni nga bzhin no// 
32a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad// rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang // bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te// gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing // su la 'ang
32a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa ma mchi so// khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spong ngo thub pa che// lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis
32a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang // bcom ldan 'das la chod pa byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyis shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
32a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do sha la yang phul nas/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'dras la mngon par bstod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod de/ 
32a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des na 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir khro/ da ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis// khyod kyi gzugs na chos
32a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag/ tshul khrims
32a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyed de// skye bo mkhas pa so sor bsam mi lang // khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/ mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor// shes rab stobs kyis khyod
32a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs dga' mchis// des na mo bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas// 'khor du seng ge lta bur sgra bsgrag ste// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig
32b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis shing rta la zhon te/ btsem
32b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / rin po che snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'di/ 
32b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du lha// kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung cig brjod pa la// skye bo
32b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de/ de ltar 'byung // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gcig brjod pa la// 'khor
32b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing // 'gro bas rang don/ ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma'adres mtshan/ gsung cig du brjod pa mdzadapapa ni// gcig sa 'jog gi gsan ni dag pa mdza/ 
32b6(dkon brtsegs): sa /  pa pa /  rgya 'i rgyal 'khrim na/ rnas yi kyi nga nga phying ba ma pa shi du/ b+ha yid gyi dang po nga shi kyang bcwos lam med gyu ga/ rin mo n+da du kyi shis ma rje can khyo
32b7(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa bkang ste gtor nas/ tshigasu bcad padag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rgyags dang rgyal sdig pa'i ltab spyod pa gang // yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs
32b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te// mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te// rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad mam
33a1(dkon brtsegs): lags rba jilam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas ches rnams thams cad rab tu gzig/ ston ka'i sprin dang ma rungs shing chu'i zlang 'dra// byis pa'i blo
33a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgying // gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo dga' ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid // rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi
33a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog dam pa de dag mi del yong mo mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas// yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag bzangs ris la sogs pa/ lham
33a4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po bye ba drug cu po de dag gis// mchod pa rnam pa ji lta bu byas nas// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshi ma zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / 
33a5(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la da ga 'tshal zhing // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i
33a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lA ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugasu chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa
33a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lnga bu dag
33a8(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas
33b1(dkon brtsegs): medang ldan pa rda thul sngar las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal me sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
33b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigasu bcad de nus pa/ 'jig rten pan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par// mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen po dzaM skad 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa
33b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu yang gsungs// lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten pan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 
33b4(dkon brtsegs): de ring su yis ngogs med rgya chen sems// 'khor 'dir yang dag pa sreng par gyur cig gu/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bas mkhyen nas// mi yi seng ges 'jam pa mdzad par gyur// 
33b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa yid kyisu// mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsams mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum
33b6(dkon brtsegs): bde mthong nas// 'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// su yis dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tsom 'tshal
33b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i som nyid gcang du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yis// the tsom myur te legs par gcang gsel// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
33b8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang de/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rnga thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yang kyi
34a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// lha man rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas ste// de dag sems na co la'ang chags med pas// namakha'i ngos la lag mthal chags med bzhin/ 
34a2(dkon brtsegs): mon tshogs kyis dang pa'i yid byas te// de dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo can de dag lha mini ris bor ste// mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag byi dus rgyal ba mi seng ge/ gang ga'i klung gi byem bya
34a3(dkon brtsegs): bsreng // bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la// de dag thams cad mtshan mthun rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i rnams// 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs grags pa ste// de dag
34a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas chos ni sngon mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shin/ yangs shing sdigs ma med par 'gyur// de tshe khrag khrig drug cur
34a5(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba yi// rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur// de/ dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad// de dag zhing derd ga' bar spyod par 'gyur// brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad
34a6(dkon brtsegs): spong sa bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur// de dag tshe yi tshad du 'gyur ba ni// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur// chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par
34a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad 'thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni// rang byung rnams kyi dam tshes gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag
34a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i tshogs gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul// dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan mthun 'gyur// zhing dang tshe dang chos rnams 'gyur ba'ang mthun// bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi// skyes
34b1(dkon brtsegs): nga bud med yengasu smin mdzad// bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin// rgyal ba l+la min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten pan phyir drang srong chen po gsungs// 
34b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par gyur// lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u skye bzhi pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/ ldam
34b3(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu'adi mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di sum du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na/ 'ja
34b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub sum nas/ de'i sems ji ltar ma nyam par bzhag pas bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjesu dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang / 
34b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis par
34b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa nges par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjesu dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las mnyam par bzhago/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po
34b7(dkon brtsegs): rjesu dran par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
34b8(dkon brtsegs): sbeng na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de skad du sems can re re bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas
35a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de dag gis thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi nu so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang dang pa thob par gyur nas/ 
35a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi// thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang // lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// cha tsam mi spong mi seng ge/ de lta'i yon
35a3(dkon brtsegs): tan mthar byin te// lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa// tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// gang gi bye ma ches mang ba'i// rgya mtsho rab tu dkang ba yi// 
35a4(dkon brtsegs): spos chu ngag gis mchod par 'os// yon tan chen po mad rab la// gang ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog tshogs ni dang po mchog/ khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// rgyal ba sgron ma
35a5(dkon brtsegs): rang 'byung ba// mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam// 'brumar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi// mar me rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur// yon tan pha rol byon gyur pa// gang+gA
35a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os// mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba// rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnamasu yang // sems can mchog la mchod
35a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mngar ba khyod// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// bskal
35a8(dkon brtsegs): pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gang+gA'i byem ches mang ba'i// bdan rnams kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag
35b1(dkon brtsegs): bzung dpe la gsan du gsol// gal te gang ga'i bye skad kyi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lamanan kyis// sems can thams cad sangs rgya su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo bo yang / 
35b2(dkon brtsegs): gang+ga'i bye ma sbeng gyur te// mgo bo de dag re re zhing // de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la// kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha'i grangs mnyam la// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal
35b3(dkon brtsegs): bde dag spobs mi bas// khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin// rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni byin par gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag leg
35b4(dkon brtsegs): so lags so// nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chosu gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad dmar gyur pa sha stag gnas ste/ de dag pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs la
35b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa sha sta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin/ gshegs pa ni// yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin
35b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs
35b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA ri klung gi bye ma sbed shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi
35b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma sbed du/ gang 'di grangs kyi tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams kyang bsam par mi nu so// de tsa'i
36a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pas/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sem
36a2(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma skyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung // sems can gyi
36a3(dkon brtsegs): khams na mazang ba ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar ma zang pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung // sems de na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don
36a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pas// sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon bar mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po'i sems/ sems can thams cad la phar pa rdzi don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di ga mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ 
36a6(dkon brtsegs): zang zing med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung
36a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ 
36a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs
36b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i la ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing / gad+ha krung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par
36b2(dkon brtsegs): dgongs par gyur te/ don kyang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te yongasu dag cing / ngan
36b3(dkon brtsegs): song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongasu chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing den log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yong med par gyur to// lta ba'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to// 
36b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yod med par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang yi dkyilas kyi mtha' yongasu ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yong med par gyur to// ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa
36b5(dkon brtsegs): dang las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na gshegs pa yun ring po nas/ sems can rnams dge brje chos rnams la bcud cing btams te/ rje su bstan cing bslabs
36b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang / bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar la
36b7(dkon brtsegs): lani 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan
36b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te// de dag bde ba de la yang spyod ba/ bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med par gyur to// 'di lta ste dpar
37a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// 'di lta ste dper na/ bar
37a2(dkon brtsegs): snang la rgyu ba'i bya na bar snang la yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa yang mdo// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa medo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog
37a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mo dga' ba med/ rmongs par 'gyur ba med do// gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag la yongasu
37a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyi/ ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
37a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba las yongasu bzlog ste/ dge ba la btsun pas/ de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbong med par 'byung ba mi dag pa
37a6(dkon brtsegs): las de lta bu yong med de/ de ma bstsags pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung // de dag gis ni rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug
37a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'dum byas te/ de ma bstsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin// bde ba yang ma
37a8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de mi 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyam su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'a
37b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung nyam su mi bde ba mi ldang // char nyam su mi bde ba mi 'babo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad
37b2(dkon brtsegs): shA pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjesu 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas/ sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa
37b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjesu 'brang bar yongasu bsgrubs pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba/ ying mi dga' bar 'gyur ba mdo// rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis/ bde
37b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba me/ dra // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la snga ga bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal
37b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin pa yang med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa/ 'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des bskyabs pa de dag na chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to// 
37b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhan pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mes shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung // de bzhin
37b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang sang ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang ba mi spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir yang ba ma spang
37b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung // yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang mdo// sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i
38a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang dade/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyi ro// de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sen
38a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyi ro// de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon
38a3(dkon brtsegs): bar zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang mdo// sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i
38a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung // 'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshar ba rgyu med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// 
38a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi de ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe/ des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i
38a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongasu smin par byas pa'i phyiraro// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gan pa
38a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasu bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / nyes par
38a8(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsabs sems can de sred cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bstsal ba 'am/ de ltar thagru che/ 
38b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems
38b2(dkon brtsegs): sems zhan pa 'am/ sems dpa' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal
38b3(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba 'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de sreng yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de
38b4(dkon brtsegs): la ji snyam du sems/ dang bzhan pa nas ches par bsgrubs pa'i ngad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos
38b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ba rtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa dab nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i
38b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de skad cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde bar bsgrubs pa 'am/ sdug bsngal
38b7(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba 'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de sbed yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
38b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag leg so leg so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa bzhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab
39a1(dkon brtsegs): rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasu bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis
39a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs bzung ba dang / nyes par brtsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de sred kyi don dpa'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am// de ltar
39a3(dkon brtsegs): tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de sred yongasu smin par bya bar min so// dge slong dag de la ji sum du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba
39a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba de gang zhig yin sum/ de skad ces bka' stsal padang dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de'i tshe shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sbed 'das pa na 'jig
39a5(dkon brtsegs): rjer gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba mo/  / de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyu pe zhes bya ba da ltar bzhug ste/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
39a6(dkon brtsegs): te der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la
39a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i
39a8(dkon brtsegs): slang du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam
39b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'a
39b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ lan gsum bskor babs nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams
39b3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dir gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pogs
39b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dagro/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad/ dge slong dag de la
39b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang dpo'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' sprul pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni/ de'i tshe
39b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to// de'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongasu
39b7(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyi ba la cheg pa mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dgod pas chog par
39b8(dkon brtsegs): mnga'i ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso bo/ rgyal ba dam pa/ rgyal ba mchog/ rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par
40a1(dkon brtsegs): / brjod pas yang dag par brjed do// de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// dpa' ba rnams ni thabs mkhas te/ 
40a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // lus can yongasu smin mdzad phyir// dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul// bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid bstan gyur kyang // da dang chog pa'i 'du shes
40a3(dkon brtsegs): bsal// byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug/ stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams ngag mdzad pas// ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal// da dung
40a4(dkon brtsegs): dang pe thugs bskyed par// de dang der ni yongs bstan te// dngang du ya rang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po sten pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa
40a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis gang ya nga mkhyen mdzad de// brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang // la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad
40a6(dkon brtsegs): des 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad// dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sA
40a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mkhas can gyis// 'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad// des na skye dgu 'di dag rnams// gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la lar bltam pa yongasu bstan// la lar mya ngan 'das pa
40a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan// la lar na ni 'khor lo skor// la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad// sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du// dgyes shing mgu len rol pa sad// bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can su
40b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang yong ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mngar chags pa'i tshul// 'jigs pa mi ma par 'jigs bltar// sems can rnam par gdu yon/ 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul ba mdzang / rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul
40b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan te// byis pa ma lags byas tshul gyis// sems can rnam par gdul slangaru// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// spros pa ma lags smras pa'i tshul// zhab ma lags zhab ltar// rnam par
40b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad// de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can
40b4(dkon brtsegs): thub chen 'drar gyur cig// sngon byung ba'i 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bya'i rgyal po mang ba bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang por
40b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ com ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom
40b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba// blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to// lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul
40b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba// lta na sdug pa rim bdun gyis kun
40b8(dkon brtsegs): nas bskor to// rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel lo/ gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba rnams ni dbug/ dngul gyi lan
41a1(dkon brtsegs): kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai dUr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni bai dur+ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan
41a2(dkon brtsegs): kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni shel las byas pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor
41a3(dkon brtsegs): to// de dag kyang rin pa che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUn+da dang / shel dang / spuglu dang / mu tig dmar pa dang / rdo'i snying po dang bduno// khang pa brtsegs pa de
41a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra
41a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to// gdugs bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ brgyad khri drug steng mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar
41a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag/ rgyal mtshan bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul to// rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel
41a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni/ tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po
41a8(dkon brtsegs): can sha stag mngon par sprul to// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul to// bla re bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par
41b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul par gyur te/ bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang / dngul gyi skung ba'i bla re dang / bai DUR+Ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dam re ba'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rje'i sring po'i bla re ste/ r-i pe
41b2(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag/ de nas bya'i rgyal po mdab bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug steng po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan
41b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug steng po de dag bac+doMs la phul ba dang de sazang steng gi bar snang la lding shing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
41b4(dkon brtsegs): byas so// 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che yi rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing na mkhal song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol du gzhog go// de bzhin du 'ang
41b5(dkon brtsegs): pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de ngag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag par snang gi nam pa 'al lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
41b6(dkon brtsegs): byed par gyur to// de nas mdab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bas nas/ pags gcig tu 'khod de/ thal me sbar nas/ phyas
41b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal zhing tshig su bcang bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bsted pa/ rga dang 'chi las rnam bral khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grel khyed la phyag 'tshalo// sems can gzhal yas
41b8(dkon brtsegs): kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshalo// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchi so// bdag cag rnams kyang sreng mod bu yi lus ldan zhing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang / dang byang
42a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar gyur par sheg/ bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing // mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam
42a2(dkon brtsegs): bas mdzes gyur te// spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing // 'gro ba rnam spyod mya ngan zlo bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing // shes rab ldan pas mchog tu 'gyur bar shes
42a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyed lta bur// skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bcwo brgyad chos kyi
42a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin cing // 'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bradag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang // rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang // brag chan mkha' 'dra bar ster byed cing // ji ltar
42a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po mngab bzangs de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// 
42a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad gsol pa/ rgyal ba rnam 'dran gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams// rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten pa na mdzad thug/ 
42a7(dkon brtsegs): rje mnga' bas gsungs// mdab bzang rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te// bla re na mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la nge mtshar bskyed// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung
42a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams cad thal me rab sbyar zhing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro ba jir 'gyur nyan par tshal// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan/ 
42b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol// mi mchog khyod la kheng dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tsom med 'gyur zhing // the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur// 'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi// 'khor
42b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongasu sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal bas// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dag pa// slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tsam
42b3(dkon brtsegs): gca gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjesu sman pa mdzod// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyis// rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cing 'gyur gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
42b4(dkon brtsegs): thul la tshigasu bcang sngar bka' stsal pa/ thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dbang po thul pa de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung
42b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis// mngab bzangs 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa/ rtathu la khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten pan byer 'dzum gang ngas bstan pas// de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis
42b6(dkon brtsegs): na the tsom stsol la rab tu dga' ba skyed// bla na med pa'i byang chub ni tshol zhing // stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba 'tshal ba'i phyir// mdab chags dbang
42b7(dkon brtsegs): bos ngal mchod legs pas// ma 'dres bcwo brgyad chos ni smra ba yi// sred med bu lus shin tu 'khregs pa dang // sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams// yongasu bcol byor ngal mchod pa
42b8(dkon brtsegs): byas/ rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang // phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas// de dag pal
43a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas mchod byas pas// drang 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas// lha dang brtul zhugs 'thun par de dag 'dod// 'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i
43a2(dkon brtsegs): bye snye // de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing // rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod pas nas// de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang
43a3(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan med// rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rang 'byung 'gyur// lo ni bye ba brgya cu bzhi 'grangs par// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs// 'jig rten
43a4(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas// lus can rnams la mnyam ba'i don mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gis// / 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cur 'gyur// de tshe skyob brdzu
43a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral rnams kyis// shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung / 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'ong bsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur// mi ngag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal
43a6(dkon brtsegs): ches mdab bzangs lusu gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag sngon che 'das pa'i dus zhig na// drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste// dka' thub sprang rdzu 'phrul phun sum
43a7(dkon brtsegs): btsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thos nas nga rgyal gyis// dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur// tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags mdab tu// de zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding
43a8(dkon brtsegs): mkha 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dang // nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed// namakha' lding lung
43b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i le'u skye drug pa la// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// / dam po bzhi pa// / de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu
43b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa drug gis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dag
43b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu yid rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs/ bai DUR+Ya'i dra ba lnga ldi bkye ba/ 
43b4(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po'i drabs bskor ba// gser gyi yu ba can/ bai zluma'i/ thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/ ri po che'i chun po sbyangs pa be ba drag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul te// rnga sngon po la jig
43b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan ba/ bai DUR+Ya'i srab kyis bsrabs pa be ba phrag dgu bcurtsadu ga mngon par sprul to// nor bu skar mingag gring+ga khor yug tu
43b6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad drug cu yod la/ nges 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa gcig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to// de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba/ mig tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dag
43b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa drug bres par mngon par sprul to// bla re yi khor khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bre so// rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang ngag mngon par sprul to// k+Sha'i
43b8(dkon brtsegs): rol mo se la san bye ba phrag dgu bcurtsa drug mngon par sprul to// de nis klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhen nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs snang gi bar snang labris te/ namakha' las 'dzi 'ang 'om
44a1(dkon brtsegs): mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas la/ lnga'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ lha
44a2(dkon brtsegs): a ka ru dang / ta la'i lo dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor// me tog ud pa la dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
44a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor// spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byaso// de nas de dag gis rol me sil sran bye ba phrag
44a4(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sem/  gang gis rol mo'i sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na
44a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyu ra to// nor bu skar mdog gi bla re de dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag dang / khrung
44a6(dkon brtsegs): khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la/ de lta bur yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar
44a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
44a8(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tsher mngon par phab par gyur to// me tog gi char dbab pa'i tshe// spos kyi drigam
44b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i ngang byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go// spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi
44b2(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis spos kyi dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
44b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rnga be ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil sran bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
44b4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi na mkha 'al 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
44b5(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe tshig su bcangang 'di dag kyang smra so// klu'i bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs
44b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu yid kyis su// byang chub zhi pa tshol zhing shag kya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas/ rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul to// bde bar gshegs la mchod cing
44b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyar bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te/ kha dag sde zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon po brgyan// de dag thams cad bar
44b8(dkon brtsegs): snang dong nas thul la rta yis mchod pa byed// klu'i bu mo de dag ngang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu'i gnas nas klu'i sil sngar gyis// mchod pa'i 'od gyur 'dren
45a1(dkon brtsegs): pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas// sil sman de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag
45a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs// de dag rnams kyis de sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur// phyogs bcur dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid
45a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur 'bar zhing bsal// klu'i bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du rgyal la mchod pa byas// gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing // 'jig rten den byed bde gshegs
45a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas la grub par shog/ ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal la 'grel la ltar// chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal
45a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrel// chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyams chung la// char rgyun tshu la dog pa'i chu bur 'jig cing bdag po med// me long nang gi gzugs brgyan
45a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi// sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal
45a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma rung rab bgyid pa// byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltar sa chen 'di la
45a8(dkon brtsegs): sprin 'grigs gyur na ri ltar ganga' ba yang // yang dag dun ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang ba rmongs par bgyid// shes pas brtags nas
45b1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag dun 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas// de na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mo phyed 'gyur// khyod kyi sras rnams ches kyis
45b2(dkon brtsegs): yengasu tshim nas rdzang la zam pa 'dra// 'don byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang // de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye ba'i mgon// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang
45b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa lag khyed la skyabasu mchis// gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgying par shog/ de nas bco
45b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten na ni 'jig
45b5(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yeng / ma mthong // mi yi dbang po'i dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang
45b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag gsungs de thos lha min lha min tshegs dang klu'i bu mo gsang ba pa// dri za rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyi rgya rnams thams
45b7(dkon brtsegs): cang mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yongs ma mchis// de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chung 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad
45b8(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs rigs pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor rnams 'di dag don myed gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dbang du mi
46a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur// bde gshegs khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung cing du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyis zhal nas 'dzum mtho
46a2(dkon brtsegs): the tsom 'tshal gyur te// sdug bsngal ngogs bcas ying mi bde zhing chos la som nyid gang 'tshal ba// de dag la ni thub pa ston pas ngogs bsal the tsom dgum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang sdang 'dzum
46a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan myur du bka' stsal the tshom khum// rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ 'di ni su
46a4(dkon brtsegs): yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'dir bka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde ba ra 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the
46a5(dkon brtsegs): chom 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga' ba skyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tsom bsal du gsol// des thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang
46a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul le gso rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu
46a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mes mchod che 'jig rten pan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis thab spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang gi don dungs ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdza nga ma chog la nyon// 
46a8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam pa shig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas// 'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med / 
46b1(dkon brtsegs): ches rnams 'as brdzun pa ga rgyas chungs la mi long mdzugs parnan 'dra// 'di ga rnams kyis mchod byas byas ga bu gros yang gangs shes ste// rgyal la mchis yang nga 'greb nga/ 
46b2(dkon brtsegs): pe med mthong lags// mche nga rnam par bya zhing legs par dkod pa 'ang dag sgyum 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas gang du spen lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar steng // nga la gzhal yas mched bdebs pa dang
46b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gre ba steng shes pas// klu las shi 'phos nas ni lnga rnams brgya byin gnasu 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum seng ste lha'i nang du dga' ba tshe rdzogs nas// ma spang grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab
46b4(dkon brtsegs): bral gnasu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lnga dganasu lwa yi dga' ba spyod// lngar gyur bde gshegs sra sa rnams den ma yi chang du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras
46b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe chad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas lha'i grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra b.ra' gyur// de dag de ni lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod// 
46b6(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yang mi 'gyur// skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yongs mi
46b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams/ de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// tshe zad yongasu zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs ma smang grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis
46b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshang bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spang nas ni// mkhas pa che zad blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur
47a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnasu lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lha gnas de na gnas
47a2(dkon brtsegs): shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid ni bar rtogs// 
47a3(dkon brtsegs): / bosam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma spang grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i gnasu bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der ga
47a4(dkon brtsegs): dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal bar gnas par 'gyur/ de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don ga/ nyer brtul shugs bzang // thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de/ 
47a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed// mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med// / sam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po
47a6(dkon brtsegs): gi/ kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur// bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi pa yongs
47a7(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba// tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas deran gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir// rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das
47a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni gus par bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang 'byung bsam pa nges 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa
47b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ji nas chos tshul 'bras bskur du shes 'gyur ba/  chos kyang ston// de dag changs gnas den gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chu ba byar// ban pa byas nas sreg chags bye ba phra
47b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims byang chub bkod // rgyal ba kun lamached daphyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal par skar ma 'dral rgyal bar 'gyur// lpa dang ma dadaku' mang ba bzlas
47b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang lnga min bcas pa dang // dri ba grul bum mi 'amatsho tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' shing mgu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyis stabs rnyeng ba// de dag thams cad yang
47b4(dkon brtsegs): rangs thal sbyang bar gshegs la migs phyag 'tshal/ kAraHmo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas klu bu mo dag gi mtshang ba yang mthong // lung bsdu
47b5(dkon brtsegs): yang thos/ yongs rdzogs par yang rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' ba nye dga' ba la sogs paklu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngomababar gyur te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can
47b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bsam pa ma khyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa'i mo// ma gas pa 'am/ mngon dus mdzad pa gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs
47b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba rams nas med pa// dus tshang ba med pa/ ge bar gteng ba/ 'di sazeng ba la don yod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis rang cwa rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar dang du byung ba ste/ de banan
47b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs paden rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga'o// de ltar bung med du gyur pa/ rgod pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongasu shes pa dang / de ltar brjes
48a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa/ 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug mi bzang
48a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ba la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ro'i mthas gtu
48a3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te/ thams cad ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di / spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byaso// spos kyi dri'i nga nges kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par
48a4(dkon brtsegs): gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dring tshor b.ragyur pa de dag thams cad// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
48a5(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams chad kyang dpag tshad drug cu chun chang mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byaso// n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' rab
48a6(dkon brtsegs): de yang rin btang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal par bku // klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang / ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan
48a7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te smra byung // klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bre so// rin po che sna bdun gyi ka bde dag kyang bai DUr+ya'i drabs legs par
48a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyan to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi yang chen thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gnoni 'jam pa bai sgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
48b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rje leb ar po na gi ltar 'jam pa kha ga bai DUR+Ya lta ga 'i g+sa pa/ ka tsa lin 'di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig lam na ganga' bar 'gyur ba/ mi dang lha rnams kyi yid
