48b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong ba lta bu'o// nor bu rin po che sA tshogs de dag gi nang nas/ nor bu la la las ni me 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha
48b3(dkon brtsegs): dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung // nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la
48b4(dkon brtsegs): la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo bang gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung // la la ni snum gyi byab byeng / la la ni me long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to// 
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang / rin po che de ngag gi nang du snang bar gyur to// zam sa cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
48b6(dkon brtsegs): par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang / nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang
48b7(dkon brtsegs): kwa'i mthus/ gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to// rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lnga ldi rnam pa
48b8(dkon brtsegs): sde chags dang / ri ma tsho'i lnga rdzi rnam pa latshogs dang / mu chog sa tha~M rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog cigs la lnga rdzi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnarnam par chags dang / dril bum
49a1(dkon brtsegs): ka'i drab rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' ngo dang / nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du sgri ste/ rkang gis dong nas/ 
49a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi
49a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de
49a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas klu byeb phrag dgu bcu pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsuM ma bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
49a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pas rjesu dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par lta/ la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir/ lhag
49a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de nas de dag gis chung zad cig tu mi smra bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjesu dran par byas nas/ so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la
49a7(dkon brtsegs): bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig su bcad pa
49a8(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/ dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can/ rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te// bde gsheg
49b1(dkon brtsegs): khyed ni grong khyer mngon par byung // lo drug bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsim brnyes kyang // bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur// thub pa khyed kyis byang chub thugs
49b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis spyad // ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod// 'gre la pan bzhed dka' thub spang mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btar gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// thub pa dbu
49b3(dkon brtsegs): dang spyan ni btang ba dang // byang chub sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur// gang che ka ling rgyal po bzengs
49b4(dkon brtsegs): bas zhabs dang phyag dang sngan rnams gtubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs bcang rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phug ron skyabasu mchis pa ma pa
49b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gcal gyur pa// rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste// bde gshegs byang chub spro/ da pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci
49b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song mun par ltung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' legs// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags
49b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bade gshegs spang pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang // sgrub pa'i che na de la mi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyong bde bka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la// thub kra
49b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhini sprod 'gyur ba// de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol// rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thob 'tshal 'ong // klu tshogs 'di
50a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams thub pasgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// brtul zhugs spyod bde bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 
50a2(dkon brtsegs): klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugasu chud nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad // 'di ni chos nyid de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe
50a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma'i 'od zer/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ 
50a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan brta thul gyis/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa
50a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams// rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dren pa bdeg gas thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// tshogs kyi slob dpon skye ba 'di dag ni/ 
50a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum rgyu can 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lnga// yid ni nur gyur the tsom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tsom rnam pa bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pashag kya thub// de ring su zhig ying ni yongasu dgal
50a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te// rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs
50a8(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// shAkya seng ge bka' stsol the tshom khum// sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du lha// tshogs kyi slob dpon the tsom bsal du gsol/ 
50b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'jam pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de zas skye ba dngag dgar 'gyur te// rgyal bas dgengs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshim 'gyes na// gzhan du/ 
50b2(dkon brtsegs): mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de sngar bka' stsal pa// thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi sleb dben gyis/ tshangs 'dra yan
50b3(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis// rta thul skyen med sems kyis dang pos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mkhan par bgyis// klu'i bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'greb zil gyis mnan nas mched
50b4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas// skye ba bde bar yongs smi bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgya sa byang chub 'di na yongs tshel// snying rje chen pos rnam 'a drin med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten
50b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dren pa dag ni skye bar me nga mi 'gyur// zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan ste/ bas// mtshan med steng pa de bzhin smon med pa// rnam thar sde
50b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum yongasu bsgoms nasu// shin tu yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro/ 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang
50b7(dkon brtsegs): byams dang snying rje thob// 'gro la snying rje chen po rab skyed nas// snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas// de dag dag
50b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing // 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyu la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob// de na bdad med mu stegs
51a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed // bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang // bde bar gshegs
51a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyang spyod cing // rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur// mtshungs med thub rgyal bde bar myur du yang // yongasu 'tshang rgya 'a
51a3(dkon brtsegs): med thob par 'gyur// thos nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan// 'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur
51a4(dkon brtsegs): phyug dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag/ rang byung dgengs min chung zad byed mi 'gyur// de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan/ bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med 'theb par 'gyur// de dag
51a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig thos sems can gang yang ni// bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyurar ba med// bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// / 'gro ba 'chi med yang dag 'thob par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro bas
51a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs// rga ba dang nin dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongasu 'grol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// klu'i bsam pa shAkya seng ge la// 
51a7(dkon brtsegs): mongasu zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams// gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan// klu rnams lung bstan yid 'ong ba yi// rgyal ba'i gsungs thos
51a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// de la yang ni rab tu'i gyur nas// dga' ba 'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabasu song // klu lung bstan pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / de nas grul bum bye ba phrag
51b1(dkon brtsegs): brje brgyad kyis// lha ma yin rnams dang / namakha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la ying rangs ste/ rab tu
51b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mched pa rgya chen po 'di
51b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu byas pas kyang / ngo mtshar du mau dgongs te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongasu rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos
51b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la the tsom mi mnga' zhing / yon tan thams cad yod su rdzogs la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bshes kyang mthe ba 'am dpa'
51b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur zhing // ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam mo// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bcwo brgya nga po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas/ bcom ldan
51b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i pir/ rin po che sA ba dan gyi bla re bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste gser gyi skad pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skad pa'i bla re dang / bai DUR+Ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla ra
51b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mu tig dmar po'i bI ra dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag/ rin po che bla re dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul to// gser gyi skad pa'i bla re rnam
51b8(dkon brtsegs): la ni dngul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skang pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai DUR+Ya'i bA re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ shel
52a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bla re rnams la ni bai DUR+Ya'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnamal ni spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig dmar
52a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i ldalnga ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me to gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkra ba blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad kyang mngon
52a3(dkon brtsegs): bar sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai DUR+Ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu
52a4(dkon brtsegs): bcan bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad mngon par sprul to// gdugs de dag la yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi mdo na bar sprul te/ 'di lta ste gser gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / 
52a5(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai DUR+Ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha sta go/ 
52a6(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog phreng ba de dag gi gzungs byaso// grul bum gyi rol mo sil sman dag kyang mngon par sprul to// 
52a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rje su 'bring bar gyur to// de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang bla re dang me tog de dag gis/ 
52a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to// bskor nas/ shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das
52b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bsted pa// thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can// thub pa
52b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po ma mtho mi dma' ste// ri'i rgyal po lhun pa'i ri 'dra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhi su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'// 'dren
52b3(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas// shes rab ldan la dregs pa yong mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyed kyis 'gro ba sgra 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin steng ste rmi lam dga' 'dra dang // chu zlan mkha'i smag
52b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu lta bur ni// bde bar gshegs pas 'gre ba 'di dag gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni po dgas bcu kun na med// gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste/ 
52b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gre 'di gzugs// mchod pa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang bA re sil sran dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal me sbyar bgyis
52b6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'// 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang // sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur sheg/ rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gos// rtogs
52b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi// nad dang rga shis yongasu gtses gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur thob rga shi mang pa'i gnas// gang thos grol 'gyur
52b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gre la bstan par bgyi// bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas// sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab sten pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sen
53a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ grul bum de ngag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chung nas// 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
53a2(dkon brtsegs): la tshigasu bcad gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas pa mtshar mi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur meng rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsol
53a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom som ci 'tshal// the tsom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tsom khum// mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang
53a4(dkon brtsegs): gis de ring chos la yang bzhag gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis// mi yid dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// 
53a5(dkon brtsegs): ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid cig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas// rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal
53a6(dkon brtsegs): de ring su yos 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom// thub pa ston pa dang sus mnyes par bgyis// 'dren pa de ring su zhig gting rnyed gyur// the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de yi den
53a7(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyan spa du// 'gro ba kun kyang thal me sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom stsol// rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ che dang
53a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcing slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyi dro ba legs par dris// 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs dras pas na// 'gro ba'i don yangs khyod kyis byas par gyur// de de na bstanas
53b1(dkon brtsegs): mthul pa 'a par gyis// grul bum tshogs kyis ngal mched byas te// shi ba'i chos la de dang yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar me nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang gzhag/ de dag rnams
53b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de ring ngamachod de// shi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par bdang // lam ster skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas sring rje chen po bskyed // sring rje bas nang la mched pa byas// rab tu lam ster
53b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na// grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzangs// brgya byin lnga'i drung du 'dong bar 'gyur// thugs rje bams den mdzad
53b4(dkon brtsegs): skyeb drang du'ang 'deng // nges ni chung zad yang dang yang bstan te/ brir zhing ches la the tsom med par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gang+gA'i bye srang du// gi nas shing du rnam par rgyu byed cing // bdag cing
53b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i chos la mched pa byed// go tsa chen po rab tu bgos yi dkyis// de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don
53b6(dkon brtsegs): byang 'dren 'gyur te// de mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba// der ni 'gre bas rgyal ba byung bar shes// de dag thabs kyis ma 'angs dus dag na// de mtshar med par
53b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnam grol byed // rgyal bango mtshar med pa zhing sbreng zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi 'chil// de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas ste// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'dzum rgyu
53b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas lung bstan cing // bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten rigs bsngal te// grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu nges thos nas// 'gro ba the tsom bstsal te dgo' bar gyur// grul bum lung bstan pa'i
54a1(dkon brtsegs): le'u steng gu pa'o// de nas de'i tshe dri za bye brag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang // namakha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams
54a2(dkon brtsegs): dang grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ngo mtshar thob par gyur to// 'di ltar
54a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang / yang dag par bka' stsal pa/ bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung bstan
54a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad ngo sum nas// de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshe gus pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas/ bla na ma
54a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mtsho dpa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur te// glang po che'i rgyal pos srub
54a6(dkon brtsegs): gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ mgo re re zhing se bye ba brag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so re re la yang rdzing bu bdun
54a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun/ rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing yang mdab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / mdab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re shing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
54a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pad+ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag gi mgo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas
54b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to// glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha
54b2(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to// de nas dri za de dag glang po ches srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la zhon te/ lha'i rol mo'i sil
54b3(dkon brtsegs): sAr len cing na mkha' la rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i tsan dan gyi byams/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// 
54b4(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i a ga ru'i bye ma dang / lha'i ngam la'i lo ma dang / ud da la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man
54b5(dkon brtsegs): dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / par sha ka chen po dang mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis/ tsuldan 'das la gter/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu
54b6(dkon brtsegs): gtor to// gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon
54b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te// spos kyi bla re de dag las spos kyi ngang 'byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo// 
54b8(dkon brtsegs): spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug tshan cad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdzab de dros stong gsum gyi stong chen
55a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dring tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol me sol sran de dag gi sgra thos par
55a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar dri za re res kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i pir/ glang po che sa srung gi bu
55a3(dkon brtsegs): mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha mo glu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byaso// lha'i bu me de dag las l-i la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ 
55a4(dkon brtsegs): la la ni tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma li'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor/ la la ni me tog man de rab dang
55a5(dkon brtsegs): mnang rab chen po nas/ skya sngar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / 
55a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che snyim pas blang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rigs dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches
55a7(dkon brtsegs): spras pa'i bar dag 'bu'o// la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin la la ni lha'i
55a8(dkon brtsegs): spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhino// de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu de dag
55b1(dkon brtsegs): la zhen nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las/ glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal
55b2(dkon brtsegs): mo sbar bas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa ngag gis mngon par bstod pa// bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar byin pa// srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam
55b3(dkon brtsegs): dgrol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'// mi mchog khyod kyi sa chen 'di steng du// grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar
55b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ 'gyur ba gyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la// dge ba 'o tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs la gyur pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid// brjod pa tsam ste gzhan no tsam
55b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis// tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyong // bde bar ga shegs pas song med 'ong med dang / gnas med rang bzhin gyis
55b6(dkon brtsegs): ni stong pa dang / chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig rten gtso bos bya ba'ang yongasu
55b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dang // bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems shing / 
55b8(dkon brtsegs): shing rnga'i dgyi bdag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongasu skul mi 'gyed // chos ni chos la dran par bgying ma mchis// ches rnams
56a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la nye bar ma ngon te// chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chim mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzob de yang de na ma mchis te// 'gro ba 'ang
56a2(dkon brtsegs): kun kun rdzob ji bzhin shes// tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs// mig gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par gzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra
56a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te// nor pa'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams// chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te/ 
56a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med 'thob par bgyi// rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa bde gshegs grag pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// song nam
56a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod zhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon pa
56a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal brgya ldan yongasu dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong gyur la// g.yo'i zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong // yongs 'thom spe
56a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar rgod pa yongasu dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// lha tshogs yongs skyoganyid kyis log gyur cing // bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu
56a8(dkon brtsegs): chung gzon dgrol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pathugs chung nas// 'dzum pa mdza // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan
56b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigasu bcing gsel ba/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'gyur mi 'dzum na// bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs// nam
56b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tsom sol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tsom rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzum pa'i don ni de dag gnyen par 'tshal// thub chen 'gro ba'i
56b3(dkon brtsegs): the tsom bsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs// the tsom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa
56b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur/ gang gi blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro
56b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nang nga 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'di dag blo gtan yongs btang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum ngon zhal nas thos par dga'// sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing / 
56b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta// nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig/ 'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol// rgyal ba
56b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje ldan pas 'jan rgyu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de sngar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pangs mdzangs// khyod kyis don dros mthun
56b8(dkon brtsegs): legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de'i don ni lung bstan pas// skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel// 'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de nim/ 
57a1(dkon brtsegs): legs par yang ngas bstan gyis// bstan de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon// dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes bsregs shing // bde bar gshegs la mchong ba 'di ngag byas/ 
57a2(dkon brtsegs): ches nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste// chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas// rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjesu brjod pa
57a3(dkon brtsegs): ba nges ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs// de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas// rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams
57a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis nga mchong ngo // nor pa'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos// 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// dri za'i ris ber dga' ba'i yid gyur te// blo gres
57a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul pa// brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rje/ la med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mngal mchod byed 'gyur// zhing
57a6(dkon brtsegs): nas shing du rjes su rgyu byed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongasu sbyong // de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems
57a7(dkon brtsegs): can ni// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas/ bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rdul
57a8(dkon brtsegs): med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste// sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i// bskal pa rnamasu rdul med gnas par 'gyur// thams cad
57b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i las 'di rjesu sten// rgyal bathub pa nyin mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar dri tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan// da thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa// drin lung bstan pa ni bshad ba mdzad/ dz+ra
57b2(dkon brtsegs): za lung bstan yid du 'thang 'gyur ba// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsungs thos nas/ shAkya thub la thams cad skyabasu dong // dri za lung bstan pa'i
57b3(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste bcu pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po lnga pa// 
57b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgya cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mched pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim ning mgu la yid rangs ste// rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba
57b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de/ chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos pas/ ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang
57b6(dkon brtsegs): dri zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur te// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
57b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshig su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas sde/ 
57b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyang tshe chu 'dzin bsam 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/ mi yi seng ge byang la 'di ltar bstod ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'// gzi brjod
58a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mamakha' gzhal rung gang la/ shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs// tshang gzungs dpag par nus pa yong ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam 'thugs
58a2(dkon brtsegs): chub/ skye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la bstan pa dang // de dag sems rgyud
58a3(dkon brtsegs): 'drar 'byung ba dang / de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// phrag dag
58a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// de bas mtshungs med kun tu/ mtha' yang las// 'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar 'khya mas pa// de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// de la
58a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rgyun du rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang las// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs// chung za'i le rgyud gang dur khyams gyur cing // 
58a6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa// de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnams na ji srid dus gnas shing // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang // lus kyi rnam
58a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ci 'dra'achang ba rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thor 'gyur bar// gang la brten cing las rnams bgying 'gyur
58a8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo na gang zhig gis// ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i zhib 'thob
58b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur khyed kyis mkhyen// byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la// rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yis// bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu
58b2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pa// dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang / ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ 
58b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dang bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing // tshes kun stong pa nyid yongs brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gnyi ga bgyis shing // 'gro
58b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud kun tu smon pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar ba brtags nas// phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te// byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs// mgon po khyod la
58b5(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chung pa// de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub pa ra shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig/ de nas bcom
58b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis// de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgya cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang
58b7(dkon brtsegs): gsel ba/ mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i zhal nas
58b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di ga the tsom 'tshal// mgon pos de ga the tsom bsal du gsel// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal
59a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ba skyes// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gi sems na ma sbrul gnas par gyur// de dag rgyal bas 'grib bstan du gsol// de ring 'khor rnams
59a2(dkon brtsegs): the tsom che 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdong // ci nas the tsom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol// de ring 'din gang gi rnam 'phral lags// 
59a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'dir bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis gyur// de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa// the
59a4(dkon brtsegs): tsam 'tshal ba'i yad gnyis legs bsal gsol// do/ das lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing / mgub dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'a
59a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcang slar bka' stsa/ garta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring la/ bdag gi don chen byas// rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na
59a6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i dgongs pa khyod kyis legs par mthong // de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa// dad pa'i
59a7(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas// gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas/ 
59a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang // chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang // mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun du smon pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub
59b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu ngadag yid kyang btang // rnam 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams pashig cing // kun rdzob tsar du rig nas mi chags te// sring ba kun tu tshul pad+mo bzhin// byang chub mchog tung ngag yid kyang ba dang / 'as
59b2(dkon brtsegs): sring nga gang du rgyags 'gyur ba// stong bas bshig sde thams cad legs rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste// byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste// den
59b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i bla mang byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas// zhi ba bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyidang // yang
59b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod de yang rang bzhin stong ba ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyi sa pas min// ye shes rang bzhin steng par rig gyur te// sa bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas/ shes pa po dang 'dra bar
59b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur na// byang chub lam la de dag sbed ces bya// stong rje rang bzhin stong par shes par bya// mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // smod pa meng pa'ang mang bzhin stong pa ste/ 
59b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sbed na gzhan min spyod pa min// de thos lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur// rang 'byung chos la de dag yid ches te// zhi ba'i gnas zhes byang chub yid
59b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur// gnod sbyiran tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te// 'di ltar nga la mchong bar rabru byas pas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo can rnams// mtho ris dong shing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag ma'
59b8(dkon brtsegs): dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang // blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzong mkhyer rgyal ba gdams ngag ston// de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 
60a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dod gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas// 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar brtan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas// byang
60a2(dkon brtsegs): chub bla med de dag thob 'gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur// sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grol// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can// de dag ming ni 'jig rten khams shes bya/ 
60a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi/ tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur// de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni// rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten
60a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// de skad thos nas lhar bas 'jig rten dag/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te/ 
60a5(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur// gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la stsogs pa/ mi 'am ci bye ba
60a6(dkon brtsegs): drag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang // gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te// khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs
60a7(dkon brtsegs): la/ srog dang skye ba po dang / sheng las skyes dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang bdag gi yang gang yang med la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can zhes gangags pa'i phung po dang
60a8(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs// sangs rgyas
60b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ngo mtshar rdzong // chazhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpal mas sangs
60b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya su 'gyuro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongasu smin pa dang / zhing bkod pa de skye zhing yongs ngas
60b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di srid cig gis sangs rgyasu 'gyu
60b4(dkon brtsegs): sa bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di skad cig tu sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi can thos 'dus pa ni 'di spang
60b5(dkon brtsegs): cig tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di skad cig tu gan sa par 'gyu ro zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa
60b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs ste/ sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyu ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta
60b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i the tsom skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu bzhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/ shes rab
60b8(dkon brtsegs): che mnga' bdag ngogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ bde gshegs bdag gis ngem 'tshal// gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings/ 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin med gsung rdza
61a1(dkon brtsegs): / lnga bu/ mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchod// skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu// sems bskyed pa na ji lta bu// skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i// ldem po ngag de bdag ma
61a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// mi dbang bdag po ji lta bu// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung // de ni yang dag lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tsom khum// sgyu ma 'dral lhar skye zhes// gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu
61a3(dkon brtsegs): ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge ba shes brten gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu
61a4(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal// g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu// ldem po ra gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma
61a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ rang bzhin stong ste stong pa nyi dang // rtogs shes mgo na gsung ji lta bu// the tshom rnam pa 'di 'drar skyes// she sa rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal// zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal
61a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po ngag/ bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams// nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu// chos
61a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu spang bgyis na// mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu// brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyid pa ma mchis la// rang las can gsungs ji/ 
61a8(dkon brtsegs): lta bu/ bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang // zil gyis mi non bdag ma 'tshal// mgon po de la bdag ngogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi the tsom sol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la
61b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsungs gi tshul// de skang bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la// spong bang las ni zang bstan pa/ da
61b2(dkon brtsegs): meng bre mnga' 'di la yang // bdag ni yid gnyis the tsom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab ringab bral ba yis// spyan mnga' sdig spangs
61b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tsom 'di// sel nus ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das
61b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tsom dris pa 'dir ga gsan nas// de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigasu bcing sngar bka' stsal pa/ steng
61b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis ma mtshal ces smras pa// gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na// rgyal bas de lu nga bstan mi gsung // ci phyir zhen 'di lta bur// rang gi rang
61b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel meng 'grib pa med// me long shin tu yongs dag la// ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi// gzugs brlar snang ba de bzhin du/ 
61b7(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi darings ni 'gyur med na// mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes// yan lag rnams la bdag byas la// ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod / 
61b8(dkon brtsegs): chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa rnams ni 'jil 'khrul// blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed/ 
62a1(dkon brtsegs): don ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po ngag/ gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba'i rnams// 'khor bar mngon dpa
62a2(dkon brtsegs): sems zhen pa// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i// sems med chos ni ngas bshad na// byis pa'i blo dang
62a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems cing dang / byang chub pan yon thos gyur nas// zil gyis mnon rang byung sems// rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis
62a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho ba// de yang ma 'tshal zhes smras pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag/ dalung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med
62a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam bar bston// sgyum 'dral lhar skyeb// ji lta bu zhes gas gyur par// mthar byin gyur slob pa dang // skyob rnams
62a6(dkon brtsegs): lamatho ris bshad// gnas pa'ang yong ba ma yin la// dge ba shes brten zhes gang smras pa// gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes bstan// g.yo ba ma mchis bgyib
62a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// bstan pa ma 'chal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rdzogs// mi gang bdag yod khams len cing // bya ba'ang bdag gis byas 'dzin pa// dngag
62a8(dkon brtsegs): la ni byab dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad // rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa// byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams// rang bzhi stong par mi shes pa// ngas
62b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings// zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong zhes smras
62b2(dkon brtsegs): nga ni/ mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyi// kun tu rtog las srid pa skye// skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la// kun tu rtog pas skom pa ste// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa min la leg par brtags
62b3(dkon brtsegs): chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang // smig rgyu la ni chu ma dang // de bzhin yengasu rtog pas dkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtog/ byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis// sdug
62b4(dkon brtsegs): meng spel rgya chu bzhinang // smig rgyu lani tshwa mang // de bzhin pa/ thugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa ma yin ma/ byas pa log pa'i 'du shes can// sdug par rtag pas ba
62b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// ches rnams na mkha'i 'dra ba dang // spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa// med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa// mi mkha sa rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin nga ba nyid sbeng na// bdag
62b6(dkon brtsegs): zhen dus ni mi shes pa// de dag stong zhes thos gyur na// bdag mid 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye// de dag bdag tu mengon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdung bor nas// stong pa gya nem spong byed de// mi mkhas sems
62b7(dkon brtsegs): dmyal chen par ltung // mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang // skye bo'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te// byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/ yang dag tu ni 'gro bdag/ rmo 'drar ba
62b8(dkon brtsegs): pa shes par gyis// rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen// ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan// byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med// shing rnams rlung gi bskul pa las/ 
63a1(dkon brtsegs): me 'byung 'gyur baji bzhi no// bdag cag me 'ang bskyed bya zhes// rlung dang shing la sems pa med// 'on kyang me ni 'byul ltar// las kyi bang po bzhin// bsod nams chog
63a2(dkon brtsegs): ni long min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos// mi yi tshe tshang la brgya ste// de sring 'tshe gas brjed med kyi// lo la pang bar
63a3(dkon brtsegs): spasmras pa med// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gang smras dang // las zad ces ni gang smras pa// stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med// tha srad tshul nga zad par bstan// yang dag mtha' ni
63a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad pa// phyini ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams// yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de// mtshan nyid med
63a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams ni// nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi// byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan// chos rnams thams
63a6(dkon brtsegs): cang ma byas pa// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// de ltar spod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te// 'di 'dra'i tshul 'jug pa ni// a yi sgo yi gzungasu bstan// chos rnam
63a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'gag med pa// a yis chos la 'jug par bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zang smras pa// chos kun mi zang bzod bya ste/ 
63a8(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis// mi zang sgo yi gzungs bstan// chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung // 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brten nas 'jug
63b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya// ches kun nga sam gyis mi khyab ces// yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a yi sgo'i gzungs bstan pa// 'di yang ldan pas shes par gyis// chos kun lus med byang chub ces// blo
63b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnams langs bstan pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las rten nas 'jug par bya// ches rnams 'ong ba med pa ste// med pas de dag 'ong ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las
63b3(dkon brtsegs): brjen nas 'jug par bya// ches rnams gdags pa med pa ste// med pas de dag gdags pa med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med
63b4(dkon brtsegs): bste/ med pas de ga rang bzhir med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yi na te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungasu bstan// gzung sa kyi skem nga las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba med// 'di yang
63b5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs bstan/ med phyir chos kur sgrib med ces// de bzhin gsheg sapas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ 
63b6(dkon brtsegs): a las brten nas shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad
63b7(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes par// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// ches rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin med// 
63b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brjen nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de ngag mthong nas bstan par bya// lnga ba pe ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro/ 
64a1(dkon brtsegs): kun mnyam med de bas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med// na mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin// de ltar lhag med chad pa med// mnyam gzhag med
64a2(dkon brtsegs): cing gnyi su med// gdung med bsal med tsha ba'ang med// blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro// drang po ma yin yon po min// mun pa ma yin snang ba min// mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas gzungs
64a3(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyis// g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba'ang med// 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med// ci yang mi byed ces zhi med// skyel ba med cing gnas kyang med// 'gro
64a4(dkon brtsegs): med ldog med 'gro sems med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa med par shes par gyis// mig can ma yin longs pa min// lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min// sbas pa ma yin gzhag pa
64a5(dkon brtsegs): ming dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yin ni ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bden min brdzun min de lta babur// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis// 'jig rten
64a6(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i don phyir gyi// 'di la the tsom gang yang med// gang gtsang bya ba'i the tshom de// dam pa'i don du byung ba med// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang
64a7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs nges par bstan pas/ yongasu tshim par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang / pad+ma la rten pa dang / ri la rten pa dang / 
64a8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can// rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa// gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang lnga ldis brgyan pa bye
64b1(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil sman bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas// ri spos kyi ngang ldang las skyes pa dang // thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyi
64b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bas nas// de mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan gcig tu// khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad pa de dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
64b3(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la gter/ mngon par gter/ mngon par rab tu gtor// de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te/ 
64b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang pas dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsre rab byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya ga 'tshal nas/ thal me sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mag
64b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzum par lta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjesu dran par byed cing / phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
64b6(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan parta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral
64b7(dkon brtsegs): spun mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong na
64b8(dkon brtsegs): thetsom 'tshal// zlab ches la mi bzhir du// smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta// bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag ni the tsom 'tshal bar gyur/ 
65a1(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog dam pa the tsom so// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dang bathob na bcom ldan 'das// 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par 'gyur// smra mchog bdag gi thetsam
65a2(dkon brtsegs): khu ba thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing // the tsom ma mchis som nyi chang // ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par gyur// de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi
65a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog/ 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // the tsom gtsang slad ljon pa dang // mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar
65a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du// sangs rgya sa yon tan sten 'gyur ba// ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris dab// rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong ba sgrib
65a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can// de khyo dadang ba'i yid kyis nyon// skye med yid kyis nga las te/ na// 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tsom
65a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dris pa// de yis 'bras bu brjod par byas// the tshom gcad pa nga las nyon// ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci// bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi
65a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phos mtho ris 'dong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der// lha mi nang du 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi seng ge de dag gis/ 
65a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig tu// sprul pakye rang ni lha gnas na// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang // de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas// rang rang zhing rnams/ 
65b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogasu// byang chub rnam par 'chang rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la// mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur// de
65b2(dkon brtsegs): dag shing du sems can gang // yongasu ma smin 'ga' mi skye// nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba// kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa// mi yi seng ge'i shing der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig
65b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gong dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams// bdag cag gtso bor gyur pa rnams// bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing // yongasu sbyang bar bya'o zhes// 
65b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab// de dag 'din ngas shi 'phos nas// bsam pas rang bzhin rnam par spyang // yon mang
65b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa de dag gi/ nga gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga' ldan/ mas kyi longs spyod rnams// ngan song kun kyang yongasu dag/ de dag zhing du rnam kun du// mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// 
65b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnams yongs spangs de dag ni// sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon pa yis// mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstan de thob 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang
65b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ni rangs par gyur// mi'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas lnga phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris// lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar ngag gi mchong ba yang
65b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing // bcom ldan 'das la mchod
66a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad / me tog man dar bas pus nub tsam du gang brlabyas/ 
66a2(dkon brtsegs): de ras re ngag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba// bde bar gshe
66a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thugs rje can// 'jig rten bdag po mi yi bdag/ sangs rgyas chos la mes pa yi// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas pa// zhabs mchog mdzes shing dag ldan pa// thugs rje can la mgos phyag
66a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'angs kyi zhal du lta// dpag tu med pa'i dge spyang pa// dpag
66a5(dkon brtsegs): yas ye shes phung po ldan// gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can// blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal sdug pa// bden bzhi mi bsrings dri gsum
66a6(dkon brtsegs): sel rgya ba'i bcwo brgyad chos dang ldan// the tsom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // dpe dang bzang po brgyad cu ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs// 
66a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar byin pa// ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa// ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can// bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags// ye
66a8(dkon brtsegs): shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa// ser sna mi mngaras nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs khyod// gti
66b1(dkon brtsegs): mug gi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang sdebs bcu yi// chos rnams 'di ni thob par shog/ ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag
66b2(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang // lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// sring brtse nye bar bzung nas ni// 'gre ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba// srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi// bdag cag lhar
66b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgel bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bas
66b4(dkon brtsegs): bathugasu chud nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdza // de nas tshe dang ldan brta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gso la pa// bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po// rgyu ma mchis
66b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzum mi mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong ras/ 
66b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor kun the tsom 'tshal gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal// don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don// bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog/ dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod// the tsom chang
66b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par gyis// gang gis der mchod pa med kyis// su zhig de ring gting thob 'gyur// bde gshegs bdag gi the tsom khum// de ring gang gis
66b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi gnas// dkrug g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par gyis// deng sus lnga gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ying ldan par gyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i the tsom myur du khum// de thos
67a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshigasu bcad tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ brang ldan glang
67a2(dkon brtsegs): de can lnga yi// lung bstan rnga thul khyod dris pa// des na 'gro ba mang po yi// don chen shin tu dang byas 'gyur// stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro ba mang ngan
67a3(dkon brtsegs): du/ de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// phreng ldan glang po lnga tshogs kyis// nga la sems dang nga mched pas// bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pa ma byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di
67a4(dkon brtsegs): nas shi 'phos nas// 'thun par me yi nang skyes te// rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems// bskyed par 'gyur
67a5(dkon brtsegs): ning 'phel byed 'gyur// rang byung mi yi seng ge la/ tshigasu bca dpas bstod par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang // me tog gis mchechod
67a6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod pas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing // mthu bo che'i sku bstod nas// rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la// rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten
67a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba// brgyad khri bo rnams de dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur// me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya// de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang // ngan
67a8(dkon brtsegs): seng gshin rje'i 'jig rten med// zhing den ni lha min med// mi kho ma thams cad rab tu bcom// breng ldan glang po can lnga yi// longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// 'di 'dra ba ni nga 'drar 'gyur// 
67b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i mcha dang gtu med// de mo ming gi sgra mi grag/ mi dge byed pa smos cing gos// den rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye ba rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// sreg chags bye ba khrag khrig brag/ yang+gA 'byam rang
67b2(dkon brtsegs): mang rnyeng // grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang sten// grags pa ma smad de dag gi/ rang bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang // rgyal ba'i
67b3(dkon brtsegs): sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur// brang ldan
67b4(dkon brtsegs): glang po can rnams kyis// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang // de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'// phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
67b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa'o// // de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa
67b6(dkon brtsegs): yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir// mos pa drag po bskyed de// 'di lta ste dper na
67b7(dkon brtsegs): khams pa'i gru la zher pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su phyin na// gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pa rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mes pa drag po skyes pa de bzhin du// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khrob
67b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams theb par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi tshes tshol zhing bcom ldan
68a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ rin po che'i bla re bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang
68a2(dkon brtsegs): phal cher mu tig dmar po dang / skar mngag dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / gser dang / rdo'i rang bzhin can sha sA go/ lha'i rol mo sil sran dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu ri po che sna tshogs kyi
68a3(dkon brtsegs): bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas rol mo'i sil sran dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las deng ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me tog man da ra ba dang / man da rab chen
68a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / mar dzu sha ka cher po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtar// mngon par gter/ mngon par rab tu gte
68a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lanag/ sum bskor ba byas te/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon bar bsteng pa/ rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi// lha ni gu waM thams
68a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag/ 'dren pa khyed kyi spyan snga na// thal me rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mchog la
68a7(dkon brtsegs): pag kyang 'tshal// khong ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par spangs// sred pa'i phur pa rab tu phyung // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsngal// khyed ni zug rngu phyung ba ste// rma la gdugs
68a8(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis spangs// khyed ni mkhyen ba zhen spyad pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi rma rnams so so// khyod kyis nyon mongs thams cad spangs// 'ching ba dag ni thams cad bcang // sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa
68b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni// stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa rang // bcom ldan khyes smin pa yang // rnam pa kun du mi mdze'o// khyod kyis sred pa drang nas phyung / ma rig pas ni thugs kyang byung / 
68b2(dkon brtsegs): zar pa bzhi po'i byin ci log// rnam pa kun du yongs spangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chung ngo // ri dgas rngon pas ji bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur bas yang dag mtha' ni khyed kyis gzigs// sems
68b3(dkon brtsegs): caran 'jigs chags lngar lhung ste// stong pa nyid ni ma 'chal bas// ma rig pa'i mur pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i bcan ra dga' bar 'gyed // khyed kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gre nga rang pa steng 'drar gzig
68b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rnam ngag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu bstar// phung po steng par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs kyang gas ga 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni skye mtshang dag/ bdag rengs
68b5(dkon brtsegs): par rnam par bshig/ ches gang dang ming gang gis// chos gang med na bar brjed bgyi ba// ches de ches nges steng pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhar pas med pa la// skye ba'i
68b6(dkon brtsegs): tshegs chen mengon sprul na// de la sems can gdags ma mchis// sreg dang gang zag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yor sgra ma yin// 
68b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa dam pas bstan pa mdzad// ji ltar rim mkhan zhig gis// bung med gzugs ni rnam bris shing // mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang // l-I dang yang ba bstar bgyis kyang // bris pa'i migo ni bsngas
68b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ de la mi mnyal ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na// byis pa rnams niring la rmongs// gang shes khyod kyis bslab pa la// legs bslab rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag
69a1(dkon brtsegs): mthil skyu ru bzhin du// de ri kur mkhyer khyod kyis bstan// shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni// ye shes sgron ma rab bus ste// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bser nas// sems can rnams la chos
69a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur du ni// bla med byang chub ni theb ste// ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la
69a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'drer pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chung nas// 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang
69a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang gsol ba// rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzadan// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzam gyi rgyu// dpa' bo chem
69a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng gzhan mthong nas ni// yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te// kun kyang the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// de ring su yis bdud pa ma
69a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis// nem nur gang gis gtsang bar gyur// su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur// skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yis mchod// ston pa gang gis bser bkur bgyis// 'gro kun
69a7(dkon brtsegs): nem nur 'tshal gyur na// rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na// 'gro ba'i the tshom 'chang 'gyur ba// 'dren pas de ltar lung bstar gsal
69a8(dkon brtsegs): ci nas rnam pa thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa'i rnams// myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul la tshigs
69b1(dkon brtsegs): bcing sngar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes// rnga thul khyod kyis dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa
69b2(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // khams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon byos mkhan par gyis// dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis// mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin tu dang
69b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas// stong pa nyid kyang shes par 'gyur// chos rnams la ni nges pa rnyed // nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas// sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba'i phrag/ brgyad chungs
69b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di dag mchod // ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni// bye ba ra tha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de dag ji srid du// sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing // bsnyen bkur byas par ma
69b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya// de bas shin tu 'phyib na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ma 'od zer 'tshang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur// 
69b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sgren mang ngag go/ lan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni// blo'i mchog dang ldan pa dag// 'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gis// mi rnams de yo dus kyi che// 'dra
69b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgyad cu thams// srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams// lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dag/ bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur// sems
69b8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i// 'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang // shin tu rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur// mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas// rnam par 'dren pa
70a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal ldan pa// rgya ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon ba skyob rnams kyi// mchod rten de dag thams cad la// srog
70a2(dkon brtsegs): chags brgya dang sdong rnams dang // khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de dag dam chos gnas
70a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyad cu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis// bzung zhing yongasu bsrung bar gnas// 'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // 
70a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs smin mdzad phyir// rgyal chen bzhi yi ros rnams la// 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad// de thos nas ni skye bo kun// kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems mgu yid kyang
70a5(dkon brtsegs): rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs
70a6(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po drug pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la stsogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus// lha ma yin dag dang / na mkha' lding ngag
70a7(dkon brtsegs): dang klu'i bu mo dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / 'phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung
70a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang thos nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yid byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dong ba'i tshul gyis lha'i dab
70b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ob rgya byin las sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mched pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin pa che'i khang ba bkrab/ bltan sdug pari po ma sa ba na mi rang bzhin can/ mu ti ga dmar ba'i phreng ba dang /  zlum
70b2(dkon brtsegs): phreng bas brgyan pa/ gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgya dang / baM ga ma dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal
70b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / ba dar ngag gis brgyan pa/ lha'i rdzas kyi seng+ge ri khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lnga'i rol mo'i sil sAn sgra rab
70b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to// rta cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing rta/ lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa
70b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul te// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor yug tu dbag tshang drug cu tshun chad me tog man nga rab dang / lha'i mchod ba ngag
70b6(dkon brtsegs): gis rgyas par gang bar byas so// glang po ches srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu/ glang po che sa srung gi bu'i mgo
70b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re shing yang so drug drug/ so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad+ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing yang mdab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/ mdab ma re re zhing yang lha'i
70b8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo bdun bdun// lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sha stag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i khang de dag bdun du byas te/ dbus su grang
71a1(dkon brtsegs): ches srung gi bu dag bcud ras/ byi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byaso// rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i can dan dang / a ga
71a2(dkon brtsegs): ru dang / ud pa la dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bye ma dang / gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba ru
71a3(dkon brtsegs): sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog dag gis char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// gser dang / dang lnga dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu
71a4(dkon brtsegs): tig dmar po dang / spug dang rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i bu me de dag las la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol
71a5(dkon brtsegs): me byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po ches srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis// mchod pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu rta cang sha
71a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis drang ba'i shing dbye ba brag brgyad la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to// lha'i rol mo sil slar bye ba phrag brgyad
71a7(dkon brtsegs): cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te// lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la
71a8(dkon brtsegs): la na rol mo byed / la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur cing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i
71b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mched ba bad pa las ni/ chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas/ de dag 'di sri chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa
71b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin sum du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas/ chos la the tsom med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tsom med cing nem nur med
71b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod// de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog
71b4(dkon brtsegs): cing bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
71b5(dkon brtsegs): gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te// de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar she/ sa nas/ the tsom med cing nem nur med par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom
71b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bsted pa/ 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang / sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang / lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ de ltar
71b7(dkon brtsegs): ches 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid // 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang // 'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'bre shes/ de dag lnga tshogs
71b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag blo gros skyes bcom ldan sprul pa 'ang dag ji bzhin du// ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas// 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchi so// rgyal
72a1(dkon brtsegs): ngas so so'i skye ba rnams mkhyen nas// byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa// de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te// bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhino// slob pa rnams dang
