72a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mi slob dang / bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra// bcom ldan bstan la the tsom ma mchi so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing // bse ru lha
72a3(dkon brtsegs): bu gnyis med nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchi so// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde ban phyir// rgyal po'i byang chub spyang spong bas
72a4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang / khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde gshe gas rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab
72a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas thugs rje can// ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med
72a6(dkon brtsegs): ni bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa// de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhino// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de
72a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// gang tshe go'u ta ma yi bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tso brang spas// sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshe
72a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams// the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa
72b1(dkon brtsegs): thug su chung nas 'dzum pa mdza // de nas tshe dang ldan parta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol ba/ gagal yas grag mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi
72b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tsom khums// rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di// byung nas rig nas 'jig rten the tsom 'chal// 
72b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i the tsom thub pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'angadi dag the tsom ma mchis mdzod // lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal ba bstod de lnga rdzas rnams kyis mchod// bde gshegs de ngag
72b4(dkon brtsegs): den du 'jum pa mdzad// rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' sul gsol// zla ltar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi/ ji nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon pa 'gre
72b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad dgar 'gyur bar// rgyal ba lnga tshogs mchod ma khyen bka' stsal gsol// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'a de yis chos rnams kun// sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs
72b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsal te// rab rib bral ba lha'i bslab pa gsungs// skye bo 'di dag the tsom bral gyur nas// thub pa de ltar byang chub spong rtsom 'gyur// rab tu dpa' ba
72b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dis thos gyur te// dgongs pa rig nas rgya chen rtsom par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de sngar bka' stsal pa// lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu
72b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste// 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba
73a1(dkon brtsegs): don chen bas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu dengs bstan gyis// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis ngal nyon// lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes
73a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi yi gtso bo gang+gA'i bye snyeng mchod// srid rgyud de na
73a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ang dag zung pa las// chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong // 'di dag ngal mchod mchog 'dir rabyas pas// chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du bzeng // bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/ 
73a4(dkon brtsegs): chung zos mi 'gyur bar chad yong mi 'gyur// lha tshogs 'di yi sa nga la mchod byas te// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa/ 'drar shes pas// bskal pa pad+ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe// smra ba'i zla
73a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// khyu mchog ldan pa'i mi mchog 'gyu ra ba ni// bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston zhing // 'gro ba
73a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yong ba// chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'drar bar sems// zhi gnas de la su bsten bag yod pa// myur du bla med byang chub
73a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni 'thob// sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lnga bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lham yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum res kyi lha
73a8(dkon brtsegs): bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa
73b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' bar shes shing // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na ma shes pa 'am ma mthong ba 'am/ ma rtogs pa 'am/ mngon du ma byas pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ las sam/ 
73b2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang meng zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang / don dam pa gnyi su thugasu chud de shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang
73b3(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa 'dir zang // de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen/ legs par mngon du mdzad pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi
73b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzig so// don dam pa gang yi na ba de ni brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa rnam pa ra shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yong su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ 
73b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par ma bas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma brtags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ 
73b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ nye bar bsnyen pa/ ma bor ba/ ma bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa bde ba ma yin pa/ 
73b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ma yin pa/ smar pa ma yin pa/ mi sman pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten bral ba med pa/ 
73b8(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsam pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa
74a1(dkon brtsegs): ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig
74a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sA dang / lce dang / lu
74a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus ste reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
74a4(dkon brtsegs): tsher ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du 'du shes kyi mtshan
74a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugasu sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa// chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang chu dang / me dang rlung dang / na mkha' dab
74a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan yi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos
74a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na/ de bis pa so so'i sre ba thos pa dang mi
74a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
74b1(dkon brtsegs): cheran gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yeng pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes sde de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams don du/ bcom ldan 'das la mched
74b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir brtsen par gyur te// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
74b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bsrer ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ 'thab bral gyi lhang dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad bdag gis mngon par bsted pa/ rgyal ba khyod
74b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis phung po dben par gzigs// khams dang skye mched na mas kyang de bzhin te/ dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag/ kun kyang thub pa khyed kyis ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rjer mkhas pa'i
74b5(dkon brtsegs): bden pa 'di gnyis te// khyed kyis gzhan las ma gsan ra ngagis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste// bden ba gsum pa gang yang ma mchi so// gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro
74b6(dkon brtsegs): brnams// bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten par phyir kun rje bde bstan to// sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmal dang
74b7(dkon brtsegs): drang 'gro yi dgas dang // rdza mar ris dang mi dang lnga yi rnams// mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzang// rigs dma' nga bzhin mthe ba'i rigs rnams dang / phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams pa
74b8(dkon brtsegs): bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji sbed gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob bde bar ma
75a1(dkon brtsegs): pas thugs chung ras// 'jig rten pa rangs mo la de bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ban// 'gro ba'i chas brgyang nge la mi 'byung ste// thob dang ma thob sar dang mi sran dang // bstod
75a2(dkon brtsegs): rang snang dang bde dang sdug bsngalo// theb pa rnyed na de la chags pa bskyed// mthob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan 'dis shes par bya// nang rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur// kun
75a3(dkon brtsegs): rje ba de la don dam su smra ba// de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang // mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de ltar dga' ste
75a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshar mar gang gnas pa// de dag bde gshegs gsungs ni thos gyur/ na// 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid// ded gabade gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pa// sems can dmyal
75a5(dkon brtsegs): bar sdug bsngal mi zang mong // de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log blos ro rnam
75a6(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab spangs ste// srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes// gang gis
75a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas dga' ba skyed 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tsom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongasu dgrol ba'i
75a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ de dag blan mong pa'i byang chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams// skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman sA ru// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur
75b1(dkon brtsegs): dengs de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'thab bral ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thug su chud nas/ ngo che 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
75b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des// khyod kyi 'khor ni the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 
75b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur nas// 'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// dang bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di
75b4(dkon brtsegs): ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 2 gre ba 'di rnams bsdu bar mdzad skad du// sman pa'i gsung ni le gas par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag
75b5(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur na// skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar ga shegs pas lung bstan de thos na// mkhas pa rnams ni chu la bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi yingam pa smra ba'i mchog gis
75b6(dkon brtsegs): 'diramathe tsom 'chal ba'i nem nur legs par sol// 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdong // lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim gror gus papa blags ste// khyod kyis
75b7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten ngan pir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka'
75b8(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jig rten phan pir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur// sangs
76a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing // 'dod chags blo she sdang po ldan dang // tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsed pa'i blo can dang // gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas
76a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang // gang rnams snying rje tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong bar gyur te// mi'i seng
76a3(dkon brtsegs): ge snying rje skyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na// u dpal phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur// nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dgar gyur pa// sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon pas te// de dag sangs
76a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di// me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag/ lnga// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen pa kurabs shing chags pa spangs pa ste// sen mongs smad cing sangs
76a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas blo ldar gyur// snying rje ldan shing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgya la ba mi yi seng ge gang ga yi/ bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsre na bkur byas// byang chub bla na med par smon bad cing // dge ba mtha'
76a6(dkon brtsegs): yas 'ding ga / kun gyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur ba rnams la snying rje bskyed// de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la// chos tshul mtha' yas yongasu dris
76a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren 'gyur ba// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur// mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgyal chen chos kyang 'chang // rnam 'dren
76a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chang // de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs// cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong
76b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag ngal mchod pa rgya chen byas// bdag gi chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas
76b2(dkon brtsegs): skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag/ nyi shu nyi shus yongasu gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs 'gro// sems
76b3(dkon brtsegs): can bas ma yas yongasu sbreng bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams// rta thul gyis ni yongasu zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dag rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dgal
76b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgyad bcus// lA ma yi na rnams nas 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lnga'i bar dengag gi chong pa yang mdzab
76b5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam/ 'od te tshor ba 'am/ 
76b6(dkon brtsegs): 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed ngam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan sum nas/ de dag 'di sum du sems te/ gzugs
76b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
76b8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
77a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya// gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang
77a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa// byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub
77a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyi su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyi su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyi su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyi su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med
77a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmig su med pa/ byang chub tu dang dmig su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmig su med pa/ nga
77a5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang dmig su med pa na/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros ba med pa dang / gnyi su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dani/ gsu med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmig su med pa'i bar du mngon
77a6(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis
77a7(dkon brtsegs): stong tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong // sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i
77a8(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong // lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs shes bya ba dang / rnam par she
77b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar shes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par sen pa ma
77b2(dkon brtsegs): che'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi shig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing / rtse rtse ba las de nyal ba las sad na 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rje su dran na yang mi red cing de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir
77b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang / byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal
77b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bur nor pa ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar
77b5(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba yin na/ de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigasu
77b6(dkon brtsegs): med de/ so so'i skye ba yang dmig su med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmig su med/ nyan thos kyang dmig su med/ can thos kyi chos kyang dmig su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang mig
77b7(dkon brtsegs): su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmig su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmig su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmig su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmig su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
77b8(dkon brtsegs): dmig su med/ byang chub kyang dmigasu med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmig su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tsom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma mchi sa zhes
78a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la the tsom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thab bral gyi
78a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig
78a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa// de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas
78a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyeng gyur pas// mtshungs ba med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur// gzugs dang rab 'du shes ma mchis te// sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma
78a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa// chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags// mi yi seng ge phung po dpon la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa ma khas pa de dag gi/ byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis/ 
78a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing // byang chub sems dpa'ang de dag mi smod de// dga' dang zhum par 'gyur
78a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis par// bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod pa bgyid// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs// de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams// yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas
78a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas legs spyod cing // mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod// gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing // mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te// srid pa gsum la de dag yongs mi
78b1(dkon brtsegs): spod / ngos po stong bar smon lam dengs bgying // phung po 'dings ma skyes tshogs gyur cing // lung bstan pade gshegs cing kyang ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tsham
78b2(dkon brtsegs): del rmongs ma mchis// skye ba'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te// mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba// don khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab// gang zhig phung
78b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ma mchis shing // khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang // gang rnams byang chub 'tshal bzhi
78b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod bgyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na// de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi dka'// phung po skye mched dag dang khams
78b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang // byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras mi g.yo ba// gang gis 'a tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'a/ ji 'dzin pa lags// phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang / 
78b6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang // lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par// gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste// khams dang skye mched dag
78b7(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang // phung po spos 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang // skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang / 
78b8(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan smos pa med par gang spyod cing // de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yongs lags// 'dus byas
79a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang 'tshal ngag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal dang 'gro 'di di ltar yongs mthong shing // ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la// de ltar bgyis na
79a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag mchog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags// rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang byung ba// 
79a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chung nas 'dzum pa mdzad // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// 
79a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ 'dren pa'i rgyu yi stong sa ni gang zhig gis// stobs can brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol/ 
79a5(dkon brtsegs): nges ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur// shAkya thub pa zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dis mthong bcoma'i tshal gyur te// nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par/ 
79a6(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs
79a7(dkon brtsegs): zhal du lta// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya cher ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdong // de la
79a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // ci nas 'khor 'dirab tu dgar 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bar// ye shes stobs kyis the tsom gcad du gsol// mo yi khyum tshig lung
79b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan dus la bab// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom pasal dugasol// sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldar brdathul la tshigasu bcang
79b2(dkon brtsegs): de sngar bka' stsal pa/ rta rdul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na// de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen pas// 'jig rten pan bir 'dzum
79b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te// nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong // rgyal ba'i dgangs
79b4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos nyid bsres par 'gyur// gang la 'gro ba thams cadarmongs gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rto gas// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bas// bas pa pa
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis zhu ba legs par nus// de nyid du ni stong nyid leg/ sa par bsgoms// sngan chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrang cing // skyes bu mchog pa
79b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs pa thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod pas pas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas// 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhir lung bstan dang // gang
79b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chos yid 'di 'dra ba// de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes// lha rnams gang yang de la the tsom med // byang chub sems kyis
79b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag par de ltar spyod // de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na// de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang 'byung 'gyur// gnas
80a1(dkon brtsegs): bsang pa la nings gyur nas// g.yob ma ba pa ma du yang // 'gro bdun la sems pa yong ma nga// dpa rgyarnams thatsam mang meng // chos rnams can yang byas
80a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// de la'ang lnga rnams the tsom rnam par dag/ blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang
80a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas med de la rab gnas te// de byir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'// rang byu nying ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pas skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'dren par 'gyur
80a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni// rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o// ji ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// bsam pa mkhyen de 'gro la bstan mdzad pa// de thos nas ni
80a5(dkon brtsegs): lhar bcas 'jig rten yang // yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par 'gyur// dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le ru ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas de'i cha rab 'phrul
80a6(dkon brtsegs): la stsogs pa/ 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun nus lha ma yin rnams nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs
80a7(dkon brtsegs): te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing // de bzhin nyid la the tsom med par gyur nas/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo khos phyag 'tshal nas
80a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ ches thams cad ni yang
80b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
80b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slad yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// / 
80b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad du/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i
80b4(dkon brtsegs): slang mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang ga pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang
80b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom lda na 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par
80b6(dkon brtsegs): rig par bgyi'o// tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chubo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ 
80b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i sna nga mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhir ma mchi ba ste// mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhi no// de ci'i slang
80b8(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de la ba'i no// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal
81a1(dkon brtsegs): bde dag rig rang bar 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ ngo ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang bcal bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i mtha' lan
81a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang mar chis na/ de ma ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyi sum mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cags pa
81a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis the chem mo mchis// bac+doMs gang la la zhig chos 'di nem nur dang the tsom ma mchis na/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang ngag
81a4(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'chal bar bgyi ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i cha lnga'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la stsogs pa 'phrul dga' ris kyi lnga bye phrag 'dud pas
81a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzango // de nas tshe dang ldan paHthul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang de gsel ba 'jig
81a6(dkon brtsegs): chen ngan par gsheng ngas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'jun pa'i rgyun khyod kyis ma bstan te// rang byung skyes bungam pa gang dag kyang // rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas// khyed kyi gal nas 'jam pa de mdzad pa/ mdza
81a7(dkon brtsegs): ras lngar bcas 'jig rten po tsam 'chal// 'dzum pa'i rgyung gang lags rang byung gsungs// the tsom 'chal ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de zos gyur na// 'khor 'di thams
81a8(dkon brtsegs): cang ngo mchar thod par 'gyur// byang chub mchog ni yongasu bsgrubs spa du// de dag la ma mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur// be tsom 'tshal ba dag na nam du yang // byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grubs/ 
81b1(dkon brtsegs): thetsom som gyibs la ras mkhas pa rnams// byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur// rkang gnyis dbang po khyad kyi 'khor 'di dag/ sdig pa yongs spangs byang chub sems dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan de ngag
81b2(dkon brtsegs): zas gyur na// rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de bas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // the tsom 'chal ba rnams lathugs brtsebs// lho tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bsngar cing // 'gro
81b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcang sngar bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul khod kyis nu ba de nus pa/ 
81b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par// bstan par ngas byas dang bar kun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lnga chags 'di rnams kyis// thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstar te// mu sdug
81b5(dkon brtsegs): kyai bsar pa zil ma ran nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i ngar chen po bsgrags// gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la ltung ba ltar// de la the tsom za bar mi 'gyur te// de ltar the tsom med pa'i tshul theb pa
81b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag cing ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyim nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i che/ mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po chul thob pa// bdag cag cing ri stobs bcu
81b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar shes// skar tshegs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs pa 'di la the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob pa// bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar/ 
81b8(dkon brtsegs): sim nub par gyur pa'i cha// sim mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes// chu klung ji ltar gsol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing / 
82a1(dkon brtsegs): / rgya mche 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// byang chub rgya chen theb par 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar gnam pyong ba 'bangs pa ni// sa la ltung ba
82a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur du the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug/ gang thos nas ni the tsom med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la/ 
82a3(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag/ sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur smras byas kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos cing rab mthong ba
82a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub las ni bzlogs mi nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan brjod byed dang // de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la
82a5(dkon brtsegs): yi nga mdzad// de ltar lnga tshogs 'di ngag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing // de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sprul// 'jig rternam khas brje su yi rang mdzad/ 
82a6(dkon brtsegs): mthul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug par rab mthong
82a7(dkon brtsegs): shing mkhas pa gang dag dge ba shes bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyod// sha khrag lpags la mi lnga
82a8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de ltar min// 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang // da ltar dus na 'dren pa
82b1(dkon brtsegs): gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab 'phrul lnga tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag ngal mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas/ tshul gyis
82b2(dkon brtsegs): su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spod yul po// tshul thob rnams kyis sngon bsten myur du 'theb/ 
82b3(dkon brtsegs): de la rnga thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med // sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnam brtse ba// tshul shreb dag ston pa'i lam la ston// de ltas tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te/ 
82b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge ba shes ma khas pa bsten byas na// bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni// 'khor kun
82b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i byang chub ying rangs te// rje su yi rang the tsom med gyur nas/ mthar rin blo gros la ni zhugs par 'gyur// 'phrul dag sa lu nga bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwo brgyang pa'o// 'phags
82b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po bdun pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la stsogs pa/ gzhar 'phrul dbang bang ris kyi lnga
82b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brag brgyad cus/ lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yang rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / 
82b8(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phrul ngaga'i lha rnams kyis// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la// bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa yang ma dmig
83a1(dkon brtsegs): nang de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni mtha' yang nges dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni gnyis kyis spyod
83a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyi su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ chos rnams ni
83a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyi su me do zhes mi spyod ma mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du semasu lags kyang / de ni lam leg par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// de ci'i
83a4(dkon brtsegs): slang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te// bcom ldan 'das gang mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchiso// 
83a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo ci'i slang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs bar gyur na/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyabar nuso// bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags// ma 'ongs pam
83a6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yong su shes par 'gyi
83a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags la/ chos gang yang
83a8(dkon brtsegs): chos de'i gnyen po ma lag so// de ci'i slang zhe na/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyi
83b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmig so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes
83b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ban lags/ yong su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan
83b3(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang
83b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang la gso ba de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan
83b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma bas
83b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba 'am/ skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba 'am/ 'das pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ de ltar byung
83b7(dkon brtsegs): bas bzung ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags yengasu shes pa
83b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar dgyibs lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de dag
84a1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa shes bgyi'o// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de lta bur lung bstan pas/ de'i
84a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mthar 'byin legs par gsungs// 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma rnyes na// skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis/ 
84a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod par rab tu zhugs// phung po rnams ni kun du mi dmigs te// bung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gang gi gnyen por gyur pa ni// mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchiso// 
84a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang // yongs shes pa dang spang bsgo mas mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te// dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung // byang chub gang
84a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no// sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mkhas
84a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub 'tshang rgya sems bskyed kyang // mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul log pa ste// blo gros ngan pa byang chub lam mi spyod// mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ 
84a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas// mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te// stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod// de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob
84a8(dkon brtsegs): bas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min// gnas desan thos rnams kyis bgrod bya min// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang jom
84b1(dkon brtsegs): dang // de bzhin rang rgyal skyob par gyur pa dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la sbed yul med// go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang // yi tshe'i stong pa nyid la bsgom pa dang // gang rnams spong pas steng zhes steng smra dang // ches kun
84b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus// sangs rgyas ma smang rnams kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs// ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags
84b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na// bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des// 'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing // mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
84b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang bad ris kyi lnga bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bas ma thugasu chud nas/ skye bo pal be che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
84b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir// de'i cha 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcing gsol pa// gaHna 'phrul dbang byed lnga'i bsam mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis ba
84b6(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod kyis mdzum mdzad la// thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na// rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces// rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsungs/ 
84b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ngor snang 'dzum pa mdzad ba'i rgyu// 'dren pa bka' stsol the tsom bsal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas// thung chen khyod kyi 'khor rnams the tsom 'tshal// go'u ta ma rgyal ba
84b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas de dag la// 'jig rten sman slang 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdong // 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan tha
85a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam 'tshal// don yod grags mnga' som nyibasal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis te// byir zhing dang bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de// the tsom mi 'tshal
85a2(dkon brtsegs): sems ni grol 'gyur bar// rgyal bas skye bo'i the tsom legs par khums/ bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing // gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa// lam de nas ni the tsom ma mchis
85a3(dkon brtsegs): mchi// bde bas skye bo'i the tsom gcad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcang slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas// tshigasu bcad dus su
85a4(dkon brtsegs): gang smras shing // 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa// khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dri ba de'i don dris pas// skye bo'i tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur// khyod kyis de dris
85a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo tshogs chen dang/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rtathul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan
85a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam de nas// don du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong // gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong // byis pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjesu
85a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'dod pas bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes spangs phyir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jigs gyur zhing // mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong // mtshan ma med
85a8(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin// mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// zhi ba dag ni grags/ 
85b1(dkon brtsegs): ldanangs pa 'theb// 'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis// sdig pa brgyad dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro bkun tu sdug bsngal mi drung myong // nga lngar mi mkhas mtshanam ba ga pa byas/ @
85b2(dkon brtsegs): mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang // sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na// byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la 'on mongs
85b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phel// mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor ba spong // mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de// kun tu sbyor ba de cing mtshan med yin// gang rnams byang chub 'thob par bya rtog pa// rtag pa de nyid mi mkhas par
85b4(dkon brtsegs): chang yin// mkhas pa'i long spring rnam pa thob byed na// long spyod ngo zhing mtshan ma med par 'gyur// chos rnams gang yang rang ba zhon nyid kyis med// rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong
85b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub ga zhan du mkhas mi smra// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas// mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tsam bsal/ 
85b6(dkon brtsegs): dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs shes 'dzin// 'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal
85b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas tshangs kyi lnga bye ba phrag
85b8(dkon brtsegs): drug cus lnga ma yin rnams nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa de yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid
86a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongasu dag pa'i phyir// 'jig rten pa'i bsam gang ra la mi 'dod
86a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin// ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar
86a3(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gags pa yang ma yin/ 
86a4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa yang ma yin// gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas ba yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjesu chags pa yang ma yin/ nga
86a5(dkon brtsegs): khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma
86a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs
86a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ song ba yang ma yin/ 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi snang ba yang ma yin/ mtshan ma
86a8(dkon brtsegs): yong ba yang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yong mi gnas pa'i yid
86b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis de dag ming la ya yi gnas/ tha snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes
86b2(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ se so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes
86b3(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'ang shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'ang shes
86b4(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/ na thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs
86b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa 'ichos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
86b6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs
86b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'ang shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 
86b8(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo cam
87a1(dkon brtsegs): namakha' bzhin du dag cing gosang med par gyur nas/ nga rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe de dag ni bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad padag gis mngon par bsteng ba/ 
87a2(dkon brtsegs): ni la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon// zhi bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjesu spen// zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub ni la dri bral 'khrags ma mchis// khyed kyis 'chi med zhi ba
87a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams shi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad sten// sngon gyi rgyal bas
87a4(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de bsten sa ngas rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes ga/ sung // 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa
87a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan// gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob// bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang be zhi ba dag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba 'i byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par
87a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog ni ba 'gro bzhi bgying gang dag gis// 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rdzogs gyur pa// de dag 'drer ba tshul la mkhas pa mchong ba mchel gis mched par
87a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// nyon mongs ni zhing mtshan ma kun spangs ni brtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de cing mya ngan las 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las ni 'dod sems pa de dag len
87a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chung dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de ni bdag cag ngogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po dor te byang chub ni tshol de la zhi bar
87b1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi mtshan ma sbed yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsum
87b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pas ni dang mtshan ma'i 'tshang ba shi ba 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rung // de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes bed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag
87b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub skyen bral ni ba mkhas pa'i sbed yul theb par 'gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob// rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// 
87b4(dkon brtsegs): chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cang mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas
87b5(dkon brtsegs): mched pa'i rang 'byung sdig med sheg/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsted par rig nas/ bdag cid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig
87b6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chang la stong 'dra zhing // ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul bar mkhyen// rgyal bas
87b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas// kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa// de la bkres med zas med sems can med// rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs
87b8(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na// chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang // ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la byed med tsher med sems
88a1(dkon brtsegs): can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de med ces// 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tsom yong mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na// dga' bar 'gyur yang
88a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid med cing dga'ar 'gyur dngos kyang med// de mkhyen de la the tsom yong mi mnga'// bi wang sgra brnyan mnyan na rnar sman te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min// de ltar mkhas pas phung ba
88a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa// gos kyi drung gzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i
88a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pas de ltar gyur// tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang / rkyen dang sbyar na dri nim bzhin du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs ngag chos rnams kyang // so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin ji
88a5(dkon brtsegs): lngar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'jig las byung zhes brtag byas kya nga // rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos te de mi dmigs// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig gsod pa'i la
88a6(dkon brtsegs): zas la// yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na// dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig na mkha'i 'ja' mthong na// yan lag bzhigs
88a7(dkon brtsegs): rtags rang bzhin med cing stong // na mkha'i 'ja bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong // drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na// grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin
88a8(dkon brtsegs): ming mi dmigs// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus dga' bar rnga zhig brdung bgyis na// dga' ba skyes kyang sgra'i de bzhin stong // 
88b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar smra bzhin de ltar yan lag steng // mi dbang khyed kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rngang brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra ni phyogasu mi 'gre 'byung ba med// phyogs de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ 
88b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rngang brdungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med cing sman pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyis yan lag rnga sbra de dang 'dra// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin ches kun
88b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rjed de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de 'jig rten dgar byar rtog pa med// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag steng // mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de lta gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rngang brdung ba
88b4(dkon brtsegs): chegayo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rngang brdung ba'i tshe// sgrang yan lag ma byung rang dbang mim
88b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de ni na chos kun gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang // mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de
88b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud cing // zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa de ltar bstod pas// 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags par gyur gzigs nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
88b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bar dang gsol ba/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas// lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/ 
88b8(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tsom 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la lnga zhing thos par dga' ste sdong // rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tsom dgum du
89a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol// rnam par 'dren thung mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dre ra ngab rnams// rgyu ram mchis par 'jig rten don byeng 'dzum 'ja ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyed kyis gang sdang 'jum mdzad
89a2(dkon brtsegs): the tsong rgyu de gsungs/ rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di the tsom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tsom gcod pa can
89a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chal na// rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyud de dag rnams la gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tsom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di sring po ldan cing rlog med sangs rgyas yon ngan 'tshal/ 
89a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dral lnga// 'dren pa chag sa med rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya 'dra ba'i gsungs bsgrags gso la// de thos 'khor rnams the tsom chad cing ches la gnas par 'gyur
89a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas// skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pa satshim// de dag ngogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad
89a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen du sgrub// brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid// de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi
89a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen tu sems 'gyur bar// stobs bsku mngarab 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rdul
89a8(dkon brtsegs): la tshigasu bcang sngar bka' stsal pa// rta thul nga yis phan byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byas// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bstsags
89b1(dkon brtsegs): dmyur du 'jig rten den bang ba// phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' bstsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tsom med// bskal pa khrag khrig gang+gA' ba ma seng
89b2(dkon brtsegs): du dag pa legs par spyad// kun tu rnam pa dag la ma chags ying gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed// 'di dag ma 'ongs dusar bskal pa bya
89b3(dkon brtsegs): ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa// gang+gA'i byam sbeng na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag byin nas bde bar gshegs pa che ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba// srid pa sel cing 'gro ba snang bar ster pa'i
89b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'gyur// skyob pa de dag ji ltar spod pa sku tshe'i cha dkyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha' yas grag das ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur
89b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas ning gi 'byor pa gzhal yos te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du ma rin sangs rgyas mtha' yis rnams kyis gsungs kyang de ngag bkod pa
89b6(dkon brtsegs): zang mi nus/ de tshe de dag ye shes sdebs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar 'thun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro ba ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog rnamasu skyong pa'i thams cad
89b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhan lam spangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'// de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs
89b8(dkon brtsegs): ba sems can yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing slob pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de na mi rnams
90a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stong cing mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das da
90a2(dkon brtsegs): chub gi// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rnams la gnas par 'gyur// sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol nas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yid mi 'gyur// 
90a3(dkon brtsegs): bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams na med// de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra ga/ gra 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya nga na 'das 'gror 'gyur// de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga'
90a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas// drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bstsags te// zhing mchog den
90a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur
90a7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyas pa thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston// de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spong ba bsten par
90a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas 'od gsal gyi lnga bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong
90b1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstar pa yang thos nas tshim ming mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la bcugs
90b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas/ 
90b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting 'dzin chos snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyi do// de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa
90b4(dkon brtsegs): dang thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang
90b5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mongs ma yin ba'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob
90b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyuraro// chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par
90b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa yongasu chad pa'o// gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang
90b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchi so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i sla ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa des ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad du
91a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spongs pa rab tu thob cing / de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas/ spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/ kun
91a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongasu ma grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa mi g.yo ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam
91a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrub pa/ yong su thub pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par
91a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam po ram shes pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/ 'ongs pa ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lag
91a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags pa ma mchis ba'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha smad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis
91a6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyi su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ brdzun ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ sho be ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ sbyangs pa ma
91a7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ spang bar 'os pa ma lags/ gang gsu ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/ ma bzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtang du ma mchis pa/ yongasu
91a8(dkon brtsegs): gtang du ma mchis pa/ ma gtang ba yongasu ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/ chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lag so// a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lagaso/ 
91b1(dkon brtsegs): a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lag so// a ni ma 'gags pa ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lag so// a ni ma 'gags pa yang ma lags pa ste/ ches
91b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ma lag so// a ni gnas pa'ang ma lags/ mi gnas pa'ang ma lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spangs pa yang
91b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ ma spangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags
91b4(dkon brtsegs): mi stong pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigasu mchis pa yang ma la gas/ dmig su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshanam yang ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ 
91b5(dkon brtsegs): a ni smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma la gas te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan cing ni a'i chu lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig
91b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste a'i tshu lo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa ste/ a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste/ as gdags
91b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// chos thams cad ni tha spang gcig pa ste/ a'i tha spang // chos thams cad ni brjod pa ste as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis
91b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// 
92a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dum bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i
92a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi chu lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyang ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam nab pasna chags 'byung ba
92a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad ce na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gang gos par gsungs/ 
92a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ brag cal tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar
92a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
92a6(dkon brtsegs): na smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzug
92a7(dkon brtsegs): sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i sladu rmi lam gyi bya ba snang bgyi yi// rmi lam
92a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i sla du mig yor dang // smig rgyu dang / brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang tha spang du bgyi ste/ brag cal bya bam mchi so// bac+doMs
92b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bdag cag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol nas/ 'od gsal gyi lnga rnams kyis
92b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs// thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam
92b3(dkon brtsegs): par rol pa'ang de bzhi no// de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lnga pa rnams kyis khong mi chung / bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsag dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis
92b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chab kyi 'ang shes can// byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'a tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos po rjeran kyang 'cha'// de bzhin
92b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal/ 2khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das// gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal
92b6(dkon brtsegs): myong ba de la dngos ma mchis// blo stor ying nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la// nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjesu 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod chags zhe snga
92b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjesu 'brang // blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer// rings
92b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar pa bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag stan ngag bden pa nyid kyis 'jigs// bde gshegs khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan// 
93a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang dab blo canas las shing skye bzhin du bskyed cing // bdud rnams byed dbang dang bcas btul byang chub 'i ba mngon 'tshang rgya// yan lag brgyad pa'i grubacas skye bo
93a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa nges// myur du nyon mongs drug gsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba 'thob gyur cing // grol nas drug
93a3(dkon brtsegs): med gyur pa skye bo gzhan thong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas/ pha rol myur phyin dug red 'gyur ba skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas// pha rol myur phyir dug meng bde zhing bdag pa thams cad 'jom par
93a4(dkon brtsegs): radzad// bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul mi rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang ras mkhas pa tshul ngang tshul min bslangs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags
93a5(dkon brtsegs): med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyis chos// de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkha sa pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcing sa pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med// 
93a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhir nying dang par rang bzhin cing zhi mi dga' bon mi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing ni byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang meng // gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur
93a7(dkon brtsegs): grol zhing grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can ni mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnan bdag dang gzhan med
93a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal de ni sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang na// lam dang 'bras bu med cing de myang gang gyur de yang med// bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni bdag
93b1(dkon brtsegs): cag 'tshal// des mang ltar bde gshegs 'i thugs dang nga po'ong nges pa ste// dge ba'i blo ma pa dag gcang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par gyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gca bo bstong pas bas nams yang
93b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba// ji srid dpal stag rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongasu mkhyen gyur pa'i// bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog/ bsong nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi ngan pa sde kun kyang rgyal
93b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'ang gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yengasu dag pa dang / tshul gyi rjes 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thug su chung la// 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par
93b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar mkhyen nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan brda thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rjer ngon mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams
93b5(dkon brtsegs): cang zil gnan pa// bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma ma chis par gzhang ba mi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal stug rkang ga/ nyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/ 
93b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das khyed ni slang 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par
93b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyams thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad ldan bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho'ang nas sgrol bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po'i gsung mtshag
93b8(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di bas na// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas tshad 'tshal dge ba brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tsom bral gyur rnam ngag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag pa'i stobs bskyed cing // ba
94a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgying khyang dang mthur blang srasu 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren pa khyed kyi zhal du lta// 'gro ba'i rtsa la garteg
94a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyed kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal
94a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma la bu lnga bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lnga// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol banang ba'i
94a4(dkon brtsegs): den kyang bstan tu gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jigarten don chen shin tu theb par 'gyur// thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel zhing grags pa don tu gnyer// su zhig 'dren pa'o/ 
94a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gter ba rnyes 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal// rgya la ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shi nga dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan
94a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la yang bsgom par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs// 
94a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing // spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan
94a8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis// 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blog/ sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 'jig rten mgon med yong can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs// byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spang
94b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa// byang chub 'gro 'dong gang che sten med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam pa shin tu bsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di bos na// sangs rgyas yon tan ngor g.yer hA spangs dngag byang chub zhi 'thob
94b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de dag stobs bskyed tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing bang chub yid nges gyur// bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab// 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod
94b3(dkon brtsegs): la tshul gyi sgo bstan te// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan pas nas// sems can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang bdag byang chub dga' bas ste// de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang
94b4(dkon brtsegs): byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag shing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya grangs par// yangs shing shin tu dag pa mtha 'dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ kun gyi zhing du ngan seng rnams
94b5(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thug sa brtses sems can thams cad rang 'byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang la'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur
94b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rang 'byung nyid du mngon pogs 'phrogs pa med par 'gyur// de na rang 'byung sangs rgyas cing sngon mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gang+gA'i
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bye snyed 'gyur// rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas// gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig gis// byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams de la snga mas grangs
