94b8(dkon brtsegs): sam dper yang bya bar mi nuso// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyeng snga min// de ni u dam pa ra'i me tog 'ang
95a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga'as gsungs// de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bang byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo pra sngan bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'drer la bstan par bya
95a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad yid rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur// khrag khrig lha rnams na mkha' ra 'khod
95a3(dkon brtsegs): nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshalo zhes sgra yang phyung // zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzad// bdud rtsi ston cing
95a4(dkon brtsegs): dug gsum ni mdzad sems can dug ni skyub tu stsol// khyod kyi ye shes thob nas skye dgu drugu med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi bzong sring ba'i
95a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyud las 'grol// 'od gsal ba lung bsten pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mtsho ga brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya
95a6(dkon brtsegs): ba// bar po brgyad pa// / de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis// lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // 
95a7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di
95a8(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin mchis te// ting 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i
95b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tsher rab sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la// sdug bsngal yang ma lags// bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas
95b2(dkon brtsegs): gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi yi gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcad ngam/ rkang lag bcang dam/ 
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rna ba 'am/ sA 'am/ rna ba dang sA gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / spa lcag gis gzhus sam/ spa lcug phye tshal lam/ lcag gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes can nye bar gnas
95b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgog tu bcug gam/ btson cha dam po la rgyas btab bam/ byis pa'i gtsug bud ltar bcings sam/ dgas kyi snong ltar
95b5(dkon brtsegs): gdugs sam/ bu ram shing gi brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gzhom pa ltar bcom 'am/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'ab ra bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar me dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar
95b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byas kyi bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam/ byi bo'i chang pa lta bus bcad
95b7(dkon brtsegs): ngam/ ces pa byung ba bsgrags pa lngar bsgrags sam/ kar sha pa na tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye bcos pa ltar btsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis btsam yang / bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par
95b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ gsang pa'i gnasu khrid de rnam pa thams cad mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes che bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang ma lags/ mi
96a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung // de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spang ba spang ba'i tshe/ sme
96a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bdang ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag le bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang gis bdag la skom byung ba de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur nga ste byas pa dang / bcwa
96a3(dkon brtsegs): spang byas pa dang / mched pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar shi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang mi bde bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams
96a4(dkon brtsegs): cad srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon
96a5(dkon brtsegs): lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing / de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la sten cing
96a6(dkon brtsegs): spen la sgom zhing mang du byed de/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i tinge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro
96a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ ngo'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam
96a8(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bya'o// de 'tshal na rjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis
96b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gan so// de ci'i slad she na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg blo la yang dag par zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongasu 'dzin pa dang / ngan
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro thams cad rab tu gsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug pa kun tu skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / thabs mabs pa dang ldan pa dang // bdud
96b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chung bar rig par bgyi ba'i slang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyu
96b4(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas da ge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting 'dzin 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bsted pa/ 
96b5(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyas lnga tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar hUM gagyur pa ste// ston pa dbang chos zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgon sa skyab su mchis// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas
96b6(dkon brtsegs): dor mkhyekhan 'khor ba rgal gyur pa// thub pa mi'i 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// 'di la rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te// ska ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma
96b7(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin khyed kyis thab pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin yegashegs drang srong khyod kyis lha mir btsos pa'i 'jig rten
96b8(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// 'di na sems can sreg dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis ste// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam bzhag la// rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso
97a1(dkon brtsegs): bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes
97a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas bka' stsal la// sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tsom bral thugs ldan// des na bde gshegs
97a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang // lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la
97a4(dkon brtsegs): sring rje bgyi ba gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba 'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod
97a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can dang ni bsal gyis sdug bsngal ma gzigs/ la// dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par gsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam
97a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs// 'on kyang
97a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod
97a8(dkon brtsegs): 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyi su med par bstan// gang zhig der dul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag med
97b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang ma gzigs pag yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyis// thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad nam brjes kyang // de ltar 'dre ba dran pa
97b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gsungs ma lags baspel ba yong mi mngar// bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i bsgom par gyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas ngang bar gshegs pa slob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pa
97b3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la// tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongasu btsal nas ma brnyes ste// de ltar gang zhig dran bsgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs// sangs
97b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyi sa// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed la// gang gi nye bar gzhag pa de yang dran pa med pa rab
97b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen kyang // thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa bsgo ma bar gyis shes gsungs// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni sngon la mchod bgyis// 'jig rten par bar
97b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang smod de ma gzigs// bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs// / 
97b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gi gnasu mchod pa'i dran pa de'ang gang na
97b8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis te// de bas gang gi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang nga ma mchis// ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas nges na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sten pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'ang
98a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na// 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min// bcom
98a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar mdzad slad bcom ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phral rkang pa gsungs// 'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dal zhing mya ngan 'da'
98a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// yang dag dun rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa bsgom pa mi dmigs te// chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs pa// thams cad mkhyen gyis bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tsam gang
98a4(dkon brtsegs): na'ang ma mchis te// de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis gyur// 'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mcho nga 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// des na bde gshegs dpe
98a5(dkon brtsegs): med spong mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar bar ma// dzad smad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang / gsungs// rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro yi lam
98a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bsgoms shes bstan// thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa dang po thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di la lha 'khor the tsom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i
98a7(dkon brtsegs): drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zang bgyid thar bar bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang
98a8(dkon brtsegs): the tsom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod// byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba
98b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyi'i phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la
98b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin pa sgoms shes gsungs// mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis
98b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas mchod 'os khong la mchod// 'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan// 
98b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis thub pa mchod smad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal zhi ba phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong
98b5(dkon brtsegs): lam yang sgoms shes gsungs// bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi// thub pa zhig nas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad steng pa ste// 'di la lnga
98b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gang du'ang the tsom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu'i las lam bstan mdzad// gsod dang 'khrig dang ma bin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal
98b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / gnod sems dang ni mi dmigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams// mi dge ba'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan// sems can mi dmigs
98b8(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis steng // rnam 'dren the tsam som
99a1(dkon brtsegs): sem mchis sdang khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dge pa'i blo can gang zhig spong ba 'di sten pa/ mkhas pa kun tu dge bcid myeng sdug bsngal myong bar yang
99a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// bcom ldan pade gshegs ye shes nges ni tshal 'di bde bar thob par bgyis// 'di la lnga tshogs the tsom ma mchis mtshang 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis bca
99a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par bsteng nas cang mi zer bar 'khong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cad mi zer bar 'khong pa yang mkhyen// de dag gi ldag pa'i bsam pas bslabs pa ya
99a4(dkon brtsegs): thugasu chung nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdza // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang gso lab// skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis
99a5(dkon brtsegs): zil mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan// rgyu ma mchis pa ra chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu
99a6(dkon brtsegs): don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas bka' stsal gsol// ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal stag khong la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par
99a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/ sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs 'gyur te// chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i sten par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog
99a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de ring gang gis 'chi meng zhi brtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtsa thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dngag tu med 'gyur
99b1(dkon brtsegs): / de dag bka' spel drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig mchod la yang
99b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag yongasu gnas// sangs rgyas sras pa tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'od the tsom ma mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang
99b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing // byang chub mthar phyin blo gros bstan cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas// gang la 'dzum deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin de gang lags
99b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tsom khram// 'dren pa khyod gsungs yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na// bde gsheg
99b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid de myur du ba gshegs rnams
99b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad slar bka' stsal pa/ nga yis 'jig rten ngon byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes
99b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don pas khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zang mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bsnan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lnga
99b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos cid la ni the tsom med// kun kyang yid rangs rab ni yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis ngal bsngags// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod pas
100a1(dkon brtsegs): ma the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som yi med par gyur// de ltar sngon gyi rgyu nges 'dzir yang tshig su bcad pas ngal stong // bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba
100a2(dkon brtsegs): bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag ston par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal pa ud pa la la rgyal ba dag rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs
100a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi rtog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang
100a4(dkon brtsegs): ri drag khrig bsam yas mya ngaran zla bar 'gyur// de'i tshe nang de gshegs kun gyi ring srel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te// de tshe ni dang rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur// 
100a5(dkon brtsegs): thab pa grags chen de dag yongs mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na/ thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams de tshe ring
100a6(dkon brtsegs): bsrel mtshang byas te// ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med 'thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de
100a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du// ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su// byams pa brda phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba// de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos sdong tshogs ngengs
100a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ras rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong // bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing // dge rgyas ris kyi lnga yi bdag
100b1(dkon brtsegs): ming cher po de tshe zhes gyur na// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed// bdag cid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mag pas rab tu btugs// ngag rgyas ris lung bstan
100b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas de'i 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lnga'i bar ngag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang
100b3(dkon brtsegs): zos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang 'bade ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sde mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul
100b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i slebs pa dang / mi chong pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spongs pa dang / nye ba'i slengs par
100b5(dkon brtsegs): phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyis bas pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spob sa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas// bcom ldan 'das la dpa'
100b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ chos nyid brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel te// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na/ bang chub sems
100b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdebs pa 'thad cing / mi chong pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur// de la dmigs
100b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yang gzungs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur// khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la
101a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / ngas
101a2(dkon brtsegs): be la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa
101a3(dkon brtsegs): ngang mtshan ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'das
101a4(dkon brtsegs): ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs tho rab par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spong ngas pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di ltas
101a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'dzin yongasu ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu 'thobo// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yang yongasu du ba ba ma mchis te// sa ni sar yongasu ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang / 
101a6(dkon brtsegs): me dang / rlung ni rlung du yongasu ma gru'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// chu dang me dang rlung ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la ra
101a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongasu grub pa'o// de ltar yongasu ma grub pa'i gzungs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i snga
101a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang la ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa de ni
101b1(dkon brtsegs): bangag su ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes dka' stsal te/ gzu
101b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin ni dmigasu ma mchis na/ 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par yang lta ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni gdagasu ma mchis pa'o// tsher ba dang / 
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad phung po rnams ni dmigasu ma mchi so// phung po dmigasu ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug
101b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdag sa pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 
101b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ 'ju ga pa yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmig so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i
101b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ste/ chos gang yang ma bgyis pa de la spang bayang ba la mchis te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang khangs bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung 'al
101b7(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / ba gam dang / drang dang / sngags bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / rnga babs dang / ra ba dang / shing rtags dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po stsogs pa la grong khyer shes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba la
101b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spang ba lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
102a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigasu ma mchis na/ de la spang ba lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad nga shes pa yang ma tshachis rnang ge pa'i phung po
102a2(dkon brtsegs): rachi so// de ltar bung ba la yang 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur// gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyuraro// de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ 
102a3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i skye mched ces bgyis na/ sdug bsngal gyi skye mche // de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o// de la sa'i
102a4(dkon brtsegs): khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhi na mi dmigs pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i kham sa dang ba dang / me'i khams ngang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yod su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongasu ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags ma 'ongs pa dang / 
102a6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la
102a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ma mchis pa ste/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdag su ma mchis pa'o// de ltar na mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang / sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma
102a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdag su ma mchis pa ste/ ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ chos
102b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la mig ces 'am/ skye mched ce'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigasu ma mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod ma mchi so// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / 
102b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'gro'o// de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs theb pa ni/ mig na
102b3(dkon brtsegs): mig gis ma mchis/ khams ni khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i sla du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma
102b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma ma chis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// gang yongasu ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchi so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gab pa
102b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha smad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par/ 'das pa shes gdags par brtso
102b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// ming de yang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ ches gang la rang bzhin ma mchis
102b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ri yongasu ma grub pa ste/ yongasu ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchi so// gang ma
102b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das shes gangags par bgyib ma legs/ ma 'ongs pa dang nga ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du gangags par bgyi ba ma lags pa ngo ming
103a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa mtshan ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha spang ma mchis pa/ brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa brjod ma mchis pa
103a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongasu shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ dkar pa ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas ma
103a3(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon tu gyis pa ma lags pa/ sa so'i skye bo'i sam lagra
103a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ nyan thos kyis ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma la gas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgya sa kyi sa ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags/ sam 'gas pa
103a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lag so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin cid dang / zhi ba dang mtshan ying ma mchis pa ste tha smad tsam du gtags pa'o// des tha skad
103a6(dkon brtsegs): du bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos mi dmigs// de bzhi nang gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes
103a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
103a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang / chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang / chos kyi dbyings cid
103b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang de dang nges chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'ang ngo ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams ni ming gang gis tha slad du bgyis kyang / de dang nges sa'i
103b2(dkon brtsegs): khams nyid mi 'di re// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang / ming gang dang gang gis tha snya du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i khams
103b3(dkon brtsegs): dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam pa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha sAdu bgyi ba de dang nges chu dang me dang rlung dang / namakha'i khams cing mi 'ang ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings
103b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha srang du bgyi ba de dang nges chos kyi dbying sa nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob// gzungs la 'jug pas slebs pa 'thob po/ bcom ldan 'das de
103b5(dkon brtsegs): la dbang po la 'dzag pas/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni nga dpe yi shu gnyis te/ 'di lta ste mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sA'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po
103b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pe'i dbang po dang / sreg gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyems kyi
103b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / ngang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / tingange 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang
103b8(dkon brtsegs): ma shes pa'i dbang ba dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis// dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad tsa ma/ mig ni mig gi 'ang bzhin dang bral ba ste
104a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ dngas pa ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// gang yongasu ma gAHde ni mi skye ba/ gang mi sring de ni mi 'gag
104a2(dkon brtsegs): pagang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi bam lag so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags
104a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ma lag so// gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chang ba steng ba ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du
104a4(dkon brtsegs): gdags par bas kyi don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs/ chad pa yang mi dmigaso// de bzhin du mig dang / dbang po yang chang pa stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la yang dag pa ma lags pa
104a5(dkon brtsegs): sde gseb gsog/ log pa smra ba'i chos can byis pa 'dring ba glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi der dam pa ri mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po yang mi dmig
104a6(dkon brtsegs): nade ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/ ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzung ba'i sla dbang po zhes btags kyi don dam par ni ma lag so// 
104a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la/ des tha snyad bgyi ba ni brdzun pa/ ma mchis/ gsob gsog/ log pa/ sla ba'i chos can/ byis pa
104a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dring ba/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni mi skye mi 'gag go// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba zhes
104b1(dkon brtsegs): gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ gangagasu ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ 
104b2(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ rnam par shes pa bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 
104b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rtog pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyeng ga rnyed par bgyi ba ma lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ ma mchis
104b4(dkon brtsegs): shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slanga'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / ngag 'amagur spang ba dag nyal zhal ba las sad de/ rje su dran la de dran
104b5(dkon brtsegs): yang rnyeng par mi 'gyur 'thob par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad zhe na/ rmi lam na yang mi nges dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag mthong ma rnyed na/ 6
104b6(dkon brtsegs): ba las sang pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang / rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga'
104b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spong ba de dag dmigasu ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmig su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma
104b8(dkon brtsegs): lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du dmigasu ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin
105a1(dkon brtsegs): du rig par bgyi'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyi'o// 
105a2(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
105a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan yid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis/ som yi ma mchi so// 
105a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad sdug pa sngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchi so// bac+doMs
105a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i sladu/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma ma chis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i slanga'o// bcom ldan 'das kun
105a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang ba ma mchis pa'i slanga'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad lam
105a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs snga
105a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa dmigasu ma mchis na/ lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ 
105b1(dkon brtsegs): gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad bgyi ba ma mchi so// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad bgyi ba ma mchi so// gang dus gsum
105b2(dkon brtsegs): du mi dmigs pa de ni/ ma skyes ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 
105b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ shes
105b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khong du chud pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob
105b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma la gas pa/ ma mthong ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgra bas po/ bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma
105b6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ongs po ma lags pa/ gsol ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 
105b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ ngang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/ rjesu chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ 
105b8(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol pa ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags
106a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ 
106a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma
106a3(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma
106a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags/ smon pa ma ma chis pa ma lags/ gnas ma lags/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ 
106a5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lag sa pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par
106a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten pa ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags pa mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongasu shes par
106a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma
106a8(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spong yul ma lags pa/ rang
106b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi spring yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sbeng yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags// spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa brgya
106b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags/ dag pa ma lags/ dag par bgyi bam lags pa ste/ de ltar dben pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas
106b3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzus thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed
106b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ 'ang byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
106b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma mchis// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma
106b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// yongasu ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o// gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba
106b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mang ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gangag su ma mchis
106b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ gzhan du ra ming tsam dang / brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni
107a1(dkon brtsegs): don dam par dmigasu ma mchi so// chos gang ngon ngam par dmagasum mchis pa don yang ga sum mchis pa/ thasu du 'gyur ma mchis pa/ brjod ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
107a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang ming tsam zhes bya ba nas/ gangags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa log pa/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrub pa/ yongasu brtags pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
107a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma zhib/ rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba yang / chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'ang byed skyes par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma mchi
107a4(dkon brtsegs): nga'o// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur// na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur// de
107a5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de lan/ bag las mchis te// gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de rin par mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi
107a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur// 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ ming tsam dubyas kyi don dam par rim lag so// ma rig pa
107a7(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa de cing byang chu'o// de bzhin du spong ba'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par 'gyi ste/ de ltar nachen cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'a
107a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad ni bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ ches ba
107b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ dmigasum mchis pa/ kun nas chen mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis
107b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rjesu chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'// de'i slad ches thams cad ni de bzhin
107b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ches gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mchis pa'i ches de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis pa ste/ de'i slad ches thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
107b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes mtshan
107b5(dkon brtsegs): dngag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i sla du rte na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyi su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyisu ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis ma mtsha
107b6(dkon brtsegs): pas ni gnyi sum mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gang la la zhig 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor le bskor to zhes pachi na/ de dag par
107b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon pa' zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am/ skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
107b8(dkon brtsegs): chang med pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas/ ne mtshan// de dag thams cad ri lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste nga la yongasu mya ngan las
108a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa yang yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdza'o zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ri lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon
108a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mer pa'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa 'am/ gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad de bzhin
108a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas tshe'i 'ang byed bor re zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba 'am/ len pa ma mchi so// ba
108a4(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zhig 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'a ngaso zhes mtshon/ de dag thams cad ri lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par
108a5(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dpying sa ni 'khor ba'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par
108a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur ba mchis kyang ganga'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de dag
108a7(dkon brtsegs): ni bla na me nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur mi gda'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// 
108a8(dkon brtsegs): bam po dgu pa/ de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges par 'gro ba brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
108b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bar byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'kho // phyogs gcig tu 'khong nas kyang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang ba dag gis mngon
108b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tsha lo// 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid
108b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bstan// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa
108b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas zhi ba shes pa mi g.yo brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags
108b5(dkon brtsegs): la mgos phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams ning po cing stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bra la bar khyod kyis yongasu brtags// shes pa mi ldan skye bo pa
108b6(dkon brtsegs): chen 'dir bcings rlong la spre'u thogs bzhin// grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong // khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ 
108b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na brag cha rnams su tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra// des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings// grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skye
108b8(dkon brtsegs): mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing byis pa slub chang pa stong pa 'dra// mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/ 
109a1(dkon brtsegs): dper na 'dron pa rgya mtsho chen por ra khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar ltung // 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste// thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lnga/ 
109a2(dkon brtsegs): bur shin tu stong // ma mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags// bya dang mtsho'i gangang srog chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can cing stong sems can bral ming
109a3(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis stong // thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na// mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas pa yang dag rdzogs rnams spong
109a4(dkon brtsegs): sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol// rten byung chos rnams skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis// rmi lam dga' ba bzhingan du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// mi shes rtog
109a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings// mkhas pa na/ nga dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol// thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams
109a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsam mi khyab// thub pa zhi pa mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral// thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te// de slang tshul gcig 'di 'tshal
109a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med// thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa byis/ 
109a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis// mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas
109b1(dkon brtsegs): brnyes shes smra ba dang // gang dag rgyal bas 'khor longs pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang // gang dag pade gshegs spyo pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan bzlas smra ga// de dag thams cad yang das
109b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal lta ba thebs por yongasu dkris// gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang // gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongasu mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad lta bar
109b3(dkon brtsegs): song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis// chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal// de dag
109b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar la gyur// de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags// de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas
109b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mi yi mchog tu gyur// de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa// ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstar byas nas// kha cig yid mas
109b6(dkon brtsegs): ngogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid bdag/ mthong nas// 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag lung bstan par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam
109b7(dkon brtsegs): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang // chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thug su chud nas// sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom
109b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigasu bcid gsol pa// dpal lhag 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te// rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos/ 
110a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis ni ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyud gsungs// de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum
110a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bsil mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di kun the tsom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta// mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgya ngo ni myur du gsungs// de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the
110a3(dkon brtsegs): chom ma mchis 'gyur// 'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa// de dag su zhig gang gis ci 'thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul pa gsungs// mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs
110a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs te the tsom kun tu bsal tu gsol// de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob// bdegashegs rgyal mtshan mthen po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sem
110a5(dkon brtsegs): par/ 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tsom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tsom khum// des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul
110a6(dkon brtsegs): ngang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste// bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par
110a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de dag don gyi dbang la rten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol// des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyad
110a8(dkon brtsegs): bzos gyur cing // rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas bdag pa yongs rdzogs 'di ni rang dga' ste// tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu
110b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag bston pa mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcang slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams kyi che dung yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten
110b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad pa// rta rdul khyod kyis dus dang tshong shes ngal dris pa shin tu legs// gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi rgyu yi tshul dang rgyu// de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis
110b3(dkon brtsegs): sem thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing // rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo zhan bdag cag can
110b4(dkon brtsegs): thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang // kha cig kha rog 'a drag la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang // kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'drer pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te/ 
110b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo sdug bsngal ltung ba dgol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa ma/ khyen gyur nas// 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang 'byung nyan thos/ don du mdzad par shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung
110b6(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsung ste// kha cig thar pa den
110b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas// des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par
110b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa stabs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur// de ltar rtathul khyod kyis 'dzum pan
111a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis// rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyi
111a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyis// kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du
111a3(dkon brtsegs): theg mar nub// 'bring gi don ni dus tshong cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas// rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas
111a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par dgyis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba byed
111a5(dkon brtsegs): ni/ de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkha so bar 'gyur// 'bring don phyir na srab cing che la ngal gyis skor ba byed par 'gyur// dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor
111a6(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas rgya chen 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur// gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthor 'gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par
111a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya// gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gegs pa dang // gang tshe me tig 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng
111a8(dkon brtsegs): gi mkha' la lding ba dang // gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum bskor byed pa// de ni 'jig rten 'das pa che yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya// bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis
111b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan// rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag/ shes par gyis// nges na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad// nges
111b2(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyis bstan la the tsom med par gyis// 'bras bu rtse ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni// zhing rnams ngag tu chos tshul shin du rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar
111b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur// de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan// de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug
111b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // bskal pa sum cu drug tu tham sa cang mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod// nga dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu// gang zag chen
111b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thams cad du yang phun sum tshal rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod ba byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mcho de byang chub zhi ba
111b6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'tshal byas nas// de dag de yi 'og tu dpag stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung // rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs
111b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing spungs te// sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de// de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan
111b8(dkon brtsegs): thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni// gal te bskal pa khrag khrig ngag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de 'grangs kyang // legs mdzad rnams kyis nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin grangs mi 'gyur/ 
112a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba// de las nyis gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par gyur// de tshe rgyal ba zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
112a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin// de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas
112a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos// de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung
112a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' dpor 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad par 'byung
112a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongasu legs pa ra ldan gyub cing // yang dag shar bar 'gyur te doni bstan pa na mas kyi chos nyid yin// mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos
112a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ma lus dang gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'// bde bar gshes
112a7(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkar byas// de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de// rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos
112a8(dkon brtsegs): la// yang dag mthong ba'i spang ba dge ba 'di la kun du bsten byos te// dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo lag 'thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis// 'bras bu che ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsu
112b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe// sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tsom med
112b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur par rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid ras te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par
112b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgred// de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol ba// khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang // btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang // rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te// sprin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
112b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol ba// khyod kyis tshul khri mas rnams sbyangs pa// rnam pa kun du bsnams mi mnga'// shin tu bslabs pas mthar phyin pa// khrims mthar phyin
112b5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa// khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas// yan lag gtubs ba'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te/ 
112b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod mthar phyin pa phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa// brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te// stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub
112b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog brnyes pa// brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa// khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa// de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed // dus
112b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum mnyam pa nying brnyed pa// bsam gtan mthar byin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa// dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin// yang dang yang ni bsgoms pas na/ 
113a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa/ shes rab mthar byin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa// sbyin pa dag dang ngag sman dang // don spyang mthun
113a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don dag gis// 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol ba// byams chen thugs rje chen po dag/ yun ring dus nos bsgom/ 
113a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// sems can dpag yas yongasu bsgral// gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa// nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing // thub chen dul ba'i sem
113a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bas// ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa// kha lo sgyur ngal phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol bu// sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems dul
113a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ni mnga' ba// sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen no// sa sa byed khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros rnam/ bar dag pas gsol pa// shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can// 
113a6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo// mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sems ni rnam par
113a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs// sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad// sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa// kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa// dgongs pa pham pa mi mang ba/ 
113a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'dud kyi dpung yang bcom// khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ba'i yi bsgyur// lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa// khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar mkhyen/ 
113b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs// zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la// myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol ba// bral gyur yongasu bral gyur pa// chu bo rgal
113b2(dkon brtsegs): te zag pa spangs// pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs// brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa// 'dod chags spangs zhing zhe sdang spangs// gti mug spas
113b3(dkon brtsegs): pa zag med pa// sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa// 'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa// khyod kyi dam chos shin tu brtan// 'jig rten gsum du
113b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mchod// gcig pu 'gros pas bde ba brnyes// de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pa ngas gsol ba// lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ro// rlung gis
113b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyod par mi nus te// de bzhin bstod dang smad ba yis// bde ga/ shegs spyod par mi nuso// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa sa gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan rab sum
113b6(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis can// shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs// 
113b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mtha' yang rab tu ston// khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis// lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa// gnyi su med pa yang dag ston// dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon// gang zag zab
113b8(dkon brtsegs): la zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol ba// mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams// sprul rnams lpags pa
114a1(dkon brtsegs): rnying 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa// ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin// khyod kyi
114a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa myur thob na/ shes rab chen po mya ngan 'dar// lha'i bu gnas gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang / shes rab mtshon
114a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa// zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod// cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams
114a4(dkon brtsegs): cad zhi gyur pa// ngagra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa// khyod dkyis zhi gnas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen
114a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyod
114a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu bstan// shes rab chen po de 'tshal na// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par blta bas gsol pa// khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas
114a7(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod ltar slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa// shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa// thub
114a8(dkon brtsegs): chen khyod las gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing // sgribapa med par gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis gsung // ye shes rgya/ 
114b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod thos na// de dag dri med bde ba 'thob// bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol ba// chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog/ thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs// 
114b2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes sten bgyid pa// de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa// gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis// bdag dang
114b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur pa// de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad zhi byed par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis
114b4(dkon brtsegs): lugs bzlog ste// sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad// / lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol ba// chos rnams tham sa cad rten ma mchis// sems can ma mchis phan tshun min// lag
114b5(dkon brtsegs): mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis / lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa// bde gshegs khyo da kyis chos kyi rnams// bar snang lta bur snang ba ste// skye dang 'gog pa
114b6(dkon brtsegs): med par gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu ngar 'dzin pa med pa gsol pa// khyod kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kan// lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni// daso ba med cing ngar 'dzin med// spod med
114b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba med par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa// sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na// de bzhin ma lags de bzhin ganga'/ 
114b8(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sang pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol ba// gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la// gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzing / 
115a1(dkon brtsegs): de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// de bzhin
115a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu songs pa thogs med kyis gsol ba// chos nyid la ni khor zug tu// spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid nge ni rnyed pas na// de sdang khyod na
115a3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis chos 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib
115a4(dkon brtsegs): gsal/ lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa// mya ngan med cing nyer len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i
115a5(dkon brtsegs): bu rtog pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// chos rnams yang gam lags ste// 'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu
115a6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mchog gis gsol pa// lhun gyis grub cing blang rnyed pa// rmongs pa med cing shes pa med// chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugasu chud// lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ 
115a7(dkon brtsegs): snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min// gzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis// khyod kyi rang bzhin thugasu chud// lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol ba// yul dang
115a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs na mi gnas pa// yod dang med pa ma lags pa// rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum kyis gsol pa// byis pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa// ma skyes pa
115b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'gags pa// bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyangs mchis pa// bstan
115b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi// mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan mas mchis par// 
115b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'drer ba khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa// ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon pa dmigasu ma mchis dang // su la smon lam mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshul
115b4(dkon brtsegs): du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa// rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing // gang zhig 'grol 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs
115b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ma spang bas gsol pa// khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te// bde gsheg/ sa khyod la smad mi mnga'// su smad de dag mkhas ma lags/ 
115b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa// ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyis tshogs// char gyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis// 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu
115b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa don yod kyis gsol ba// thub khyod gsung ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu blo phun tshogs
115b8(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis// ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng ga'i
116a1(dkon brtsegs): / ros gsol ba// khyod kyi stong pa nyid bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas// mu stegs can kun ra 'jigs pa// seng ges ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyis
116a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de// khyod kyis spyod pa spyang bgyis pa// sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas na nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la
116a3(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyis chos kyang spel// stongs bcu gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes gsol pa// bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub
116a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rnams yang dag skyes// thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu bag yod nges bar byung gis gsol ba// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag
116a5(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod pas ga sol pa// bag yod yongasu ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa
116a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sras// 'gro ba 'di la ma chags par// thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa// byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na// 
116a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par gyur// lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing // mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pas// dpa' ba
116a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi dkor kyang thob par 'gyur/ lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs
116b1(dkon brtsegs): ri 'jig pas// rang rgyal de yang de bzhin rmib// lnga'i 'ungag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas ye shes tshal mdzad che// khyad ni ngag gis bzung bas na// bskal pa bye bgrangs med du// khyod
116b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni sbyor ma gyur// lha'i bu ni gnas brtson gyis gsol ba// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin ni// don sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa dang ma
116b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste// 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'// sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul 'thul ba la char
116b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa// sa sa rgyas shing la rab tu bzhags// sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo banyi na// khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te// sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang
116b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa// khyod kyis sra sa rnams ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni yongasu dul// bdud/ rnams bye bas mi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur
116b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa// zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po bsgom mdzad pa// ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu ni
116b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa// ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de'i rjesu 'brang // lha'i bu zhi gnas
116b8(dkon brtsegs): rjesu 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyid // zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching // de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu'i gnas spyod yul gyi
117a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med spyod pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu
117a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa// bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te/ shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes// de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu
117a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste// zhi gnas ye shes che thob pa// rang byung nyid nges par 'byung // lha'i bu lhag mthong
117a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon dga' bas gsol pa// dpa' ba chen po lhag mthong ni// chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste// de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong
117a5(dkon brtsegs): byung gis gsol pa// shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing // rnam pa/ ra 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste// de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab
117a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te// yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong // lha'i bu lhag
117a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nges byung gis gsol pa// gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag
117a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong mngon dga'as gsol pa// yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i
117b1(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol ba// mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod bgyis pa// de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// 'am par bgyi bar yong mi nus// lnga
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa// chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad // rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams// chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag
117b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong la spen pas gsol pa// rnam 'drer khyod kyis yun ring du// ye shes la ni bsten mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni// srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad// lha'i bu khyad par
117b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyis gsol ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad ma khyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i// 'jig rten de yis sgrol ba mdzad/ 
117b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa// lhag mthong la ni gan sa mdzad cing // chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzang rgya gro
117b6(dkon brtsegs): nga skyes 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong dang bral bas gsol ba// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis sras// ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing // skye ba mang po 'grel pa
117b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par brtse bas gsol ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mngara'// zhu ba ma mchis sngar mi mnga'// thub pa 'jig
117b8(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol ba// dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni// lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du// rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na// 
118a1(dkon brtsegs): / rang zung byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong snying ngos gsol ga// sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mngar// 'jig rten sdug bsngas
118a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di gzigs shing // thugs rje chen po shin tu bskyed// lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros gsol ba// byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mkhas pa nges par byung // de dag byang chub
118a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog kyang 'thob// grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grol// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la sten gyis gsol ba// stong pa nyid kyi chos sten pa'i// mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems can bcings las
118a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grol bgyid cing // bcings pa thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa// stong pa/ nyid la mos gyur pa// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/ 
118a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stong pa nyid spyod yul gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin stong
