118a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bos de la spyad pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa// skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thams cad rab
118a7(dkon brtsegs): tu spas// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // na mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol ba// stong nyid chos la bsten bgyid cing // sangs rgyas
118a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na meng // lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol ba// gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur pa// de ni yang dag
118b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags shes gsungs// stong nyid chos la sten bgyi pa// ma smang de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos rnams gang // mya ngan 'das min ston
118b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren// drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par shar gyis gsol ba// stong nyid ni la brten nas ni// khyod kyi slob ma yang dag
118b3(dkon brtsegs): shar/ stong pa nyid la gang sten pa// de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa// gang rnams stong pa nyid rten pa// mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing
118b4(dkon brtsegs): lha med rnams// byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur// lha'i dbu stong ba nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// gang rnams stong cing sten bgyid pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs
118b5(dkon brtsegs): rang byung pham pa med par 'gyur// 'jig rten don kyang bgyid para'agyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sa gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa
118b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid la gang bsten pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba'i phrag/ stong gis dkrug par mi nuso// lha'i bu mtshan ma la dga' bas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te// dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas// 
118b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mngar// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol ba// mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing // zhi bzhi la spyod pa rnams/ 
118b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis// tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la// 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de/ 
119a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi mngar rtogs dga' zhing // ni spyod khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas sgom gyis gsol pa// thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma me
119a2(dkon brtsegs): bas sgom gyur te// yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur kyang // de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du// gang zag
119a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni spyod mdzad pas// lha dang dri za mi dag kyang // khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing / 
119a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas rab mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu man/ nam med pa la rnam par brtse bas gsol pa// thub chen dpa' bo
119a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod// mtshan ma med la rnam par rol// mi rnams ngasu smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smra/ sa// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongasu grub kyis gsol pa/ 
119a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa// de dag byang chub grub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyis brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ 
119a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mtshan ma rnams bshig pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'// bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol
119a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med// 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten// dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ 
119b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing // zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur pa// sangs rgyas rgal ba 'gro sgrol ba// de dag tshad ni ga la mchis// lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyi gsol pa// mgon po gang dag smon laM
119b2(dkon brtsegs): ni/ rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lha'i bu smon pa med pa la sten pas gsol pa// zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa rnam
119b3(dkon brtsegs): su smon mi mdzad// sred pa yongasu chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos// lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol ba// khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa// de dag gzi mchog
119b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa skyes pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras/ darang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongasu grol bas gsol pa// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ 
119b5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa yongasu bcad pas na// srid pa 'jig bgyid sred pa la// de dag smon pa mi bgyid// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yod su grol bas gsol pa// gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa// gzi
119b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// de dag yongasu grol bar 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa// gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal
119b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag mi sgom zang zing med// dpa' chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la nges pas gsol pa// gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba dngos po med bsgoms pa// mgon khyod
119b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi yab// de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol ba// srid pa sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul// kha lo sgyur cing srid
120a1(dkon brtsegs): sel ba// sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa// srid pa'i dgon las byung ba'i rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te// nyon
120a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol ba// g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khod ni rnam rgyal bam mi mngal
120a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing // srid pa kun tu smod mi mdzad// lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol ba// thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing // khyod kyi
120a4(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams bdung dag la// bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid// 'i bu khrus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa// lus med chi ba med tshul du// lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur pa// de dag
120a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul dga'// 'dre ba khyod kyi rjesu zhugs// lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol ba// mig ts+tsha nga rul pa'i rnag zag pa// lus 'di mi bzang nges bsams te/ 
120a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol ba// lus la mi gtsang brtag bgyis te// lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing // lus kyi sdug
120a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal rnam grol nas// nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus yongasu gtong gis gsol pa// sbrul gyi pags pa rnying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa sku
120a8(dkon brtsegs): bo che// sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus la smon pas gsol ba// mi gtsang dring rtag zag cing // rul ba'i lus la rnam sma de// mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la
120b1(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongs skyo bas gsol pa// gang dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing // rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams// chos kyi rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur
120b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsol pa// 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'dra// gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa// de dag lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi spyor
120b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas gsol pa// lus kyi sbyor la mngon sum ste// ye shes gzigs pa'i spyad mnga' bas// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag/ sring gsum thams cad yongasu gzigs// lnga'i bu lus la 'ang
120b4(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral bas gsol pa// lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chag sa bral// chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas// kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste// rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
120b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu sring pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// srid par srid pa 'jom mdzad pa// khyod kyis dgra'i 'du shes mkhyen/ khyod kyi sras rnams bsgom bgyid cing // mkhas pa byang chub mngon
120b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya// lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa// srid pa rnams kyis nyes dmigs mthong // mya ngan 'das la 'jigs med mthong // khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro ban pir// byang chub spyang pa spong ba bgyid// 
120b7(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu sring ba rnam par sang+yas kyis gsol pa// gang gis sring ba rnam sangs shing // 'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa// mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha
120b8(dkon brtsegs): bu sring pa bsal gyis gsel ba// mi'i dam pa khyod kyi sras// srid par khrid pa rab bsal te// khyod kyi bslab pa bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum 'din rnam par mdzes// lha'i bu sring ba las rgal bas gsol pa/ 
121a1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba yis// 'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la// gang gis rgyu du bgrang ba yi// grangs ni 'jig rten 'din med// lha'i bu srid pa 'jom gyis gsol pa/ 
121a2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// sreg chags rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol pas gsel ba// srid
121a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyun las rab tu grol// rnam par 'dren pas srid pa rgal// srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas te// srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol pa// srid par khrid pa
121a4(dkon brtsegs): rab zhi zhing // srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brtan ba srid pa mthar 'byin pa// khyod la ngo zla ma mchi so// lba dbu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i mthar byin
121a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ni// mgon po khyod kyi srid pa mtha'// srid pa phyir ldodan/ thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu sring ba'i tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsel ba/ 
121a6(dkon brtsegs): sring ba'i rgyun ni rnam spangs nas// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len 'gyur ba'i// khyod kyi kun tu sbyor ma mthong // lha'i bu srid pa rab tu shi ba thob kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi srid pa stong mkhyen
121a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin// zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'// mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i pha rol rgal ba ste// sring bar khrid pa
121a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bsal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtsebs// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// 'phags pa yab dang sras 'jal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bar po bcu pa
121b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshe rabs mnar gyis gsol pa// tshor rab bdag tu bgyi ma mchis// sems dpa' ma mchis rtsol ma mchis// bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis// tsho rab chu bur lta bur mkhyen// lnga'i bu tshor
121b2(dkon brtsegs): bston pas gsol pa// ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par// tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba// de la so so'i skye bo chags// lha'i bu tshor ba la yongasu rtog pas gsol pa/ 
121b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med la dngos med par// de ni mthu chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa// tshor ba dang ni
121b4(dkon brtsegs): tsherab bo// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo blta dga'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan// lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa// tsho
121b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tsom ma mchis gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i
121b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa// de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i phung po mngon
121b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs// lha'i bu tshor la rgal bas gsol pa// rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod/ 
121b8(dkon brtsegs): brgal dka'atsho ba'i mtsho las rgal// 'angam las rgal cing sdig med pa// byang chub mchog 'dis sangs rgyas gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol ba// rnam par 'dren pas 'jig cer/ 
122a1(dkon brtsegs): du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol ba// mi rnams ngag la
122a2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'tshaching ba'i// tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhags pa 'ching 'gyur ba// de'i rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa// khyod kyis
122a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis nyon mongs pham// bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste// sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i sems yongasu shes pas gsol pa// ji
122a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par
122a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas gsol pa// sgyu ma'i mtshan nam slob ma bzhin// // gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems de kho/ da kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ 
122a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa// sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid pa
122a7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa// dul gyur la su rung ba yi// sems kyi rang bzhin rtog med pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs/ 
122a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol ba// gang gis sems la sems med shes// mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lha
122b1(dkon brtsegs): bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang zag sems la sems med shes// de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags
122b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyi gsol pa// gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa// sems can de dag zhi rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags pas rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// lha'i bu sems mnyen
122b3(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa// mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing // bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang // khyod kyis bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas
122b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing // yang ngag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos
122b5(dkon brtsegs): cing la gnas pas gsol pa// rang gi yid ni chos nyid la/ rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa// de dag mi dbang sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i bu chos la
122b6(dkon brtsegs): sems pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad chos dbyingasu// 'dren pa de la bslab pa rnams// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges
122b7(dkon brtsegs): par byung gis gsol pa// mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la nges 'byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gis nges 'byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi
122b8(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu
123a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bsam yas te/ sangs rgyas chos la the tsom med/ 
123a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsam la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa// gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid cig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag spongs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis
123a3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa// gang la de dag gnas pa yi// 'jigs pa med pa thob med pas// de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa med pa
123a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa// kho dkyi chos dbyings mkhas pa ste// chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas// lag mthil skyu rung bzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbyings kyang
123a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par ston// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol ba// chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhugs// mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te// bzung ba ma
123a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbying 'byod spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'chal
123a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la ston pas gsol pa// gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de'i sgo nas chos dbyings ston// de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas
123a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi tshim gyis gsol ba// dpa'
123b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo khyod kyis skye ba 'di// ches kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa// gting rnyeng gyur pa'i 'gre ba kun
123b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sa nas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol ba// mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes
123b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di chos dbyings ste// rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu'o// gang la spyod pa ngo lag so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam/ 
123b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes ba lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen// mtshan nyid gcig la ma tha
123b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ste// sems can kun gyi bsam sa rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// gnas bya ba chos dbyings shes/ 
123b6(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang byung ci du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang thung cing du
123b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// gnas med pa ni gang 'chal pa// de dag bde gshegs dgongs pa mos// bdud rnams bye ba steng gis
123b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag rmongs par yongs mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas gsol ba// gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa// de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs// bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces/ mkhas
124a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag shin tu dga'// lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas te// sdig can bdud rnam
124a2(dkon brtsegs): bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta'i sa shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas
124a3(dkon brtsegs): med de// gnas medo zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa// gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan// rang gis de ni thugs
124a4(dkon brtsegs): chung nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// sngon chad rgyu ni gang ngag dang // las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i// rgyu de khyod kyis
124a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs chung // las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i dru las la mkhas pas gsol pa// chags dang zhe sdang ba/ ti mug ni// las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen// gang gi rgyu yis
124a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis de yang // gang zag mcho gas thugasu chung // lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag na// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de'i rgyu dang len pa dang // 
124a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bung ltar byung la lta bas gsol pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gis// sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las// gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams/ 
124a8(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol ba// mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te// gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchi so// de bas
124b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lnga'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol ba// las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas// dus la rnam smin gnas gsum dang // ji ltar de yi len pa yang // khyod kyis mkhyen pas de snang mchod
124b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas// rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis
124b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang // rnam smin so so yang dag rig/ thams cad stong par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / 
124b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// khyod nying rang gis mngon mkhyen te// rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu stobs kyi ngas rnam par brtse bas gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas
124b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// 'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste// na cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis 'a phags kyis gsol pa// rgyu dang rkyen dang las rnams dang // rnam par
124b6(dkon brtsegs): smi ba sten pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes// seng ge nga ro khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu stobs kyi rjesu 'brang bas gsol pa// 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis// khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa/ 
124b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen// de bas khyod na zla med// lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de yi rnam smin ci 'dra
124b8(dkon brtsegs): de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// phyag
125a1(dkon brtsegs): gi ser mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // bshes gnyen ci'ang rnyed gyur nas// 'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgying gyur pa// de kun bla na
125a2(dkon brtsegs): med pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis brlabs pas gsol ba// stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing // 'drer ba de yi khams dang ni// 'du 'jib shes gsen tshogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis
125a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa// khams de dang ni de len dang // bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa// de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa nges// de phyir the tsom yong mi mnga'// lha'i bu khams la rten pas
125a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de ga khams de dang // spyo dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mtsho/ ga khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa
125a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gang gis mkhas de ni// 'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi// mkhyen de mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes// blo mchog ma 'bas yang dag bstan// lha'i bu khams nas nges par 'byung gis
125a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis na// 'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// khyod la do zla ma mchi so// lha'i bu khams kyi rjesu song bas gsol pa// khams
125a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la ni bstan bgyis pas// yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten
125a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing // 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen// de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol ba// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pa// we
125b1(dkon brtsegs): bci 'drar mchi ba yin// sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang // ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa// sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal
125b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa// phung po gsum po de dag la// khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa// sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal ba med// de la 'jig rten sgron
125b3(dkon brtsegs): ma khyod// rtog pa thogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa// ma nges phung por gyur pa la// gang dag gang rnams gnas pa rnams// de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyi
125b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa// sangs rgyas brda/ tsam nyid lags te// de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsum
125b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas sangs rgya sa chos rnams med// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med// don dam nyid bstan to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ 
125b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu slebs la gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas// des na de la 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phrul// lha'i bu chos la
125b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs med kyis gsol pa// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // brda' yang dmigasu ma mchiso// lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ 
125b8(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhar// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan// mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis// khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i bu lam la brtson pa
126a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchi// log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror// drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mos pa'i/ 
126a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni sten bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba// de dag mthu chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sdug pa las nges par
126a3(dkon brtsegs): byung gis gsol ba// ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na// 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 
126a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na// zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gni gas// lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis
126a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu brtags pas na// gti mug khams ni rab tu byung // de la / mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa// 'tsho byed 'jigs
126a6(dkon brtsegs): brnyed pa dag// ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa// sdig pa'i grogs dang
126a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs pas na// mthun pa'i khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa 'thob 'gyur ba// de dag 'dren pa rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol ba// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams
126a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis// ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang // mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag/ khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// gang gis rgyu
126b1(dkon brtsegs): byung nan tan dang // mos pa de las gyur pa yang // smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa// sems can gang gis khams gang la// bsnyen na ji ltar 'gyur ba yin// rgyu de khyod kyis rang
126b2(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen// des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa// sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang // gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang // dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu
126b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa// 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang // sred par mngon par 'jug pa dang // sred pazhi bar bgyi ba'i don// de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen/ 
126b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol ba// dbang po nyams na nga rnams dag ni// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par la/ tshal// sred pa rnam par gzhig pa yang // rkang gnyis dam pas
126b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol ba// dbang po rtul po dur khrod brten// rang gi 'dod chags zhi ba rabagying// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sred dang bcas
126b6(dkon brtsegs): pas khyod la lta// lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa// 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang // sred bzhi dang dbang po rnams// rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmigs// lha'i
126b7(dkon brtsegs): bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa// zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi// gnod sems med dang dben pa dag/ dbang po rtul po sten pa'i tshe// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol
126b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhe sdang gnyen po byams par gsung // sems can shes pa rjesu skye// zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa// gnod sems med dang byas
127a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba dang // zhi bong bo nyid ma gzigs// ngag dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te// des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rje su 'brang gis gsol pa// log par rnam par rtog pa dang / 
127a2(dkon brtsegs): log par nye bar ston pa yang // nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te// bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzin pa/ 
127a3(dkon brtsegs): mun pa ste// bzlog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin
127a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis ma mchis te// de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs/ da lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol ba// sems can gang gis shes pa gang // ji tsam yongasu bsgrub bgyis dang // snong du gang ru
127a5(dkon brtsegs): ji sbeng dang // de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i dbang po zhe 'gras pas gsol ba// nyon mongs spang phyir shes ga gis// shes pa de la rtog bgying po// de'ang ston pa khyod kyis mtsho/ 
127a6(dkon brtsegs): de bas khyod la mngon par dgar// lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa// yul dang dus dang gnas ngag dang // spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang // nyon mongs ston rmongs rnam dag pa// thub pa khyod kyis stong par
127a7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol ba// dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang // gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // bcings dang thar dang zad dang shes// g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu
127a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa// dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang // nyon mongs ye shes tshol ba dang // gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag/ khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs// lha'i bu dbang po
127b1(dkon brtsegs): rnar brtags kyis gsol pa// sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang // rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang // rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gso
127b2(dkon brtsegs): pa// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin brten te// chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi// lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa// chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin gang / 
127b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa// yang dag ji bzhin thugasu chung // des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa// log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar
127b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// las las skyes par de dag mkhyen// des na khyod la do zla med// lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol ba// nyon/ mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang // 
127b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod la do zla med/ lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa// bsam gtan rnams dang rnam thar dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang / 
127b6(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ga/ ming tsa mo zhes khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa// bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin// bag yod pa las
127b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ste// de la khyod kyis ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol ba// dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang // ljang dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni
127b8(dkon brtsegs): rlung ltar chags pa med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol ba// bskal pa bye ba grangs med// srid pa 'di ni sngon bzhugs tshe// sred pa'i skyon dang yongs ma 'dres// des na khyod la ngo zla med/ 
128a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol ba// bskal pa bye ba grangs med// byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing // 'dren pas yongasu spyad pas na// nges na khyed ni dpa' na
128a2(dkon brtsegs): lags// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs pas gsol pa// sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/ blo gros gsung tshe gsol bas na// sos pa sna tshogs rab mnga' bar// rnam par 'dren pa de nges byung // lha'i bu sngon
128a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' la byang bas gsol pa// sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs// des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'
128a4(dkon brtsegs): tshar phyin pas gsol ba// sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngan chad spyod mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung // sems can khams la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i
128a5(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba// byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// lha
128a6(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pa// chos kun sems can med pa zhes// chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen// 'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal ba gsung // lha'i bu
128a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par// rnam par 'dren pas spod mdzad pas// des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mngar// lha'i bu
128a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa// gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis na// las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na// khams dang dbang po mos pa dang // bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' nga med// lha'i bu sngon gyi
128b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la yongasu rtog pas gsol pa// khyod kyis sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas// stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po// dpa' ba chen pos rnam par spel// des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha
128b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gyis gsol pa// dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyis// sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa dang // dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams// mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spod pa la so sor
128b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas gsol pa// thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi// sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing // khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na// de phyir sems can gso' ba mdzad// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol
128b4(dkon brtsegs): ban bskal pa bye ba mtha' ya su// sngon gyi mthar la brtag brgya da kyang // khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'// des nam dgon la bdag mos lags// lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ 
128b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye bgrangs med du// sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyi sa kyang // rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yon tan gyi// pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gso/ 
128b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa// shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la nges par byung gis
128b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig/ bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par
128b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pas gsol pa// khams gang gis ni sems can gang // bsgom par gyur cing las bgyid pa'i// bag chags las dang sems can dag/ khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen// lha'i bu sho 'pho dang skye ba
129a1(dkon brtsegs): rig pas gsol pa// bshes gnyen ci 'dra ba rten bgyis shing // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas// 'gro ba gang du mchi bar 'gyur// thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen/ 
129a2(dkon brtsegs): bu dgongs pa las mkhas pas gsol ba// las de yi ni bgyi ba gang // dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// gang gi slang las bgyid pa// de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas
129a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa// thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// lha'i bu dngos po rig pas gsol pa/ 
129a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa// dngos de ji ltar gnas pa dang // de ni ji ltar grub pa yi// las de khyod sa mngon par mkhyen// lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa
129a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gang gis dngos po de// brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen// de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang // thub pa dkyis shin tu mkhyen// lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la mkhas
129a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// chags pa gang gis las de rnams// nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i// nyon mongs de dag yang dag mkhyen// de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon// lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas
129a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'gro ba gang du lus gang gis// mchis shing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba// de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 
129a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi// gang gis las rnams smin 'gyur ba'i// dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te// de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug/ lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas pas gsol ba// 'gro dang
129b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar mi rnams kyis// sngan chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang // de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyis// bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa// 'gro bar 'byung po
129b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi// rnying dang gsar dang slad ma dang // las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen// de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul// lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang
129b3(dkon brtsegs): che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang // chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung // de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol ba// tshe 'di las rnams gang lags dang // skyes pa'i/ 
129b4(dkon brtsegs): las rnams gang lags dang // lan grangs gzhan gyi gang / lags pa// de dag spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa// tshe 'di
129b5(dkon brtsegs): la ni gang bgyis pa// las kyi rnam smin mi gang dag/ myong ra 'gyur ba gang dag la// so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen// lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ 
129b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis las gang bsags gyur te// skyes nas rnam par smir gyur pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la
129b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas kyis gsol pa// las gang bskal pa bye ba yi// phyi dus rnam par smid 'gyur zhing // dus gzhan dag na yang 'byung ba// de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen// lha'i bu yongasu ma smin pa myong bar
129b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol ba// las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa// yongasu smin par ma gyur na// de srid 'bras bu mi 'byin pa// rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu
130a1(dkon brtsegs): yo su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la dog pas gsol ba// las gang dang ni ldan pas na// sems can 'dir skyer 'gyur ba// pham pa med pas de mkhyen te// yongasu brtags nas rab tu
130a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu yong su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pas gsol pa// las ni ji ltar yongs sminan// 'bras bu dgar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ de dag stong bar rnam par mkhyen// lha'i
130a3(dkon brtsegs): bu yongasu smi ba myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol ba// thams cad mkhyen pa las kyi rnams// lci dang yang ba rab tu mkhyen// sems can bsam pa thug su chud// de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu
130a4(dkon brtsegs): yang la mkhas kyis gsol ba// las gang gis ni sems can rnams/ ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang // lci ba dang ni yang ba gzi gras// de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sems can gyi
130a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol ba// sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing // lam gyi lci dang yang ba dag/ dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu ma khyen// mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs// lha'i bu sems can
130a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod pa la dpyod pas gsol ba// sems can spod pa dpyad mdzad cing // lus kyi rnam par smin pa bstan// phor bu'i chu dang gang+gA'i chu// lan tshwas rnam par bstan pa bzhin// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis
130a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// slob dang mi slob rnam par smin// rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing // kun nas nyon mongs las myong bas// las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan// lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rig par byed
130a8(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol ba// sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na// las kyi 'bras bu rten pa yi// byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzigs// phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/ 
130b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod// sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang // skye bkun la ye shes 'jug/ mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ 
130b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las// 'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang // rnam smin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa// 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa// ji ltar
130b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam skom pa zhig/ shin tu bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin// rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad// lha'i bu yongasu rtog pa dang bral bas gsol pa// 'dod chags
130b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gti mug rnams// yongasu rtog las skyes pa ste// rmi la/ ma dga' bar rtse ba bzhin// smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yongasu rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ 
130b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rtogs pa rab zhi bas// nyon mongs zad par rab bstan te// rmi lam na ni sprin med ltar// mi mchog khyod kyis ra ba tu bstan// lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa// 
130b6(dkon brtsegs): lam char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung bar// zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa// rmi lam
130b7(dkon brtsegs): char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste// nor pa rnams la zag 'byung bar// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas gsol pa/ 
130b8(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu mo rmi lam na// bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na// dga' dang sdug bsngal tshor 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu rmi lam na rtog pas gsol ba// rmi lam
131a1(dkon brtsegs): / ngag na mgo bcad bzhin// khyod kyis zag bzad pa gzigs// de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan// thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros nges par brtags kyis gsol pa// chos
131a2(dkon brtsegs): kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang // dral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs// 'gro ba ji bzhin tshim par mdzad// lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi dam pa'i chos stong pa// thos na
131a3(dkon brtsegs): yid ni dga' 'gyur te// rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu yongasu dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa// me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin// 'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas
131a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa// thub pa'i bang sgra 'dra ba'i// khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na// lha'i bu rnams kyang
131a5(dkon brtsegs): the tsom por// rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol ba// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dang / byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na// mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur
131a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sprul pa la sems dpas gsol ba// ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba// de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs// mgon po'i bstan pa de thos na// bdag cag the tsoms
131a7(dkon brtsegs): mchi so// lha'i bu sgyu ma la nges par byung gis gsol ba// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul kyang // sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na// de ba rmongs pa 'gyur ma mchis// de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs// lha'i bu rtog par
131a8(dkon brtsegs): rjes rtog pas gsol ba// ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na// sangs rgyas sku gzugs brtags pa bzhin// de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'jom gyi
131b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu lags te// 'dod chags dngos po bskyed ma lags// rtog bla ngan las 'dod chags byung / de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu yongasu shes pa dang ldan pas
131b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// ri sul dag nas sgra byung ba// brag cha sems can sgra ma lags// de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// sgra ni gang yang ma
131b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis te// sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba lags// 'on kyang myi dbang khyod kyis bstan// byis pa mang po rab tu btsud// lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang // byis pa rnams kyis gzhan
131b4(dkon brtsegs): du rtags// nan tan chos las shes par bgyi// de la bdag ni the tsa ma chad// lha'i bu don gyi rjesu 'brang bas gsol pa// ches don ya ngadag gang lags pa// de ni sus kyang ma rtogs shing // sus kyang ma
131b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan 'tshal ma gyur// de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs/ lha'i bu chos kyi brda' rtogs pas gsol pa/ zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang // bag chags dang ni rtog dang rtog/ kun nas con mong
131b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag pa// thub pa brda'i tshig kyang lags// lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang // zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang // ngag dang bshad dang nye du dang // stong pa 'di kun
131b7(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam lags// lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// khams gsum rnams la ma chags te// namakha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang
131b8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol pa// thub pa khyod kyi thugs yid ni// gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing // 'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la// gnas pa ma mchis par snang 'dra// lha'i bu re ba med
132a1(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol ba// 'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs// gzugs dang gzugs med gnyi gar min// 'du 'ji dag dang bral gyur pa// sred zang khyed la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu
132a2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa byung bas gsol pa// 'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la// khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chad// khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'// rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pas zil gyis mnon
132a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol ba// 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas// khyu mchog dam pa spyod mdzad cing // sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa// thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i ngu sred pa dang bral bas
132a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// kun tu sbyor dang bral ba ste// yang srid bas pas zhir gyur ba// dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems// dus dang bral la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa/ 
132a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa/ ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen// bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis// yang ngag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu 'dam las rgal bas/ 
132a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// 'dod pa'i 'dam las rgal ba ste// srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin rgal// gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'// yang srid zad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol ba// zang zing
132a7(dkon brtsegs): spangs shing dri ma spangs// re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs// sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnams spangs pa// don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu re ba spangs pas gsol pa// don dang don ma lags pa spangs// 
132a8(dkon brtsegs): chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa// bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa// len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol ba// bdag nyid la ni gzhan rnams kyi// lam gang nyon mongs
132b1(dkon brtsegs): rims med pa// sgrib pa med par gzigs pa'o// dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs// lha'i bu grags pa thob pas gsol ba// 'drer ba 'jig rten rnam grags pa// khyod kyi mkhyen la brtson pa rnams// ji skad
132b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan bzhin rab rtog na// nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa// chos rnams kun la nges pas na// sngo ba gang yang yongs ma gzigs// ye shes rgya mtsho mi snyengs par/ 
132b3(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs pa mdzad// lha'i bu gang na 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa// 'jigs pa med las yang dag rgal// zug rngu thams cad kun tu bton// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// thams cad
132b4(dkon brtsegs): zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa// lha rnams dang ni dri za dang // bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis// khyod kyi chos la rgal mi nus// de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi
132b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga'// lha'i bu seng ge rtsal gyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams/ cad yongs mkhyen pas// sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'// bdag la chos kyis sus rgol zhes// bde gshegs
132b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la ngogs mi mnga'// lha'i bu skag med kyis gsol pa// seng ge ri sul gnas pa ni// 'jigs pa ma mchis skag ma mchis// ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te// spa bkod nags na nga ro sgrog/ de bzhin
132b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa yang // mu stegs can rnams skrag ste// lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na// mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog/ lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa// 'jig rten rnam 'dren
132b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgyid pa// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// de na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs// lha'i bu seng ge blo gros kyis gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// chos
133a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te// cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rjesu 'thun par skyes kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas nying du dam
133a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas na// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// 'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni// khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis// lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis gsol ba// seng ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te// khyod kyis chos kyi
133a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzod bzung bas// srog chags bye ba stong dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjesu mthun gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas rjes mthun brtul zhugs can// dpa' chen de
133a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag thob chen thob// byang chub mchog tu sems brtul cing / gang zag mchog tu dag 'gyur// lha'i bu rjesu mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol ba// khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te// byang chub
133a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu sems brtul bas// de dag 'jig rten sems can ma// gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu sems pa/ ga bas gsol pa// 'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i// rdzogs
133a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas// srog chags bye ba stong dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// lha'i bu sems kyi rgyun yongasu dag pas gsol pa// yun ring dus nas mi dbang gis// sangs rgyas
133a7(dkon brtsegs): bslab la legs bslabs pas// de skad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag/ mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa// zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// seng ge'i nga ro
133a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrag mdzad de// dam bca' ba la mngon bzhugs na// rgol ba 'di na yong ma mchis// lha'i bu de kho na'i rjesu song bas gsol ba// khyod kyis gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i// lha dang lha bu mi dag ni// 'jig rten gcu
133b1(dkon brtsegs): nam mchis te// nges na thub pa stobs dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsel ba// dge slong dam pa'i zag pa ni// ma lus yongasu bas pa ste// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// nges na sangs
133b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bdag gi pa// lha'i bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol ba// khyod la son mongs luso zhes// mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs te// des na sangs rgyas ma sems mi mnga'// lnga'i
133b3(dkon brtsegs): sems zhi bas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste// gti mug bag chags bcas par zhi// nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na// sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gso
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ba// rnal 'byor gang gis son mongs gang // bas par 'gyur bar lta ba'i tshe// de la khyod kyi mkhyed kun 'jug// des ni khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lnga'i phurnal 'byor la mkhas pas
133b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'dren pa gang la bslabs pa yi// rnal 'byorachags ni mtha' yas te// thams cad mkhyen pa de slad / nyon mongs thams cad ma lus pas// lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros
133b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol ba// 'jig rten sgren pa khyod kyi blo// rnal 'byor las ni nyams ma mchis// des na khyod kyi nyon mongs kun// bag chags bcas par yongasu bsal// lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsel ba/ 
133b7(dkon brtsegs): tshor mongs thams cad zhir gyur nas// bag chags ma lus yongasu bsal// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang // cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa// thub pa
133b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa khyod // yor mongs bag chags bcas pa bas// 'jig rter sgron ma khyod la ni// mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs// lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa// khyod kyi bag chags ma
134a1(dkon brtsegs): lus gsal// khyod la skyon dri yongs ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// lha rnams kun gyi thub pa 'i// lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas gsol pa// zag pa rnams
134a2(dkon brtsegs): ni spangs pas na// skye ba'ang skye ba ma lags te// thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa// des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mngar// lha'i bu tshang srung gis gsol ba// dpa' bo khyod kyi sa bon spangs// sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par
134a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// mya ngan 'khri shing rnam par bskams// gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shing rtags bton gyis gsol pa// thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod// ma rig shing rtags rnams kyang bsal
134a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs// de bas ston pa bsnyengs mi ma dnga'// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa// mid dpa'i mtsho las yang dag rgal// rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas// khyod
134a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis snang ba yang dag phyung // 'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub/ lha'i bu mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bas gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen bzhir gyur pa// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bshig/ 
134a6(dkon brtsegs): bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'// mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol ba// khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskal// chos
134a7(dkon brtsegs): lam srang mtha' yas pa// dpa' ba chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas po// thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa// sems can kun gyi dge ba
134a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyen// ye shes mtsho la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol ba// khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa// seng ge'i ngaro nam sgrog kyang // rgyal sras de dag chog med cing // gdus chos kyi don/ 
134b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi skem// lha'i bu ches don du gnyer bas gsol ba// sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar// khyod kyi sras rnams sems bskyed cing khyod kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas// mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol// ts+tsha
134b2(dkon brtsegs): bu chos kyi sgom gyi gsol pa// khyed kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir// srog chags bye ba sgom gyur te// brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu rtsom// // 'phags pa
134b3(dkon brtsegs): dper mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong drag brgyag// / bam po bcugacig pa// lha'i bu chos kyi 'phags kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phag
134b4(dkon brtsegs): shing / 'phags pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i// gsung ba'i mdag gyur khyod mthong nas// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub cho wa// lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa// thub pa zab cing blta dka'
134b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa// khyod kyi sras kyis thos grur nas// de dag bla med byang chub tshol// lha'i bu lta ba med pas ga sol ba// khyod kyi seng ge'i gsung thos nas// khyod kyi sras pa
134b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nges pa// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// byang chub don du gnyer ba bgying // lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pas gsol ba// thub pa rnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas// gzhan du sems pa
134b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshel// lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa// mi dbang khyod kyis gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyis po sangs bgyis shing // lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar
134b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i byang tshol// lha'i bu che bar gnas kyis gsol ba// seng ge'i nga ro 'di bsgrags pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur na// byang chub mchog la nyer gyur cing // de dag rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur/ 
135a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol ba// grags chen khyod kyi gsung brjod pa'i// slebs pa'i de ni thos myur na// sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras// kun kyang dga' ba ra
135a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bskyed// lha'i bu so zlas pa thob pas gsol pa// 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa// ma spang sras kyis thos gyur na// de dag spobs pa nam du yang // sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog/ lnga'i bu rgyas
135a3(dkon brtsegs): tu rab dgas gsol ba// 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas// stobs chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// rtag tu rab tu dga' gyur cing // ma spang de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu ying zhum pa med pas
135a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos gyur na// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras// dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis par// byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid // lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis
135a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na// sems rang gyur cing yid dga' ste// de dag yid ni nem du yang // byang chu ba nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la bar chad med la
135a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnams gang la bsten bgyis kyang // dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing // de'i bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa
135a7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas gsol ba// dkar po'i phyogs la spyod pa la// bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la
135a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa// dge ba kun nas nyon mongs po// nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te// khyod kyi thugs ni nges mi gos// gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// lha'i burtsig pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ 
135b1(dkon brtsegs): nag po'i chos ni nam du yang // dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par// rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs// des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsol ba// chos rnams tha
135b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dres par// dpa' ba chen po khyod kyis mkhyen// kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na// dkar ba'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur// lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa// kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la/ 
135b3(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste// de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la// bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol ba// nag po'i phyogs la bsnyer bgying na// thar pa 'dod pa mang po yi
135b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs// des na rgyal khyod thams dang mkhyen// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol ba// sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas// kun nas nyon mongs shes
135b5(dkon brtsegs): bya zhes// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs// des khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags// lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol ba// kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid cing // kun nas nyon mo
135b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal na// dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus// de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa// sdig pa rnams la bsten byas kyang // dge ba mi 'grib gang smra ba// de ni thar
135b7(dkon brtsegs): chos skal med ces// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa// chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang // zhe sdang gti mug 'dul 'dod pas// thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra
135b8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ de lta bu ni nan tan bgyi// lha'i bkun nas nyon mongs pa dag pas gsol pa// ngag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa// mi mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa// de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min// de skang drang srong
136a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa// nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos// rgyal ba yis ni gang bstan pa// de bsten nyon mongs mi zad ces// 
136a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa// chos gang nyon mongs gang gi rnams// zang 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la// yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces// rgol ba
136a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yong mi dmigs// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la brtson pas gsol ba// rgyal ba khyod kyi nyan thos la// gang gi don du chos bstan pa// de brtson bgyis pas mi 'thob ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ 
136a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags snga ngas phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis ma 'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes// khyod la rgol ba yongs
136a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis// lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol ba/ shin tu bsrings pa mi mnga' ba// zhe sdang spang phyir byamasagasungs pa// de bsgrubs sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// dgra 'joms
136a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa// shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir// gsungs pa de la bstan bgyis kyang // gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol
136a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'jom gyis gsol pa// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni// dbugs 'byung rngub pa dran gsungs pa// de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis
136a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol ba// ngaro snyam pa spang sA // stong nyid khyod kyis bka' stsal te// des ni ngas gi mi 'gyur zhes// 'din khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bunga'o snyam pa'i
136b1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal spangs kyis gsol pa// nga sum nga rgyal spang slang du// mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs// bsten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu sems rgyun rnam par da
136b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// lha'i bu bsam pas dag pa yi// nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// des ni nyon mongs mi zad ces// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis
136b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang // nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug pa// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu tha smad shin tu shes pas gsol pa// bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang / 
136b4(dkon brtsegs): zang dang mazang ba spad tsam// 'jigs pa ma mchis rgol bgyid ba// thub pa de ni ming tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyi las dul ba sa gsol pa// mkhyen pas yongasu mkhyen gyur nas// khyod kyi sku'i
136b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrin las 'jug/ thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na// des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen/ lha'i bu lus kyi las yongasu shes pas gsol pa// sems can rnams la thugs brtsa
136b6(dkon brtsegs): bas/ dpa' khyod sku'i phrin las ni// mtha' dag shin tu nges pa las// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi las shin tu nges pas gsol pa// skra'i phrin las rab nges par/ 
136b7(dkon brtsegs): lus can kun la sAr sla // 'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de// des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong bas gsol pa// sems can kun la sman spa du// 'dren ba
136b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sku'i phrin las dag pa dang // legs par yongs brtags dang ldan// lha'i bu lus kyi lus kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas gsol pa// shin tu mnyam par gzhag sku dang
137a1(dkon brtsegs): sku'i phrin las rnam dag dang // ldan par sems can ba don du// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol ba// sun cing yon tan ldan pa dang / rtsub pa yongs
137a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i gsung // mkhyen pas shin tu yongs brtags shing // mgon po khyod ni gsung ba mdzad// lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa// dus don dang ldan pa dang // don med yongasu spangs pa'i gsungs/ 
137a3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs par 'os dang blang 'os pa// 'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad// lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis gsol pa// dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te// 'dum par gyur dang yid 'ong ba// dben med 'bras bu rnam par
137a4(dkon brtsegs): smin/ sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod// lha'i bu mi bslu bas gsol pa// srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni// srid pa rnams su dbardzun ma gsungs// de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun// 'jig rten
137a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag na thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gso/ la pa// 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal sladadu// thub pa'i gsung la spong ba ni/ 
137a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu mthun lags// lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa// mi mchog khyod kyis bden pa yis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te// chos kyi yang
137a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag rang bzhin yang // rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu yang dag pa la rtul bas gsol pa// 'dus byas ngag gi chos kyi rnams// yang dag ji bzhin blta ba dang // chos rnams yang dag mtshan
137a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang // mi 'i dbang pos rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol ba// ye shes yongasu dag pa yis// bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi/ tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen// des na rgyal
137b1(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu yid la rdog pas gsol ba// mi'i dbang po'i thugs kyi las// ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni// de dag 'gro la thugs rjes 'jug/ 'gro ba na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu
137b2(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// 'gro la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gang la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa// de la thugs ni dul bar byung // 'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu thabs
137b3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas gsol ba// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyad nas// rnam 'dren thugs kyi phrin las 'jug/ thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni// mkhyen bzhin kun tu rab tu 'jug/ lha'i bu yid rnam par
137b4(dkon brtsegs): bshig gis gsol pa// sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi las// / sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung // sang sa rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin med par rab tu
137b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa mkhas pas gsol pa// spyi nang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsams/ tan dag la yang // gang gis gang la sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi
137b6(dkon brtsegs): dus kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol ba// byang chub mchog ni chol mdzad cing // gang drang khyod kyis sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi spyod pa yongs brtags nas// sangs
137b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang // khyod
137b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongasu rtogs pas gsol ba// sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi// ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med
138a1(dkon brtsegs): la// rnam par 'dren pa khyed kyi zhus// lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyong ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu// grangs med dpag tu med pa'i// ting 'dzin spong/ 
138a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa yis// zhus shing bsgom pa mdzad par gyur// lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtag pas gsol ba// 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang // bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ gzigs nas sems can rnams
138a3(dkon brtsegs): la smon// sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel// lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa// gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal// rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis// gnod pa mi zad bgyid pa dag/ gzhan
138a4(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par byung bas gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtog pa// khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi// lha dang bsam gtan sboms
138a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug dang // 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bugyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol ba// 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhye na ba ni// ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang // skye dang las kyi rnam
138a6(dkon brtsegs): sprin la// thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchi so// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi// mkhyen pa byi dus sems can gyi// bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu dang // 'gro ba
138a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu srid pa las skyon gyis gsol ba// khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi// ye shes mchog ni mi chags te// srid pa'i spyod
138a8(dkon brtsegs): yul khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu tha smad la spyod pas gsol ba// las dang sems can 'gro ba dang // rnam par smin pa myong ba dag/ de dag thams cad ming tsam du// rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad// 
138b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bung ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// da ltar byung la thogs ma mchis// grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni// 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bung
138b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba la rnam par dpyod pas gsol pa// mi'i dbang pos rnam dpyad nas// byis pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyis pa// dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par// nges par mnyam pa nyi du gzigs// lha'i bu mi gan+da
138b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing // ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dus gsum mngon
138b4(dkon brtsegs): bar skal bas gsol pa// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams// ma mchis dngos po ma ma chis par// skyes bu dam pa bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu chags med
138b5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis gsol pa// dus gsum sems can thams cad la// snying po mchis par ma bstan te// sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang / brag cha lta bur khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis
138b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// dus gsum po dag kun tu yang // sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas na// khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mos pa yongasu rig par byed kyis gsol ba// gang gis nub mo
138b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyis// byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa// de dus tshun chad mos pa la// bri bar gyur pa yong mi gangar// lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni// bar du rgyun
138b8(dkon brtsegs): chang mi 'gyur te// rtag par khyod kyis mos pa nges// khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che// lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa// cha ba las pad+ma ji bzhin du// khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags// 
139a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag gis mi gos te// pad+mar chab kyis ji bzhi no// lha'i bu mos pas yongs grol bas gsol pa// 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni// chos kyi dbyings shes brjod pa ste// gcis
139a2(dkon brtsegs): med gnyisu bgyir ma mchis// smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa// gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur// mdzad pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyang mgon po khyod// brtson 'grus btang ba yod ma mdzad// lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba// dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni// thams cad kun tu rjesu 'jugamadzad pa mdzad kyang
139a4(dkon brtsegs): mgon po khyod // dgongs pa bri ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu sems ma nyam par gzhag pas gsol ba// mgon po rtag tu mnye bzhag ste/ sem sa can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen// 'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni/ 
139a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni// bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyis
139a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad kyi spong // lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa// rnam par grol dang ma grol ba// gang slad khyod kyis ma brnyes pas// mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni/ 
139a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol yongasu nyams mi mnga'// lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol pa// thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas// ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na// rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni// yang dag
139a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyams mi ma lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam par dpyod kyis gsol ba// mar me mdzad pa tshun chadadu// dpa' bro yang dag gzigs khyed kyi// spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste// des na sangs rgyas lags
139b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bstod// lnga'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsel ba// srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du// bde gshegs khyod la chags mi mnga'// chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na// rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mngar/ 
139b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bre gros yangs pas gsel po// thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni// rnam pa kun tu bsnyel mi mnga'// mgon po'i dgongs pa her bzhag pas// thub pa 'bru mar snod dang 'dra// lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med
139b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgren ma khyod la ni// mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi mnga'// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'// lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis
139b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// bde bar gshegs pa khyod la ni// ma brtags btang sboms mi mnga' ste// mi'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos// ma la nges pa ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsal
139b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la ni// 'jig rten gsum na mtshung sa ma mchis// thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa// khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu snying po blangs pas gsol
139b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sems can snying po bla na med// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshalo// gnas gtsang ma pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
139b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang // kun tu drug khris lha ma yin dang // nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu me dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am tse dang / phreng
139b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan glang po che can dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang // sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / dge
140a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstong pa brjod pa yang thos nas// ngo mtshar thob par
140a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thog nas// 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyisu gyur// nem nur dang / the tsom za bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
140a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// kye go'u ta ma sngan cang ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bdag cag ni kun tu rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal/ khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing // 'di ji ltar sngan chad ma thos
140a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ chos 'di la nem nur dang the tsom du gyur te/ sems dang par yang ma gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchiso// 
140a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u tu ma khyod kyis/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'ang bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad// / rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas/ 
140a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher/ go'u ta ma khyod kyi legs par gsungs po 'tshal cing yid rangs par gyur pa mthong ste/ des na bdag cag dge
140a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to// kye go'u tu ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis// chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// zhes smras pa de la/ ji ltar chos thams cad de bzhin
140a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa sum du bdag cag the tsom cher 'tsha'o// dge sbyong go'u tum khyod ni ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don rtogs nas mun pa med par gyur te// stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar
140b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag la chos ston spyod ngo sum ste/ bdag cag dge sbyong goru tam khyod la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu
140b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu rgyu dag de'i phyir khyed cing la dris/ khyed kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig/ dge sbyong go'u tam leg so zhes gsol te/ kun tu rgyu de dag bcom
140b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu rgyu dag khyed kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam/ de dag gis gsol pa/ kye go'u tu ma bdag
140b4(dkon brtsegs): cag gis bstan bcos las thos na/ gsum 'dus nas mang ral du 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang 'di pha dang ma gnyis kyang chog sa pa dang chags par yang gyur pa dang / chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i
140b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis/ rnam par brtags pas 'dra/ dachags kyang byung ba de'i tshe mngal du 'gyur zhe'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du
140b6(dkon brtsegs): sems/ pa dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe/ 'dod chags de'i ma'i sems las byung ngam/ gsol pa kye go/ ru ta ma ma lag so// ma'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye go'u tam ma lag so// de ba'i
140b7(dkon brtsegs): sems las byung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lag so// pha'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lag so// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pha'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngal
140b8(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni lagaso// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji sum du sems/ pha'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u yang ni ma lag so// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam
141a1(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ pha'i kun tu rtog pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni ma lag so// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de lnga las shi 'phos te/ 
141a2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de mi dang lha ma yin dang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
141a3(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos ste ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa 'am/ gzugs med pa zhig
141a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du zhugs/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du
141a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu rgyu dag
141a6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di ni zab cing phra ste mkhas pa shes pa/ blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/ brtag tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la/ blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas/ de ni khyed yun ring por gzhan du bltas
141a7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ gzhan du mos pa/ gzhan du dag gzhan du brtson pa/ gzhan du lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus mod kyi/ kun tu rgyu dag 'on kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshul da
141a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ chos zab mo rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/ kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na/ mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni/ de'i tshul dang / 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa
141b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na/ tshe 'di nyid la mig yong su dag par 'gyur te/ mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyuraro// kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
141b2(dkon brtsegs): mo shes rab kyi mig nyams par gyur pas kyang tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ des kyang chos zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyuraro// kun tu
141b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu khyed kyang yun ring po nas gzhan du ltas pa/ sngon log pa'i gdams ngag gis bslus pa/ chos ma yin pa la cho su 'du shes pa/ thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'du shes pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa ma 'byung bar 'du shes
