250b8(dkon brtsegs): sha s+tha gdug kha za ba dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom bdag kyang bzod par nus/ ral gri shin tu rnon po sna tshogs btab pa dang / mnga' ba dang / mdung dang / mdung thung dang / lcags kyi 'khor lo 'phangs pa dang / 
251a1(dkon brtsegs): / drug gis bzhus pa dag kyang bzod cing / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa med par thad kar g.yul ngor mchong shing / nurur ba dang/ 'gong ba med pas/ mo 'byug la glang po che shim tu dul ba ni/ 'di snyam du
251a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dgra'i g.yul du 'jug par mi bya'o sam chu sems kyi bdag dkra'i g.yul 'di las rgyal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa kho nar za // mo'u 'gal de bzhin dung yang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 
251a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi smon lam rgya chen po btab nas/ sems can rnams la sems dul bar byed pas/ gal te sems can rnams kyis ngag rtsub bos ngal mi sman pa brjod na yang / ngas lan du gnong pa mi bye // ngang rtsod pa
251a4(dkon brtsegs): byed na yang ngas lan mi bye // gal te mtshon cha dang / dbyig dang / gyo mo dang / rdo dag gis nga la gnod pa byas nas/ nga'i srog 'phrog par byed na wang / nga de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
251a5(dkon brtsegs): nur bar gyur pa yang med la/ 'di ni dang du blangs pa'i rig so// 'di ni dang // du blangs pa'i mi rig so// 'di ni bsten par bya ba'i rig so// 'di ni bsten par bya ba'i mi rig so zhes rnam par rtog par yang
251a6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pas/ dngos po de la mya ngan dang 'gyod pa yang med/ khong khro ba dang / khon tu 'dzin pa yang med/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la yongasu skyo ba yang med pas/ 'di snyam du dang bdag dgra'i yul 'dir 'jug par
251a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi// bdag gis sdig pa'i dgra'i sa g.yul yang dag par bcom ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas nas/ khams gsum gyi sems can tshad med pa rnams
251a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bzla bar bya'o snyam du sems dpa' kho nar za // mo'u 'galang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa ci snyed spyod pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pa dang / spring rje ji snyed bskyed pa gal te tshig
251b1(dkon brtsegs): gis brjod par gyur na/ nams kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyuraro// gzhan yang mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ mu stegs can gyi drang srong bzod pa'i stobs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des bdag gis sems can
251b2(dkon brtsegs): la zhe sdang mi bskyed snyam pa'i chos yang dag par blang so// de'i tshe sdig pa'i yid ches bya ba'i bdud gcig yod de// de 'di snyam du bdag deng ci'i phyir/ drang srong de'i drung du song nas bzod pa'i chos bshig ste/ khong khro ba
251b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ bzod pa dang du len pa'i bsam pa las ldog par mi bya snyam du bsams nas/ de nas spyo ba la mkhas pa'i mi bkye nas/ de yong su bskor te/ 'artsub pos spyod nas/ mi bden par skyon nas smos/ 'byung bar mi
251b4(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa'i tshig ngan pa na ba sna tshogs kyis spros te 'gro ba'i tshe yang tshig gis spyos/ grong khyer du phyin pa'i tshe yang spyos/ grong khyer du 'jug pa'i tshe yang spyos/ zan za ba'i tshe yang spros/ zan zos zin pa'i 'og
251b5(dkon brtsegs): tu yang spyos/ star las langs pa'i tshe yang spyos/ grong khyer nas 'byung ba'i tshe yang spyos/ rang gi gnas nags tshal dag tu phyin pa ni tshe yang spyos/ 'greng ba'i tshe yang spyos/ 'dug pa'i tshe yang spyos
251b6(dkon brtsegs): nyal ba'i tshe yang spros/ 'chag pa'i tshe yang spyos/ tha na dbugs rngub pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba'i tshe yang spros te/ rtag par rjesu 'brangs nas tshig ngan sna tshogs kyis rgyun chad pa med par spros so// de'i tshe mi stong po
251b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdud kyis mngags pas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du dag rtsub pos drang srong bzod pa'i stobs la spyo so// de nas bdud sdig pa'i yid kyis drang srong bzod pa'i stobs grong khyer du 'jug pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyis
251b8(dkon brtsegs): gcir gyis de'i mgo'i steng du blugs lhung bzed kyi nang du blugs/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed la yang bskus/ lus la yang bskus/ phyag dar gyis mgo la yang gto ro// de'i tshe drang srong bzod pa'i stobs lo brgya
252a1(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhi stong gi bar du spyod pa la dpa' ba'i mi stong gis ngag rtsub pos spyos shing spang par gyur kyang / de'i sems la zhe sdang dang / khon tu 'dzin pa yang med la tha na sems la nur zhing zhum par
252a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yang mdo// bdag nyid kyang 'di skad du bdag gis nyes pa ci byas shes kyang mi zer la/ khon du 'dzin pa yang me ngo // lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du sdang mig gis bdud sdig pa'i yid la bltas pa yang med la/ 
252a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la les pa ci yod ces smras pa medo// mo'u 'gal spyod pa la dpa' ba'i mi stong po de dag gis drang srong bzong ba'i stobs la lo brgyad khri ba'i stong las 'das pa'i bar du spyos kyang / gzhig mi nus par rig nas/ shin
252a4(dkon brtsegs): tu ngang ba'i bsam pa bskyed/ kha na mtho ba rnams kyang bshags nas 'di skad khyod kyis dngos po 'dis chos ci lta bu zhig yongasu tshol/ khangs cas kyang chos de thos par 'tsha lo zhes spraso// mo'u 'bal spyo la/ 
252a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba'i mi stong po de dag drang srong la shin tu dang ba thob pas gus pa// 'i sems kyis mchod cing rim gror byas// bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// drang srong yang de dag gis rim gro
252a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bsnyen bkur byas pa nyam su blangs kyang / sems la mngon par zhen cing chags pa ci yang med par gyur to// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong bzod pa'i stobs shes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa
252a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin// ngas de'i tshe bzod pa'i chos de lta bu yang dag par blangs pas/ bdud sdig pa'i yid kyis mi stong bkye ste/ rgyun chang pa med par ngag rtsub pos smros shing
252a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag par ngal spang bar gyur kyang / nga'i sems la g.yo zhing gyur ba cing yang me // mo'u 'gal spyo ba la dpa' ba'i skyes bu stong po de dag drang srong bzod pa'i stobs la shin tu dang ba skyes te/ sdig pa bshags nas/ 
252b1(dkon brtsegs): phra srong bzong ba'i stobs kyis rjes bla na med ba yang ngas par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ de'i tshangs yong su btul nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yang dag par bkod de/ skyes bu myong po dag pha rol tu phyin
252b2(dkon brtsegs): drug phun sum tshogs par spyad pas/ mthar gyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ thams cad lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis
252b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud sdig pa'i yid skyes bu stong bkye nas/ ngal sbyor bcug pa de gzhan zhig yin sngam du sems na/ de ltar mi lta ste/ de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yi no// 'phags pa dkor mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
252b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// bas po drug pa ste bam// gzhan yang mo'u 'ag la ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus mangs rang gi lus sems can
252b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yongasu btang nas 'jig rten gyi skye bo rnams kyi dam dang / g.yos/ byas pas/ de'i tshe skye bo mang po de dag gis ngal las rnam pa sna tshogs byed bu cug ste/ kha gcig gis ming la bshang
252b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dor du bcu go/ kha cig gis ni nga la lung 'dor du bcu go/ kha cig gis ni nga las 'dor du bcug go// kha cig gis ni nga la rtsa lan du btango // kha cig gis ni nga la 'bru dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / 'bru mar
252b7(dkon brtsegs): dang sbrang rtsi len du ba // kha cig gis ning la shing dang / sol ba dang / me dang / mu len du bcug ste/ 'di lta bu la stsoms pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba cug kyang / mo'u 'gal dade'i tshe gang gisang bshang
252b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dor du bcug pa de'i rjesu mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi dro'o// gang gis ngal me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi bye ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'bras bu len du byang / 
253a1(dkon brtsegs): ba las/ de'i rje su ma song ba mi dra'o// mo'u 'gal gang gis leg pa byeng bcug pa'i rjesu ni 'gro bar bya/ legs pa ma yin pa byed bcug pa'i rje su ni 'gro bar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa ngas
253a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjesu mi dran mo'u 'gal ngas de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi rjesu ni 'brang bar bya/ bram ze'i rjesu ni 'brang bar mi bya/ bram ze'i rje su ni 'brang bar bya/ rgyal rigs kyi rjesu ni 'brang bar mi bya/ rlangs rigs kyi rje su ri 'brang
253a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ gdol pa'i rje su ni 'brang bar mi bya/ gdol ba'i rjesu ni 'brangs par bya/ dmangs rigs kyi rje su ni 'brang bar mi bya/ rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs kyi rje su ni 'brang bar bya/ dmangs rigs dang gdol ba'i rjesu ni
253a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brang bar mi bya'o// sum du sems bskyeng bar yang mi dran la/ gang zag 'di ni che'o// gang zag 'di ni chu ngo zhes de dag gi khyad par dang gang zag 'di'i rje su ni 'brang bar bya/ gang zag 'di'i rje su ni 'brang bar mi
253a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam du sems pa yang med kyi mo'u 'gal gang gis nga sngar pos/ ba'i rjesu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba kho mar zang // mo'u Sha gal ngas mngon par dran te/ nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang
253a6(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis chos bzhin gyi bya ba dag da byed bcug pa las/ nus bzhin du ma byas pa yod par nam yang mi dran// mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bya ba'i
253a7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dag nges par mthar ma phyin pa 'am/ dge ba'i lam mngon par 'du bya ba dge ba gang yang mthar phyin pa yod pa rjesu mi dran// mdor na ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yang lus la
253a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen par gyur pa yang med na/ nor gyi dngos po la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ long spyod kyi dngos po dag la 'di ni bdag gi long spyod yin no// snyam pa'i 'du shes
253b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa med kyang / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis long spyod dang ldan par gyur par zad pas/ long spyod kyi dngos po dag la/ 'di snyam du sems te/ dngos po 'di dag ni sems can rnams dang thun mong du longs
253b2(dkon brtsegs): spong bar bya ste/ dngos po 'di la bdag gi skal ba yod pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang skal ba yod do snyam du sem so// mo'u 'gal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye bar gyur
253b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bdag gi long spong la bdag kyang skal ba yod/ sems can la yang skal pa yod do snyam du mi sems kyi/ long spong 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi yin pas bdag la skal pa ci yang medo snyam du sems pa kho nar
253b4(dkon brtsegs): zang ngo // mo'u 'ag langs sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye bar gyur pa rjes thob par gyur kyang / de la mngon par len po yang med/ yongasu spyad cing len par yang mi byed pas chos rnams yongasu spong ba la mos pa
253b5(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi/ chos rnams dang du len pa la mos par mi bye'o// stong pa'i chos thams cad la mos par byed kyi yong ba'i chos thams cad la mos par mi bye // nye bar ni ba'i chos thams cad la
253b6(dkon brtsegs): mos par byed kyi/ chos rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid la mos par mi bye // gzod ma nas med pa nyid la mos par byed kyi/ gzod ma nas yod pa nyid la mos par mi bye // mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te 'angs
253b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa sde mtshan mo mur ba'i nang na rang gi lus me spar nas/ lam stor ba'i sems can rnams snang ba byas te lam bstan to// mo'u 'gal
253b8(dkon brtsegs): ngas mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa s+yeru sha za ba'i sems can rnams la rang gi sha bcang nas sbyin pa yongasu btang // mo'u 'ag langs
254a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams la lus las khrag byung ste/ sbyin pa yong su
254a2(dkon brtsegs): btang nas/ rab tu tshim par byaso// mo'u 'gal mdor na 'jig rten pa'i nor rdzas sam/ long spyod par bya ba ci yang rung ste/ sems can rnams la nam yang phangs shing ser sna byas ma myong ste/ thams cad kyang
254a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la 'che ba med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gnang ngam/ 'phags pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur pa de ltar ngas yun ring por brtags pa sems can rnams la
254a4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje'i bsam pa rab tu bskye // gzhan yang mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ tshong dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas/ rin po che lem
254a5(dkon brtsegs): song ba las/ bde bar sngar log ste/ rang gi yul du phyin nas/ grong khyer du zhugs te/ khyim gyi sgor phyin pa dang / de'i tshe grong khyer na gnas pa'i slongs mo pa mang po rnams kyis de yongasu
254a6(dkon brtsegs): bskor nas/ de'i mdun du 'di skad ces smraso// legs par rnyeng po bang bar byon tam/ sbyin bdag chen po bdag cag slong ba mchis te/ gal te gnang bar gyur na/ bdag cag bslang bar 'tsha'o// mo'u 'gal
254a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe legs par rlung pas spongs mo pa de dag la 'di skad ces khyod spongs cig dang / bdag la ci 'jog pa phangs pa med par sbyin par bya'o zhes smraso// de nas spongs mo pa rnams kyis legs par rnyeng ba
254a8(dkon brtsegs): la spras pa/ khyod kyis rgya mtsho cher po nas rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che rnams bdag cag la byin cig dang / des na bdag cag rab tu bangade bar 'gyur// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe legs par rung bas nor bu rir po
254b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig gcig yang gser srang brgya stong du ma ri bye ba phrag brgya bcu sbed kyi rin po che rnams ma lus par slongs mo pa rnams la byin te/ mo'u 'gal legs par rnyed nges de ltar nor mang po rnams yongs
254b2(dkon brtsegs): btang bar gyur kyang / sems la gyur pa 'am/ 'gyod par gyur pa ci yang mdo// de'i tshe legs par rnyeng pas rin po che mang po slongs mo pa rnams la yongasu btang nas/ khyim du yang ma zhugs par slar
254b3(dkon brtsegs): log ste/ rgya mtshor zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las/ snga ma bas phyed gyur gyis rin po che mang po thob par gyur te/ lo brgyad cu 'das nas slar rang gi yul du phyin nas/ grong khyer du 'jug
254b4(dkon brtsegs): pa las de'i tshe nyes pa byas pa'i mi ngag gcig gshed ma pas bzung ste/ bcangs nas mi sman pa'i sgra bsgrags pa'i rnga yang brdungs/ lam gyi bzhi mdo rnamasu bsgrags pa yang byas nas/ gsang
254b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnasu khrid/ gsang par byas pa las/ de'i tshe gsad pa la thugs pa de dag rgyang nas/ legs par rnyed pa mthong ba dang / 'di skad ces smraso// tshong dpon bdag cag la mi 'jigs
254b6(dkon brtsegs): pa byim cig/ bdag cag gsad pa'i nyes pa las skyobs la/ bdag cag la srog byin cig/ khyod ni sbyin bdag chen po skyes bu dam pa las so// legs par rnyed pas de skad ces smras pa thos pa dang
254b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang pa la thug pa de dag la/ kye khyed la mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing / khyed gsang ba'i nyes pa las yongasu bskyab par bya'o zhes smras nas/ gshed ma pa de dag gi drung du song nas/ re re la yang nor bu rin po che gsar srang bye ba rib
254b8(dkon brtsegs): re re byin nas/ khyad cag deng bdag rgyal po'i drung mas/ slar mo 'ongs kyi bar du skad cig sdod cig ces smras te/ de nas legs par rnyed pa myur zhing rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces smrasgo// rgyal po chen po bdas ni
255a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che gzang po dag gis mi 'di dag gi grog mjal bar 'tsha'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ legs par rnyed pa mi 'di dag gi nyes pa ni btang du mi rung bas// btsong du myi ru // gal te snying thag
255a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyo bar 'dod na/ khyod la nor ci bdog bzang bar ngal byin la/ bdag nyid kyang shi bar khas lem na gdod btang // mo'u 'gal de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas de skad smras pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ khag
255a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnying ba chen po thob pas/ spor ba rnams yongasu rdzogs par gyur te/ mi 'di dag gi skyabs byas par gyur pa ni bdag gi ying tshim par gyur to zhes/ de nas legs par rnyed pas mi de dag bskyabs te/ gsang ba'i ces pa las
255a4(dkon brtsegs): thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ khyim na nor ci bdog pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po mas thob pa'i nor rin po che gser dang / dngul la stsogs pa bye ba stong phrag tshang med pa rnams rgyal po la phul nas/ 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal po mi
255a5(dkon brtsegs): nga gtang du gsol// bdag la nor ci mchis pa ni bas par 'dir mchis lag so// rgyal pos nor rnams blangs nas gagadam dag la bsgo ba/ legs par rnyed pa 'di khridang la song cig/ lhang
255a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'tsha lo zhes rgyal po'i bka' nyan nas/ legs par rnyed pa bcings te/ gsang ba'i gnasu khrid nas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste/ legs par rnyed pa la mtshon gdab par gzas pa las lag pa rengs nas
255a7(dkon brtsegs): gdab tu ma btub pa dang / skrag cing ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ legs par rnyed pa khrid/ rgyal po la dngos po 'di zhib tu gsol to// mo'u 'gal rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ bdag nyid mtshon thogs te/ 
255a8(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pa gsang bar 'dong ba'i phyir/ mtshon bteg ste gdab par gzas pa las/ de'i tshe rgyal po de'i lag pa gnyis sa la lhung ste/ sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa chen po thob nas skad ngan phyung ste/ 'chi ba'i dus bya/ 
255b1(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon legs pa rnyed pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa de snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa de ni lhas byin blun po 'di
255b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid yino// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe dus na yang lhas byin gyis nga'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las/ dbrog par mi nuso// de ngang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe yang
255b3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las/ 'brog par ma nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang gnod pa bya bar mi nus na/ lhas byin blun po
255b4(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci dgos paso// lhas byin ni da ltar yang grogs po ma rungs pa bsdus nas ngal gsod par yang 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang thabs kyis nga gsod par 'dod pas rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / mthu stobs
255b5(dkon brtsegs): nyams nas/ gson por lus 'di dang bcas par sems can/ dmyal ba mnar med par lhung bar gyur to// mo'u 'gal nga/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang
255b6(dkon brtsegs): sang lhas byin lta bur phan gdags pa yang dag par rje su mthong na/ lhas byin ni byas pa drin du mi gzo'o// nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la pho ma lta bur gyur pa'i rgyu dang
255b7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen nges na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang mo'u 'gal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ gangs ri'i rgyal po'i drung na glang po che
255b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya zhig gnas te/ de'i nang ra glang po che'i rgyal po bdag por gyur pa byang bzhin sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ stobs po che shes pa dang ldan pa gcig yod de// de'i tshe glang po che mang po rnams ri srang nyam nga zhing ngog
256a1(dkon brtsegs): la lam gcig las med pa zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par gyur pa rngon pas mthong nas/ mtshan thog thag lam nyam nga ba der rlabs chen po brkos nas/ 'di snyam du glang po che mang po 'di dag ni 'di
256a2(dkon brtsegs): lhung bar gyur pas/ thams cad bdag dbang ste/ bdag gis dga' mgur blang bar bya'o snya mo// mtshan thog theg rlubs brkos zin nas/ glang po che mang po rnams btang ste/ lam nyam nga zhing rlabs kyi steng du bta // glang po
256a3(dkon brtsegs): che mang po rnams 'byung bar byas las/ rlubs chen po yod par mthong nas/ dgal bar ma nuso// mo'u 'gal ngo'i tshe/ glang po che'i bdag po nges bdag nyid kyi lus rlabs kyi steng du 'phreng du nyal te/ zam pa byas nas
256a4(dkon brtsegs): glang po che lnga brgya rgyab kyi steng du brdzis nas/ de las rgal te dong ngo // glang po che mang po bzlas nas/ bdag nyid kyi mthus mchongs bu byas te song ba dang / de'i tshe ri'i lha zhig gis tshigasu bcang smras pa/ 
256a5(dkon brtsegs): sdig can rlubs zab brkos gyur kyang // de nas glang bdag blo lnga na gyis// bdag dang gzhan gyis bzlas pas na// don med rU bas zab brkos 'gyur ba// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis nga'i tshe de'i dus na
256a6(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i rgyal po dbang po rno zhing mthu chen po dang ldan par gyur pa byung ba de gzhan yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yino// de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che lnga brgya byung ba de dag ni da ltar gyi dge
256a7(dkon brtsegs): slong lnga brgya po lhas byin gyis gzhig par byas par brtsams pa dag yino// de'i tshe de'i dus na ston par gyur pa de dag ni lhas byin la stsogs pa dge slong lnga brgya po 'di lta ste/ khan nga 'dra bya dang / ka ta mo ra ka dang
256a8(dkon brtsegs): ti sha rgya mtsho byin dang / ko ka li la stsogs pa yi no// mo'u 'gal nga ni yun ring po nas rtag par sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams mthong bar gyur na/ de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin no// sems can
256b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bangag mthong na/ bde ba byiro// sems can dbul phongs pa dag gi zang zing yongasu gtong // sems can gang lam log par zhugs pa dag la ni yang dag pa'i lam bstan to// sems can gang nad kyis gzir pa da/ 
256b2(dkon brtsegs): la ri rad kyi sdug bsngal yongasu bsal to// sems can gang bkres shing skom pa rnams la ni bza' ba dang / btung ba yongasu gtang // sems can gang sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba dag la ni/ lus kyi sha dang khrag gis tshim
256b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byaso// mo'u 'gal ba ni smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yang dag par byas pas/ ngas sems can rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang / sgom las med par byas te/ mo'u 'gal ngas sems
256b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi bden tshig ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la/ tha dad par gyur pa ci yang med de/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang
256b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag le lo dang / sbom las kyis bar chad byas par gyur/ na/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon/ bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ mo'u 'gal
256b6(dkon brtsegs): da ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yi no// thugs rje chen po'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid dge slong glang po che'i lag ces bya ba
256b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
256b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las dka' ba spyod pa'i dngos po 'di dag thos pas lus kyi spu yang ldang zhing / mchi ma byung bar gyur to// deng bdag gis dngos po gcig zhu bar 'tshal te/ 
257a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di ska dus sngon byang chub sems dpa' 'dzang ba'i tshe/ ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin zhes gsungs pas/ bcom
257a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni dang po thugs bskyed pa nas/ sems can thams cad yongasu bzla bar thugs ngam bzhes pa lags te/ gal te de lta bu'i thugs ngam bzhes pa lags par gyur na/ da ltar yongasu bzla bar mdzad par
257a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can da dung ma bas par/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gal te 'ga' zhig mchis nas/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad khyod kyi ston pa chen
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bo sngon sems can thams cad yongasu bzla bar thugs dam bzhe so zhe na/ sems can nga dung ma zad par bdag nyid yongasu mya ngan la sa 'das par gyur pa de ci'i phyir zhes rgol ba zhig mchis par gyur
257a5(dkon brtsegs): ma de la ji sa du lan gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan la/ sa kyis dge slong glang po che'i lag la bka' stsal ba/ gal te 'ga' zhig de skad rgol ba zhig yod par gyur na/ de nyid la
257a6(dkon brtsegs): slar 'di skad dris shig/ khyod kyis chos ci lta zhig la sems can yin par 'dod/ des gal te 'di skad phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams gang yin pa de dag la sems can yin par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de
257a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid la slar 'di skad dris shig ci phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams 'dus shing tshogs pa la sems can yin par 'dong ngam// 'on te bral zhing gyes par gyur pa la sems can yin pa 'dod / des thal
257a8(dkon brtsegs): te 'di skad phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams 'dus pa la sems can yin par 'dod zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad smos shig/ khyod bdag nyid kyis lan btab zi no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus pa ni sems
257b1(dkon brtsegs): can yin la/ rung ba dang / skye mched dang / khams ni sems can ma yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa yang bral zhing gyes par bya ba'i che du gsungs pa yin gyi/ tshogs shing 'du ba'i phyir nim yi no// cos
257b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bral zhing gyes pa'i spyod pa la dgyes pa yin gyi// 'dus shing tshogs pa la dgyes pa ma yin te/ tshogs shing 'dus pa las sems can med paso// des gal te 'di skadaru/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams
257b3(dkon brtsegs): nying sems can yin zhes zer na/ de la slar 'di skadadu smos shig/ gal te de ltar na rdza dang / shing dang / gyo mo dang / rdo ba thams cad kyang sems can yin pa 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod phung po dang / skye mched
257b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams nyid sems can yin zhes zer la/ de dag la yang phung bro dang / skye mched dang / khams yod pas so// des gal te 'di skad du de dag la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos kyang med
257b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ sems can ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad / sa spros shig/ gal te de ltar na sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig yin pa nyid du 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
257b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams ngag la tha dad pa yod par mi gsung bas so// des gal te 'di skad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ sems can yod par gsungs pas/ de'i phyir sem
257b7(dkon brtsegs): can yod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du spros shig/ khyod nyid kyis lan btab zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las yod pa dang / meng pa las dben pa shes gsungs paso// des
257b8(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'di skad gal te de lta ma/ 'o na ni lam gyi 'bras bu yang med par 'gyu ro zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad khyod kyis gang zhig la 'bras bu yin par 'dod ces dris shig/ des gal te 'di skad bang sa ni
258a1(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa nges par gyur pa gang yin pa de la 'bras bu yin par 'dod zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad rnam par nges pa'i ngor ngam pa la ni sgra dang / tshig meng la/ smra dang tshig med pa la ni nges par
258a2(dkon brtsegs): yod ces 'am/ med ces brjod du med pas/ khyod kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la 'bras bu yin par 'dod la/ rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la ni sems can yang med/ sems can gyi ming yang med pas/ 
258a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can yod do zhes gang smras pa'i tshig de rang nyid kyis bshig pa yino zhes smros shig/ gzhan yang glang po'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las/ chos rnams 'gag pa med par
258a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa yang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pa yin te/ ngas de ltar chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa sa/ ji ltar thugasu chud pa'i chos rnams sems can la mngon par zhen
258a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / mngonan ra 'du bya ba med cing 'byung ba med pa nyid bstan pa min// glang po che'i lag gang gis de ltar ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi ngon shes
258a6(dkon brtsegs): ba des ci yod pa dang / med pa'i che bu las kyi spyod pa slong bar mi bye // gang gis yod pa dang / med pa'i che du las kyi spyod pa mi slong ba des ji ltar sems can yod pa dang / sems can med par mthong bar 'gyur
258a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ glang po che'i lag 'di ni rtag par chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la ni rjesu dran pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yang med/ dri ma yang med/ yongasu dag pa yang med/ 
258a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ lam yang med/ lam gyi 'bras bu yang med/ ring po yang med/ thung ngu yang med/ gru bzhi yang med/ zlum po yang med/ dbyibs kyang med/ kha dog kyang med pas/ 
258b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i phyir chos rnams ri sgo gcig kho na ste/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bstan pa yino// glang po che'i lag 'di ni chos kyi sgo mthong ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis chos mthong ba'i sgor zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas mthong ba
258b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// glang po che'i lag 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i chos de ci 'gags pa dang / 'gag pa dang / 'gag par 'gyur ba'i 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid gcig yin snyam
258b3(dkon brtsegs): mam bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i chos de ci skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan cing gcig yin sum mam/ bcom
258b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// glang po che'i lag gal te de lta ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gag pa zhes mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de de lhur lag so// glang po che'i lag nges gal te 'di skad sku'i mtshan dang
258b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ bdag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yongs mya ngam/ las 'das par zhugs nas/ slar ldog par mi 'gyuraro// zhes smras pa yang / sku'i mtshan nyid phyir mi ldog par mthong ba
258b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gags pa zhes bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du dris shig/ ci khyod sku'i mtshan yongasu grub pa la ngo bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod ngam/ des gal te 'di skad byungs
258b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sku'i mtshan yongasu grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod ngo zhes zer na de la 'di skad smos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab las sku'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
258b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes ma gsungs te/ gal te sku'i mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yino zhes brjod na ni gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ri dang / klung dang / rtswa shing thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par 'gyu ro// des gal te 'di
259a1(dkon brtsegs): srang gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ri dang / rlung dang / du shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes mi bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di ska du smos
259a2(dkon brtsegs): shig khyed kyis smras pa ltar mtshan sum cu rgya gnyis dang ldan pas ma sa mamama'am tshan mabya 'dus ba mas sangam 'angs ma mab sa mas pa'i bram zes kyang sangs rgyas 'gyur
259a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes lung bstan pa'i dngos po de dben pas so zhes zer na de la 'di skad smos shig/ gal te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni/ khyod bdag nyid kyis mtshan mkhan gyis
259a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas/ mngon par rto gas par sangs rgyas par 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan pa yin/ zhes smras pas// deng khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
259a5(dkon brtsegs): shod cig/ nges gal te 'di skad bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa sa bco brgyad dang / zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang
259a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan cing skyon to zhes zer na/ de la 'di ska du smos shig/ khyod kyis stobs bcu
259a7(dkon brtsegs): la stsogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yino zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa shod cig/ des gal te 'di skad ci sangs rgyas dang mtshan tha dad pa
259a8(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin nag zhes zer na/ de la 'di skadadu khyod cing mtshan sangs rgyas yin zhes zer bar zad kyi/ mtshan ni sangs rgyas ma yino zhes spros shig/ des gal te yang 'di ga du dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i
259b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan tshig sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu la stsags pa'i mtshan nyid med par gyur ram zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smos shig/ dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos ji ltar dbyibs dang bcas shing / kha dog dang bcas pa'i
259b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyod kyis gal te dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos la sangs rgyas shes bya zhes zer na/ 'o na ni gzhan dbyibs med cing / kha dog med pa'i chos thams cad kyang
259b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yin par gyur pa'i rig so// gal te chos de dag sangs rgyas yin par gyur ma ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bcwo brgyad dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang
259b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam pa ra thar pa dang / ting 'dzin la stsogs pa yang de'i mtshan nyid bye dbar gyur pa'i rig so// zhes brjod par bya'o// glang po che'i lag nga'i
259b5(dkon brtsegs): can thos rnams ni de ltar skyes bu blun po rnams rab tu 'dul bar bye // gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
259b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongasu bzla bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab mod kyi/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sems can yang
259b7(dkon brtsegs): ma dmigs sems can gyi ming yang ma dmigs pas/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos dngos po 'di yod pa'i phyir/ dngos po 'di yod/ dngos
259b8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di med pa'i phyir/ dngos po 'di med par rtogs pa khe nang zang // dngos po gang yod pa'i phyir/ dngos po gang yod/ dngos po gang med pa'i phyir/ dngos po gang med par 'gyur ce na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi
260a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams yod par gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi/ 
260a2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi/ rga shi'i rkyen gyis mya ngan
260a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams yod par gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gags pa'i
260a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ 'du byed rnams 'gag/ 'du byed rnams 'gags pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pa'i
260a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pa'i rgyu ra/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pa'i phyir/ srengad pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags
260a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pa'i phyir/ rga shi 'gag/ rga shi 'gags pa'i phyir/ mya ngan dang / 
260a7(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyuraro// nga de las mig dang / 
260a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang / rig pa dang / blo skyes pas/ 'di ltar dbus dang / tha ma med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba rab tu rtogs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i / 
260b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ga'am yang gang yang thob par gyur pa med kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i chos dmigs pa kho nar zo // glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de bzhin du sems can rnam
260b2(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par rab tu ston to// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni gyur pa med par rtag tu gnas pas
260b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs kyang stor bar mi 'gyur la/ phan tshun 'gal ba yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'byung ba yang me do// glang po che'i lag nga ni rtag par de ltar chos ston pas/ khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa
260b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rig par bya'o// ngas khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na/ khyed kyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// glang po che'i lag ston pa chen pos slob ma rnams la gang bya ba'i rig pa de dag
260b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas ma lus par byas zin pas/ khyed kyis ji skad bstan pa ba/ zhin du mngon par sgrubs nas/ chos rnams las ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
260b6(dkon brtsegs): ba glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur pa zhig yin na/ su zhig la
260b7(dkon brtsegs): ston par gyur/ lam stor pa med pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o// dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas 'di yang sems can thams cad los
260b8(dkon brtsegs): su ma bzlas pa zhes bya'o// zhes mchi na/ de la ji skad lan gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag gal te de skad 'dri ba yod na/ de la 'di skadadu lan gdab par
261a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthong la/ rtag par sems can bzla ba'i dus lagazhes pas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'dra
261a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur kyang / dadud par pa mdzad pa yino// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas/ de nyid
261a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gtsang bar mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni sangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bstan to// de
261a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing ji ltar spyod pa
261a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o// zhes brjod par bya'o// / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
261a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba legs par thug su chud pa lags te/ chos thams cad legs par thugasu chud pa'i sla sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las mkhyen pa sngon du gtong zhing
261a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i rjesu 'brang bas na/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mdzad cing / ji skad mdzad pa bzhin du gsung bar gyur pa ni shin tu ngo mtsha
261a8(dkon brtsegs): che lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ glang po che'i lag khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du du ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 
261b1(dkon brtsegs): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras par gyur pa yi no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad su zhig nor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas/ sems can la
261b2(dkon brtsegs): ban 'dogs pas/ lha dang bde ba 'god pa dang / thams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas/ yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu
261b3(dkon brtsegs): byon nas/ da dung ma rgal ba dag yongasu zlos shes zer ba la/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga yino zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang
261b4(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig 'di skad su zhig bslu ba med cing / bya ba byas pa'i drin gzo ba yin zhes zer ba la/ de ni nga yino zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ sems can gang la la zhig nga la bya
261b5(dkon brtsegs): ba cung zad cig byas pa'i dngos po de yang chung za bar mi 'gyuraro// glang po che'i lag nga ni dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun chad/ bar der ram
261b6(dkon brtsegs): yang sems la ldog cing gyur pa yang med la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur par yang dag par rjesu mi dran yang ngas chos de thos nas sems rtse gcig tu
261b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongasu gnyer ba la gzung bar 'dun par gyur pa kho nar za // glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ nga mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i tshe/ shes rab
261b8(dkon brtsegs): gsal zhing rno la/ mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze gzhonu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmigs
262a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i ban yor mthong nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ lam bsgoms par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i tha 'ongs pa dang ngas chos bstan pas/ rang sangs
262a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam thob par gyur nas/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing / sems la rang dbang thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ rtag par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ na mkha' la mngon par
262a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu zhugs te/ bsod snyoms bslangs nas/ ngal rim gro byaso// nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di dag ni yongasu dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ bdag
262a4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di dag gi mchod pa blang ba'i mi rig so snyam du sems par gyur to// drang srong de dag ngas rje su bstan pa'i phyir/ de lta bu'i nga chos thob par gyur kyang / ngas thob par ma gyur pas/ chos de thob par
262a5(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir na/ na tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to// glang po che'i la gangs nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas/ chos de mngon du byas pa'i
262a6(dkon brtsegs): cher gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te/ mngon du lung bstan nas/ nga la 'di skad kyi ye shes 'di la mngon par zhen par ma byed cig/ khyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par/ 
262a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can tshad med/ dpag tu med pa rnams yongasu zlos par 'gyu ro zhes bsgo'o// glang po che'i lagang de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba thos nas/ lam bsgom pa btang bas/ sems
262a8(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du dben par 'dug pa'i tshe/ dga' bas lus kun tu khyab par gyur to// glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ 
262b1(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing / rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rig par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
262b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas/ gzhan dag kyang sems bskyed par bskul ba yin/ theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong na/ phrag dog kyang mi byed la/ bla na med pa
262b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyis thob par bya ba ma yin snyam du sems pa yin/ sems can nyes pa spyod pa dag la dus dusu rjesu 'dems shing
262b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bzang pos gtam dag smras nas/ de dag gis dge ba yongasu bsrung bar byed pa yin/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyi chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing gzhan dag la bstan nas/ 
262b5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/ glang po che'i lag byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di// ngag dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la/ bdag
262b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcang bka' stsal pa/ byang chub
262b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtan sems kyis/ bla med theg la rab gnas shing / sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas// theg pa de la 'god par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod tshe// rtag par phrag dog khrong khro med// nan tan brtson 'grus
262b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsom byed pas// dga' ba'i sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur// sems can sdig spyod mthong gyur na// 'du shes rje su 'dems par byed// rtag par byams dang snying rjer ldan// khong khro dag ni med pa yin// rtag par nan tan chos
263a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyer nas// sems can rnams la spel bar byed// ji ltar char ni rlar byed ltar// chos kyis thams cad tshim par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur bas// the tsom
263a2(dkon brtsegs): sems ni ma bskyed ces// lha rnams kyis ni go bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' sa de thos nas// nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par byed// dngos po 'di ni nges bden pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas nges 'grub sems// byang chub sems dpa'
263a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni// brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam dang // dran pa dang ni shes rab dag// bdag nyid rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 'jig rten du ni 'byung 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 'di
263a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i ston ldan par 'gyur// gang zag chen pos bkur 'gyur zhing // rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang // thams cad sems ni rab dga' zhing // lam ldan yin par rig par 'gyur// bstan chos gtsug lag tshig dang dom/ 
263a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru tshogs bcang rtsis dang grangs// de dag thams cad legs rtog sa pas// sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dbang po ldan bshes rab ldan// bya ba stobs la mi ltos par// thabs dang ldan pa/ 
263a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig gis// thams cad yongasu grub par nus// dgra rnams rab tu 'dul ba yang // lus kyi zho sha mi bltos par// shes rab stobs ni 'ba' zhig gis// rang gi sems ni 'dul bar byed// sems can rab tu ba
263a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir// 'jig rten du ni skyes pas na// rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang // ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang smra bas na// de'i ya mtshan kun gyis rig/ ci phyir de ltar rig ce na// bdag sems
263a8(dkon brtsegs): shes shes sems phyi ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthob bas na// der song chos ni rab zhus nas// sems can rgya cher yang phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas lus lan gsungs pas na// the tsom
263b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni chad par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas// thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar lung bston pas// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// sems
263b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dpa' ba thob par 'gyur// shin tu 'phags pa'i nor rnams dang sa phyi nang kun la chags med pas// de phyir dga' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par shes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yis// 
263b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod ba gya nom thob pas na// de phyir dga' ba cher po yis// bdag cid sangs rgyas grub par shes// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // chos brtar mi rung rig pas na// de 'dra'i shes rab thob 'gyur nas// lus ni
263b4(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' 'phags par 'gyur// de'i sems ni nang mi gnas// phyi rol na yang mi gnas te// 'du shes thams cad 'das pas na// de phyir bzod pa bla med thob// yun rings byams dang snying rje yis// sems can
263b5(dkon brtsegs): kun la sems pas na// de phyir bsod nams de'i dbang // sangs rgyas tshad med mthong bar 'gyur// de'i lus ni thams cad kun/ sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med// de 'dra'i bzod pa thob pas na/ 
263b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la// su zhig rjes slob mi byed// rab brta nadam chos gang gnas pa// 'di 'dra' yon tan thob par 'gyur// de phyir lam ni gcer ba dag/ rtag
263b7(dkon brtsegs): par rar tar chos gnyer bya// chos kyis bdag gi khe btsal nas// byang chub la ni phan gdags bya// brgal pa'i lan btab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa khyams
263b8(dkon brtsegs): mi bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la shin tu brtan par gnas par
264a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ nga ni yun ring po nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos
264a2(dkon brtsegs): la shin tu brtan par gnas pa gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar snyan pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcang bka' stsal ba/ chos gcer chos ni gang thob pa// de ni sangs rgyas lam ma
264a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa// chos ma yin pa spong bar 'gyur// rtag tu yang dag lam spyod pa// log pa'i lam ni spong bar byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag sten pa// de ni lam la sten par 'gyur// des na mi/ 
264a4(dkon brtsegs): khom rnam spangs nas// khom ldan ngag ni thob par 'gyur// khom ldan gnas ni thob 'gyur na// brtson 'grus brtsams pa chud mi za// gnas gci su ni mchog tu btsun// kha dog gzugs ni mchog tu 'gyur/ 
264a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yog 'khor dag ni phun tshogs shing // thams cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// brtan pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni// tshul tshwa mas bzod pa'i mchog la gnas// brtson 'grus phyogs
264a6(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas shing // bsam gtan shes rab 'phel bar byed// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur// yon ton kun gyi mchog gyur pas// don rig 'jigs pa ci yang med// den
264a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid/ bdag cag ni sngon dang po nas le lo can du gyur pas/ 
264a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis shing // bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur pa mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pas na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag cing nges
264b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byung bar gyur pa lag so snyam sems leg so/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng sngan chang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzeng bstod cing / spro ba bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'gong par bgying lag so// de ci'i slang nye na/ 
264b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi che du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha
264b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug mdzad/ de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang ma mchis na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bso// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de dag
264b4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad byang chub sems dang 'i spyang pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de lta
264b5(dkon brtsegs): batshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyad de/ bla na ma mchis pa yang
264b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo yong su bskor te/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongasu bzla bar bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
264b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ khyed kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sen
264b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba yongasu gcer ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po ldan pa yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi che du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de lnga
265a1(dkon brtsegs): bu'i smon lam chen po dang / dga' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa/ shin tu dka' ba/ tshad med dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dang ldan par gyur pa yino// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
265a2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga'
265a3(dkon brtsegs): shing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do// gang po'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang po'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bdun pa
265a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzog s+ho// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bco brkyang ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa/ 
265a5(dkon brtsegs): bar po dang po/ @/ rgya gar skang ar+ya ra swA bA la pa ri bring tshan mA ma hA yA na sU t+yA/ bong sa du/ 'phags pa yum 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas
265a6(dkon brtsegs): nga byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong cis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
265a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/ skye ba gcig
265a8(dkon brtsegs): gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas/ yon tan gyi chog
265b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun du mig dang / kun tu lta ba dang / kun tu 'od gzer dang / kun tu 'ong dang / blo gros mchog dang / blo gros
265b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po
265b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jam dpal la stsogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / bzang skyong la stsogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu
265b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dab nga bo thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / 
265b5(dkon brtsegs): mamakha' lding gi dbang po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khor ba rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bcu gso// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la btsun
265b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni mngon par 'phags/ nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang / zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba ni mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya
265b7(dkon brtsegs): byin ltar sku ni bsnyen par dkar// 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan// seng+ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni sgrogs// me'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad
265b8(dkon brtsegs): la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan lda du tshu po u nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu 'bar zhing // stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/ don
266a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par nges pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i rol tu byon pa 'khor gyi nangangan bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs
266a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byung ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas byang chub
266a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyi du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil
266a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad zin du snang bar mdzad nas/ shin tu lha nges bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang
266a5(dkon brtsegs): mthur ba'i tshogasu bcang po 'di dag gis mngon par bstod ngo // lha/ tshogs lha ma yin dang mi'am ci/ klu dang nyan thos ngag dngas ngas rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis// zil
266a6(dkon brtsegs): mnar pyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal// rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnams mdzes pa// lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus de bzhugs ste// 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed pa
266a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad datshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin bzhugs pa// sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya byin suH/ 
266a8(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum lha nang du// gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro bkun la gsal// gling bzhi'i mi'i bdag po snang ldan pa// 'jig rten
266b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud pa rab mdzad cing // thugs rje dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la nyi ma lam me tha le ba// nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar// nyi ma
266b2(dkon brtsegs): stong bas khyang bar 'phags pa'i 'od // sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal// dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar// shin tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal// rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od zil gyis mam
266b3(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba// mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar// gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni// drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal// seng ge ri su la rten pa'i sgra
266b4(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs shing // sa la ringags tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar// mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung sgrog cing // pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal po gzi brjing 'bar// nor bu thams
266b5(dkon brtsegs): cad zil mnan lam me ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra pa// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lam mer bzhugs// 2// jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// lhag pa'i sems
266b6(dkon brtsegs): can mchis par ga la 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thobs rnams dang // yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// mi yi dpa' bo 'gro ba lam me ba// mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthel
266b7(dkon brtsegs): gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron// grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' la// bdag gis bstod
266b8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams 'dir thob des// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag tu
267a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ mig gnyis mi 'dzums par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni lta// chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod/ zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba
267a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtag mi nus pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod pa mdzad pa dang / zhi ba dang / phra ba la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rjesu rnam
267a3(dkon brtsegs): bar dpyod // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad zhugs pa la ni rjesu rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni yang dag par lta/ de bzhin gshegs pa
267a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
267a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis rnams kyi gnas med pa mamakha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag pa ra lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha
267a6(dkon brtsegs): pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjesu song ba dang / 
267a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni rjesu dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni
267a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dpyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yong dbyar zla gsum gnas par dam/ 
267b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas te/ de zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas/ de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po pa rab tu byung nas ring por ma lon pa dag dang lhan
267b2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ 
267b3(dkon brtsegs): byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byar na phyog gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
267b4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod // mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo// nam dakha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba yid gcis
267b5(dkon brtsegs): gcod la phyag 'tshalo// srid gsum mthar byon thug la phyag 'tshalo// zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byams kun tu yang // 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos
267b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rab dga' zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchog tu mchi// bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyis te// thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas// de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing // yid rangab
267b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi// byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyi thugs ni skyob mi mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam ya su// sems can rnams kyi che du spyod pa spyad// 'drer pa khyod kyi
267b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin nga tshul khrims spyad // bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslabs// shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs// des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshalo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngosam shes
268a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs// sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chung rtogs// mnyam med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tsha'o// 'gro ba rnams kyi se
268a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyud rab tu mkhyen// spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba// de ni bcom ldan mi'i mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems
268a3(dkon brtsegs): can ngan song gsum mchi dang / gang gis bde 'gror mchi ba 'gyur ba'i las// 'gro bas legs pa bgyis dang nongs bgyis mkhyen// 'gro ba ban dza dgang dag 'das rnams dang // da ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang // 
268a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin// bde gshegs de ngag/ thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang
268a5(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshe// rnam pa kun du ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang // rgyal ba'i rje nga bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba/ 
268a6(dkon brtsegs): / de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams rtag par stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho
268a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag/ skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar// mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab smras pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshalo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa
268a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis 'du mchi// lhar bcas 'gro ba zin du rlag par bgyid// tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha'i rnams// khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gsor gyi ri ltar dri mi mngal/ dbu snum 'ang/ 
268b1(dkon brtsegs): shing g.ya su 'khyil par gnas// lhun po rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags// bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing // khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes// 
268b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa// spun ni ud dpal 'dra zhing yi du mchi// zla ba dri med mkha' la ji ltar bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs
268b3(dkon brtsegs): mi'i mchog la phyag 'tshalo// dang ba rma bya ri dgas rgyal gyi stabs// glang po drems pa ngal gyis mchi stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tsha'o/ 
268b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes// sen mo zang mdog dag cing dra bas spras// bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lhang ngar reg cing sleb// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i
268b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs 'dor bas/ sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs/ zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i// mi rnams gus nas lha'i 'jig rten mchi// chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po// 
268b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba// chos kyis spong pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshalo// byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gyi mchog/ tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyis
268b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga'// ngo yis skye 'chi sring sreng 'bel bgyid pa// nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur// rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel// bde gshegs gang
268b8(dkon brtsegs): gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba// bde ba rims nang ma mchis lam yang ston// gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing // 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog gi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de// thugs rje
269a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyanas myong thos bsta pa sa dang / chos kum ma ma rom gachags pa'i rgyal/ grub pa chen po 'jis rten mchog pathong bas/ ngam kyis 'dzin da mas
269a2(dkon brtsegs): brtsags nges/ 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te stan las
269a3(dkon brtsegs): langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te
269a4(dkon brtsegs): zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs
269a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig zhulas so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'dis du sa bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dong ba
269a6(dkon brtsegs): dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal par tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/ 
269a7(dkon brtsegs): to khacom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/ gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa thob// myur ba'i shes rab
269a8(dkon brtsegs): 'thob spongs pa rnam par nges pa 'thob// snang ba 'thog thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang // sems can yongasu smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / som nyi spong ba dang / thams
269b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa ci du rnam par nges pa 'thog sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgying ba dang ldem po ngag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes
269b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa 'thob pa dang zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di
269b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa// yang dag nyi du ji ltar de 'byung dang // ye shes rgya mtsho bka' mching rnam nges pa// mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshadadu gsol// shin tu
269b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu// sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa// khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags// byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs// gzungs dang
269b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba'i// ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'a gyur// gang gis skye bo'i ngogs pa gcod 'gyur la// shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par 'dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa bye/ 
269b6(dkon brtsegs): ba mang por ni// 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lta bgyid kyang // skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed cing // de dag don dge ston par 'gyur ba dang / dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / tshe mchog dang mi
269b7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs zhing dang // sems can ched kyi bka' mching bla med dang // byang chub spyod pa dri med bsha du gsol// bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan spyod pa po// sred pa skems pa rnam grol reg mdzad pa/ 
269b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul yang bsrung bar mi 'gyur ba// sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol// gzugs dang long spyod spobs pa phun dum tshogs// snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzadag
270a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol// ka la bing ka'i sgra sman gsung 'byin pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan
270a2(dkon brtsegs): rab 'jig pa// chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis// gtso bo bdud rtsi'i ro yis tshim par mdzod// byang chub dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis// chos la 'dun pa bzlog pa'i mi
270a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa bsgrags pa'i dus la bab// thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis// bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu ma byas// rgyal ba
270a4(dkon brtsegs): bri ma lags don du gnyer// spyod pa dab pa legs par bsha du gso la// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe/ dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
270a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong khyod legaso leg so// yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'kho ra skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi
270a6(dkon brtsegs): don dang / phan pa dang da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni leg so// yul 'khor skyong
270a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad // bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang / 
270a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di sa
270b1(dkon brtsegs): ste bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
270b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ yong su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang
270b3(dkon brtsegs): chu ba lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa// ye shes mtha' yas ldan la de dag yod// skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ 
270b4(dkon brtsegs): sring ba'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir// de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor// nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa// bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lha// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis
270b5(dkon brtsegs): dgrol lo zhes/ gang zag mchog bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong cing rtag tu rtog par khong du chud // bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma/ yin// 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la/ byis pa mi mkhas 'di
270b6(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa// de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'// yul 'khor skyong ba bzhi po
270b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thos ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yod
270b8(dkon brtsegs): sangag pa yang dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyas kun
271a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzir 'gyur ba// gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thob// nam yang chung zar mi 'gyur phyir dang blo gros rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags
271a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed // de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhung ba'i lam mchog ston// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po ngag la ston pam
271a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong // dpa' ba stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims skyon
271a4(dkon brtsegs): meng dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan// sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na me da la sems can rnams kyang sbyor// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po la dri dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga'
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na yul 'khor skyong sangs rgya sa mthong ba// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes
271a6(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong brdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa
271a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigasu med pa'i chos la bzod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ 
271a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i tsha'o// 'dil 'din chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzang pa'i/ rdzogs pa'i
271b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshon sems can grol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod// 'dren pa rnams las zhi brje su mthun
271b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyang nyan/ thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor// dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang / 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de mi skye// de ni bdog
271b3(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med// slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang // thams cad gtong shing de yi sems ni gang du
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ang g.yo ba med/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na yul 'khor skyong byang chub se/ mas dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong
271b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyeng pa dang bkur bstil blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas kyi ma la 'dris pa la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub
271b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyon gyis gzing
271b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs cag tu mor mi lta// yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul// de dag gang du yang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed// bas ltar gcig pu gas
271b8(dkon brtsegs): ming bsam pa dri meng dag la drim bral// de dag rnyeng pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur mthob ying zhum med// 'dod pa chung steng ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing spu dang tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus
272a1(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan sbyin dang dul ba rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin// lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs
272a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med// thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom
272a3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med
272a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas mi 'a dor ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i cho sa dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang mthun par
272a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa 'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos
272a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i cho so// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing
272a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dri ming nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung // de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs rlom yin mi sems// tshul khrims de cing la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag
272a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med// gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong // 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul
272b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chos med// bag yod dag bsam pa thab pas rab tu sbyor// thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer// skye rga 'chi bas bcom shing nang gzir ba/ 
272b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dgon med sring pa'i brtson ra 'dir bltas nas// zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbar te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed// 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang
272b3(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes// de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas
272b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ cang shes kyi 'gro su shes par bya ste/ banyi grang zhe na bde 'gro 'thob ste/ de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phyang pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed de de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis sten
272b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/ de yang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
272b6(dkon brtsegs): dpas bzhi po de dag ni/ cang shes kyi 'gro su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dang su ya na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min/ 
272b7(dkon brtsegs): chags meng blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed// de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de bzhin de dag sbyor// bde
