272b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed// rgyal ba'i ye shes che du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs
273a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dga' 'gyur te/ de dag ring por mi thogs
273a2(dkon brtsegs): nga dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grel// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems
273a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyong ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang thob kyis 'jal ba yongasu spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa
273a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/ yu la 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang
273a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyong ba'i cho so// de nas bcom lnga na 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na// tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med// 
273a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni su lang skyon tshol byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med// khyim gyi blo gros yang mya ngan rtsa// skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba// spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dong bar
273a7(dkon brtsegs): khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa sten pa na// shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rten zhing // lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes chol
273a8(dkon brtsegs): ban// nga ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing // rtag tu bya ltar stsogs pa gangs nas ni// 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yi no// dbor na bas ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing // seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa song sa yam/ 
273b1(dkon brtsegs): ri dbas lnga bu sar 'jigs ying mi rton// de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// g.yang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// rab tu thar bar bya phyir 'bang bar byed// gal te bag yong dge ba'i chos spyospyon// bdas kyang 'gro ba 'tsha
273b2(dkon brtsegs): dpung ge nyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab sun tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rlog sems med// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
273b3(dkon brtsegs): med la gnas// 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'// de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu/ ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed cing // de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongasu spyod // gzungs dang
273b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag/ bzod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bltas nas// gang zhig don du gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/ blo
273b5(dkon brtsegs): chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyes/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di sa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs dang / 
273b6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la sten pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang // yul 'khor skyong rmed pa dang bkur bsti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong
273b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gis rnyeng ba dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i cha
273b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phags pa bla mo rnams dang pha ma la// de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin// de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yo can ste// rtag tu kun du ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs// rlung la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa
274a1(dkon brtsegs): ste// de ngag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dab la// kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang // 'din bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra// de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste// grags tshol ba
274a2(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu brtson pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'// de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring // phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba// de dag mtshang 'bru ba dang 'ja
274a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring // 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni// de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam
274a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dang pa byang chub/ sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
274a6(dkon brtsegs): la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de
274a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ma dang le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag mngon pa'i
274a8(dkon brtsegs): can rtag tu khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshe dbyug pas rdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'dir ni phrag dog skye// de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin// grags lta byed cing 'khrul pa chol
274b1(dkon brtsegs): ba can/ su la 'khrul yong gang la gleng bya snyam// de dag nga'i bstan pa 'di las ring // de dag yon tan sdang zhing ngan song gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu mi bzang 'bar bar 'gro// de dag rnams kyi
274b2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i spyod pa dang // chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag tu khor nor byang chub lam la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong cheka/ bskal pa bye mang
274b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya lam 'byung ba 'gyur// da ltar ngal ba dam pa rnyed pa la// gal te thar 'dod bag med spang bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
274b4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bstan par mi bya ba dang // yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul
274b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ste/ yul 'khor
274b6(dkon brtsegs): skyong gang zag bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing // gang dag dge ba'i
274b7(dkon brtsegs): ba shes gzhan sten blang ba// dedag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper namakha' la zla ba yang ngo bzhin// dmigs par ltal rtag tu zhen pa dang // bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag/ de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu
274b8(dkon brtsegs): spang gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer// gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mthur spong ba// de dag dper na ngan skyugs rdza bzhin spang // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar
275a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod/ zang zing ngag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste// de dag me'i 'obs bzhin spang bar bya// gang zhig 'du
275a2(dkon brtsegs): ni gdul bar bya ba dang // 'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang // de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spangs par bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya 'dod// de yis rnyed dang
275a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug dang mi sdug dang // grags dang 'tshang 'bru phrag dog nga spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos
275a4(dkon brtsegs): ting bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems
275a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos nga yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong los
275a6(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i long spyod yongasu tshol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam/ 
275a7(dkon brtsegs): bar smin pa'i cho so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de la mi shes pas ni
275a8(dkon brtsegs): brnyas byed na// des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyes// yang bas ni gang zhig long spyod tshol// shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod// gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'du
275b1(dkon brtsegs): cing sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yong min pa/ chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi spos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa// de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyi
275b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam// yi dgas 'gro ba rnamasu sdug bsngal rnyed// gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing // mi'i dpa' bo'i sdug bsngal mthar
275b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spang ste// byang chub lam ni rtag tu bstan par bya// 'phags pa dkon pachog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// 
275b4(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang nga chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ par la la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang // ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la sten pa byang
275b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
275b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing // rtag tu 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan sgom// ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de
275b8(dkon brtsegs): bcings te// glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang // gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// mi rigs spyod pa 'di ngas/ 
276a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'di dag dang // skye rga 'chi la sogs las grol 'dong ba// bzlas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam la rtag tu btsun
276a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod byas te// bang ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas// sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyin drags pa
276a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang // stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor// yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas// dpa' ba'i dra ba grol ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par sngon spyod tshe// sems cad phan phyir byang chub
276a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog don du// sbyin dang dul dang nges la rtag tu spyad// gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur// bas mtha' gan su rtag pra rang dga' ste// byang chub che du bsam pa rnam par spyangs// brgya lam na yang
276a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus nyams ma gyur// skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// / srid pa'i btson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyam pas// sems can 'a khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong ras ni// sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya cher bskyed// 'gro/ 
276a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs// bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing // rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug/ phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor sa dang // grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // me tog 'bras
276a7(dkon brtsegs): bu chu 'byor nyams dga' bo'i// nag su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur// su mtshan rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad// de tshe da ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur// nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rmas pa
276a8(dkon brtsegs): gso ba na// mi'i dbang pos sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang // yid kyi yongasu gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i tshe du g.yang sa nas// lus la ma ltas rab tu mchongs par gyur// nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu
276b1(dkon brtsegs): yi phyir// lus dang brog la ltas par ma gyur to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam pa' las ni lha'i tshogs rnams kyis/ skyes chen brtson 'grus brtar pa legs shes
276b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags/ gang tshe sngon chang sring bar spyod pa na// spyir la rab dga' bram ze khye'u gyur cha// rin chen che du rgya mtsho skams nas ni// nor bu rnyeng nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu shes bya gyur te// brjod pa grags ci
276b3(dkon brtsegs): ngani spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po rgya// gsad par byas pa myur du thar par byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas// nga yis 'phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas ste// nga yis nor rlung de ni phyug por/ 
276b4(dkon brtsegs): byas// de tsha nga ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur// nga 'dir mi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// skyabasu 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni// rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma
276b5(dkon brtsegs): btang / rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe// sman pa mchog gis nga yi che du ni// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang // srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad
276b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa na// rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// chung ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang // gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang // bya dka'
276b7(dkon brtsegs): brkyang cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas// nor+ya dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang // rgyal bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun// mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste// stobs bcu
276b8(dkon brtsegs): mngar ba rnams la mchod pa byas// nga ni rgyal po zla 'ong gyur pa'i tshe// mi bzang mig can khros par gyur nas ni// de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pa na// de tshing yi mgo bo bcing byin// nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya
277a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur tshe/ grong dang grong khyer ngag dang lam srang sgo// thams cad yang rgya che sman gyi rnams// de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhago// srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe// ngas sngon rgyal po
277a2(dkon brtsegs): dge bar gyur pa na// bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis// lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas// gang cheng sngon mi yi rgyal po ni// rin chen gtsug pung gyur tshe me tog dang // spos mchog rnams dang
277a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyis brgyan pa yi// con pa na dpal ldan dam pa ngas bta // nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe// shing bal mnga' ba 'jam pa lta bu dang // pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang ba dag kyang nga
277a4(dkon brtsegs): bta // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa na// snying rje med cing mi ba zong rab gtum pa// srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas// shug/ gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur// gang tshe mig bzangs zhes
277a5(dkon brtsegs): byar gyur pa na// byis pa 'dongad pa ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/ srin mo/ dag la na chung 'du shes pa// tshong ba lnga brgya de dag thar bar byas/ gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na// lha'i bu mo lta bu yi gzungs
277a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/  bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs na su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na// dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi// rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na// sor mo drangs
277a7(dkon brtsegs): 'barab rgya chen btang // rgyal po ung dpal mig ces bya gyur tshe// pad+ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra mig/ yi 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa// 'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas// sman pa'i rgyal po skra 'drang
277a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i tshe// sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni// bud med cha byang gzugs dang blo nyams pa// ngas ni spring rjes yongasu thar par byas// sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur na// nad kyis btab pa nang ba'i mi
277b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas// nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byir gyur te// mi de ngas ni nang dang bral bar byas// rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni// nad kyis ring bar gyur pa rkang byin te// ngas ni nam yang
277b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma bta // rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing // phangs shing yid 'ong ba'i srog btang ste// 'ongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar par byas// rgyal po phyogs
277b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi thog tu gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma lta gu yi// lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin// rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe// snying rje ldan cing
277b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro don phan 'dong ngo // skyes bud med dag gis rgyas pa'i// gling bzhi pa yung ngas ni btang ba byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe// 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla// dga' zhing mgu ba'i
277b5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis bcang nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bung / med gzugs ldan zhes ni bya gyur tshe// bud med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas// gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa
277b6(dkon brtsegs): yi/ nu ma sring du sdug pa gcig btang // rgyal po dpal grags shos byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba'i rgyun mchog dang // rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta zhon// gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa dum
277b7(dkon brtsegs): btang // rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral// rin chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung // 'on kyang nga la khros pa'i sems me // srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i
277b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ grog sbur ngag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ngogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang ba byas// de tshe nga'i sems ni g.yo ba med// spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na// rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag ngag/ 
278a1(dkon brtsegs): ste nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dgal// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med// sbyab su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yig ni// snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste// gdol ba mi yis mnga' rnams bsdur kyang ni/ 
278a2(dkon brtsegs): spreru gyur ngas ni mi dam bto // rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni// glang po bla ma rgan dAn lus bskams te// shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos// de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar bar gyur// bgrod dka' gang can ri la dred dang
278a3(dkon brtsegs): gyurarang yis zhag bdun par du bsrungs pa'i mi// de yis gsod ba nga la btang byas kyang // nga ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med// kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol// dug dang bcas pa'i
278a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' yis bsnun kyang ni// mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med// dum bu'i nga gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba// sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe// mthong ba tsam gyis me ni'i gyur nas// lha tshogs dag gis me
278a5(dkon brtsegs): tog rnams kyang gtor// ri dwags gyur tshe gang+gA'i rlabs shugs kyis// / khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa// de yis gsod pa nga gan/ khrid 'ongs// 'on kyang de la nga ni yid ma khros// rgya mtsho'i dbusu son
278a6(dkon brtsegs): te mgon med pa// tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas// bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsang gyur tshe// ru sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ljon// nga ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i bar gyur tshe// 
278a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur// srog chags nges par gang che gyur pa na// nang brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas
278a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas// ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rjer ldan// mnga' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de// de tshe gsong la nga yis byams pabya// 
278b1(dkon brtsegs): dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du// bsngon rgya mtsho'i ngog su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong ba rnams// nga yis spring brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod che// mnga' chags kun lar ni
278b2(dkon brtsegs): dgyur tshe// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas// bud med dbang dung ni song ma gyur// gel pa nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe ka legs spyod ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan// thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres bongs
278b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ de'i chadrangus ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po me tog 'bras rgyab ne tso'i tshe// sdong po skams kyang ngas ni deH btang // de cha brgya byin byas gzod mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas/  ni sA'i rgyal por gyur
278b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe// mi'i rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste// spu'i tshogs la gno dab byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dgangs bton to// / bsngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir// sa lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas
278b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ne tso ci byir nga yis lu len// lo tog sbyin 'di ma rung byar sem sa sam// ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag ni rmu sa khyod kyi 'bras mi len// pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir
278b6(dkon brtsegs): de la snying rje bdag gis sa lu blangs// gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe// 'gro ba kun la shas shas sbyin zhes// de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te// nges na bdag ni rku bar gzhar mi 'gyur// ne tso leg so sa lu
278b7(dkon brtsegs): cing gar khyer// sri zhu 'di ni mi'i nang na dkon// khyod ni mi yi nang 'dir dud 'gro yin// legaso khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams// spyad pa'i
278b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe nadaga' ba brgya la yang // nga yi yid ri skyo bar gyur pa med// nang gi dag gam 'on te phyi yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan thabs pa
279a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ngas spyod // sha dang lpags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas// gang la
279a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yis// sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa// sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon spyod tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug/ spyod pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa// brtul zhugs rgya chen
279a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra de dag dang // spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyuraro// 'di thos gyur nas de'i tshe na ni// bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len
279a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu la pags pa ma yin chos la sdang // bstan pa sun par byed cing yon tan nyams zhi ba'i chos ni thos par gyur pa na// 'di ni rgyal
279a5(dkon brtsegs): bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga'i slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur// mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin// de yis 'di na rnam pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas
279a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi// bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chu// des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor pa yin// gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang // rnam pa cis kyang
279a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bang de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yod na ni// 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med// gang la bdag dang sen
279a8(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi
279b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu ro// ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // khwa ltar spyi rtol che la rmong gtum zhing // phrag dog ngargyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ming yi bstan pa 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing // chos gos grwa
279b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang ni skyog par byed// chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa yon
279b3(dkon brtsegs): ngar phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig khyer bar byed// de dag pa lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phyugs dang bran pho bran mo srel// zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la// brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma
279b4(dkon brtsegs): yin de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi ga med// bya ba ma yin pa yang grang yang med// de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni// dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor nge mtshungs// dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni
279b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag la yang mi spar brjod byed de// tshul khrims 'chal ba slu ba zhu/ gas nas ni// bud med 'jig byed mi bzang rab ces brjod// rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar// khyim pa 'dod pas brkas
279b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta min// khyim pa mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yong bar 'gyur// gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang // las dang lo spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags
279b7(dkon brtsegs): shing 'anyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min// 'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar lhung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nye'i min
279b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de dag bdag cings dul ba// de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyis mtshan du 'gro bar byed// brten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te// de dag la
280a1(dkon brtsegs): ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag bsang byed kyi// 
280a2(dkon brtsegs): slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang // lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag tu 'phags min mi dag la cig kyang // 'ongs shing
280a3(dkon brtsegs): lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung mong pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams ngade dag dge slong yon tan rtag min brtson// de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min// de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs// de dag so sor
280a4(dkon brtsegs): thar dang bslab pa dang // 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur// de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lcags kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra// de dag nas su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ni
280a5(dkon brtsegs): grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gnu ngas la// de dag 'a gnas pa med par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang // bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang
280a6(dkon brtsegs): brjed nas ni// rgyags dang nga rgyal dreg la yod rgyas te// de dag mi bzad mnar med ltung bar 'gyur// de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing // rkun po'i gtam brjod pa la yang rab tu dga'// nye du bsnyen la yang rab
280a7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas// rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la rkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed ka/ de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma/ 
280a8(dkon brtsegs): dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lagi bla// bdag gi tshe du 'di ni ngas byas ste// dge slong gang dag pa'i rjes mthun pa// gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// 
280b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams ni sdud par mi bye // 'di ni nga'i gan su bskos pa ste// 'di ni nga'i lhan cig gnas pa yin// 'di ni nga'i dga' bar byed pa yin
280b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyi song // 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang ma bkod // mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la// 'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yong ma yin// 'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song // de dag la ni mal stan
280b3(dkon brtsegs): bgo bya ba// nam du yang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te// de dag khyim pa lta bur stsogs 'gyur zhing // mchog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag/ kun tu smad pa byas par
280b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas ni// de dag nga'i tshig ni dran gyur te// bas mtha' dag dang nags dri tshe gnas// kyi hung rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang // dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ ring por mi
280b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongasu brnyas par 'gyur ba ste// de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa ma
280b6(dkon brtsegs): su gnas par 'gyur// 'byed dang zung zer thab mo dga' ba dang // yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed// de dag skye bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te// de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ni nga yi bstan pa
280b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gter// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba// 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang brag dog dang // rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas brus pa dang // pad+ma
280b8(dkon brtsegs): rdzing bu yongasu skams pa dang / rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shim tu mi bzang tshe// nga
281a1(dkon brtsegs): slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag pa'i bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la sten par dga' ba rnams// de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring // 'di nas shi 'phos yi dgas 'gro ba dang / 
281a2(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// mi bzang drag po nyamasu myong bar 'gyur// ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan
281a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag sten pa// long ba 'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur// lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par
281a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa sten pa ni// de la su yang yid/ na mi 'gyur te// de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing // de ni/ ga tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis
281a5(dkon brtsegs): gdungs// mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun// bkres/ dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongasu gsungs// yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas
281a6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dres pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod bor la// lags pa'i spyod la rtag tu bstan par gyis// 'di nas phyin cad 'gyod par gyur ta re// gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang // bslab dang sbyangs pa'i
281a7(dkon brtsegs): chos la dga' 'gyur ba// gnyen po rnyed dang grags brjod spong byos la// de lta rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang // sdug pa kun da
281a8(dkon brtsegs): mi ri 'bral 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la// pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la// rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa// de sring brtson 'grus nam
281b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang nyams ma byas// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te// mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson
281b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag pa 'chong par 'gyur// g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la// zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing
281b3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang // bya khA ltar mu tsir smra ba dang // tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed ba sgrub par 'gyur/ 
281b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyeng pa yongasu btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi/ sems ca na yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin// sems can la spring brtsub nga'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur// de dag pa shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag
281b5(dkon brtsegs): la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes bar 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che ba/ 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ 
281b6(dkon brtsegs): snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / spor ba nyams pa dang mi shes pa dang le lo can dang / phan tshun mi 'thun pa'i chos 'gro ba byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / 
281b7(dkon brtsegs): rang dgar byed pa dang shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang bgro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongasu mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can
281b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos mnyan pa don tu mi gnyer bar 'gyur mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnamasu skye ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di
282a1(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba skyed par 'gyuraro// de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na// ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas
282a2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjesu mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la
282a3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na/ byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la// byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyang gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du
282a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyi ma du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtog sa ba zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nang mang ba dang
282a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste// yuH'khor spyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed/ bar brjod// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis las
282a6(dkon brtsegs): 'che ba la nga byang chub ces mi smra'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yong su dag pa zhes mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la yang sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes mi smra'o// 
282a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yong su dag pa zhes mi spro'o// shes rab 'chal pa la the tsom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongasu dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs
282a8(dkon brtsegs): 'thob ces ngami smra'o// yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongasu tshol ba la bde 'gro 'thob ces mi spra'o// khyim la ser sa byed pa la lus yong su dag pa zhes nga mi spro'o// spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang / 
282b1(dkon brtsegs): brang ba zhes nga mi smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongasasu dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongasu dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// tshong mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas
282b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la chos yeng su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la snang ba ltar/ ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du sprul gzhan du byed ba'o// lha dang bcas
282b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can// ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs zil
282b4(dkon brtsegs): non tha ba nyon mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ripa/ chags pas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel// le los zil gyis no nan dang ba nyams// dang pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul
282b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyur/ bas rab tu byung gyur te// mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su// gso ma'i khur
282b6(dkon brtsegs): ni len par byed dang mtshungs// rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// ngor song nas kyang gos dang lte du tshol// mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phur sum tshogs// bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin// rmongs nas nga rgyal dab
282b7(dkon brtsegs): gis ngan songs// mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang // dma' ba'i rig su skye zhing long ba dang // mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos// bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu
282b8(dkon brtsegs): khams 'gayangs chen po mi bzang ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med// gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub// de phyir lhas sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob// rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltar/ 
283a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rig so// bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags// tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang sa
283a2(dkon brtsegs): thob/ de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin// byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba// dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnaso// de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar// nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub
283a3(dkon brtsegs): don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir// nga yis rang gi srog ni phangs yang btang // chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa// don med gyur nas bstan las ltung bar 'gyur// nga ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir// 
283a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa// thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas// bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la// de dag nam yang
283a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa mi skyen// chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod // dper na/ long ba lam gsal med dang mtshungs// yul 'khor skyong tsA rabyung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches
283a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa// rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa tshad med par gyur pa// de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
283a7(dkon brtsegs): dang zhabasu ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byub
283a8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam+bu gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid bye'o// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus ma/ 
283b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam+bu'i gling den grong khyer nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba phrag stong yod // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar rub tu
283b2(dkon brtsegs): chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa// lho byang ngu rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang // mig mangs risu bris pas mdzes par byas pa yo // de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni// 
283b3(dkon brtsegs): lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig
283b4(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i tshang tsam byung bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu
283b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzabru gling ba 'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to// sem sa can gang dag btson ran 'khod pa de dag kyang // btson ra nas
283b6(dkon brtsegs): thar par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu sul ci sbeng pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas gtsang ma'i sa
283b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon khyod bag yod par gyis shig/ mi rtag pas so sor rtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ gzhon mi rnams kyi
283b8(dkon brtsegs): srog ni ched po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta bar bya zhing // las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshig su bcad pa 'di
284a1(dkon brtsegs): ras kyang saso// gso na byug med par ni gyur 'i// bag med dbang du song bar gyur te re// bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing // bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams
284a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang spang // nges pa gang dag 'din pag yod cing // legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang // sems can kun la sring rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa
284a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'das pa dang // 'di nang ltar ngag dang gang ma byon// thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang // gser dang dngul
284a4(dkon brtsegs): nor bu mu tig rgyan// bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang // bya du chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer// rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna dang sA// slong ba rnams la rab tu dgas byin na// byang chub ston
284a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mtsho ga 'gyur// rgyal srid ba de dang sdug pa'i bud med dang // nor rnams thams cad yang rnam spang ste// 'dus byes gar la lta dang
284a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma 'dras// 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo// 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min// gzho nu 'di la
284a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag med dge ba yin// ngan 'gror ltung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni// pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med// mi yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal
284a8(dkon brtsegs): mang rgya mtshor ni// don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad// khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med// don med nyid ngal ba bston par gyur// da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub bzhi// mtshungs med go 'ab
284b1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/ rkang dang sha dang lpags pa de bsams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ning bam sems/ bde bar bshegs pa 'thung brnyed par dga'/ mi ba'i chos 'os pa yang shin tu dka'/ bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyob
284b2(dkon brtsegs): bsal na// sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob// bshes gcem bzang la rtag tu yongs sten cig/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongasu spang bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed// lam gol las kyang rtag tu
284b3(dkon brtsegs): zlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas// rdo rje lta bu'i snying gi bsam brtan par// sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/ 
284b4(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa// tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par dga'// khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyer// skye bo
284b5(dkon brtsegs): snying du sdug pa kun spongs la// lus dang srog la sreng par ma byed par// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul 'a khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung
284b6(dkon brtsegs): ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmug pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang rgod par ma gyur// gtses par ma gyur/ dga' ba byed par ma gyur yongasu spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang bskyed mos tshal dum song / nam yang
284b7(dkon brtsegs): grogs pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin// nam yang gu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang nor dang khyim dang grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pu sems
284b8(dkon brtsegs): shing gnas par gyur to// nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang byis pa 'dring ba dang / 'khor ba
285a1(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde bslu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nying rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing / 
285a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas mnga' bar bya'o snyam nas// de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas
285a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ gzho nu'i long spyod kyi phyir// sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas ste/ lho dang byang gi ngog su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byaso// 
285a4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa mu tig gi dra ba dang / ring po che'i srog shing dang bA re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po rje'i srog cing
285a5(dkon brtsegs): stong btsug so// rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang / rin po che 'i skung pa drug khris spel to// rin po che'i skud pa thams cad/ kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng babye bas sbrel to// de dag rlung gi/ 
285a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyong de bskul na 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra sman pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung // lam srang gi sgo thams cad na/ bu mo glu mkhas pa gar mkhas pa/ dbang po dang la bab pa skye bo thams cad kyis spang
285a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'osu gyur pa lnga brgya bkong // de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ khyed nyin mtshan du gru dang gar dang rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya
285a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing Naci nas gzhonu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs pa/ gtam gzhan ma byed cig sems can gang la yang yi mi 'ong ba ma smra shig ces bsgo'o// lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang / bza' ba 'dod/ 
285b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la ni bza' ba btung 'dong pa rnams la ni btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos dang spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang mal dang rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang nor bu dang
285b2(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dang bai dUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / glang po che dang rta dang / shing rta dang ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyis yongasu spyad pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i phung
285b3(dkon brtsegs): bo yang bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbusu gzho nu'i long spyod kyi phyir/ khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris bres pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byaso// de'i nang
285b4(dkon brtsegs): du'ang bzang gcig byas te/ der gzho nu'i long spyod kyi phyir/ mal bye ba phrag bzhi bsham so// de'i dbus bskyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa tha dang / 'bras kyi shing thaMng dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thaMd kyis
285b5(dkon brtsegs): khyab par bka // yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de'i dbus/ su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them ska sa dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang 'o// 
285b6(dkon brtsegs): gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i ba brgya rtsa brgyad btsug so// rdzing de'i seng+ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo// me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun tu rgya so// 
285b7(dkon brtsegs): khor yug tu yang rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongasu bskor to// dus thams cad ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongasu rgyaso// rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed
285b8(dkon brtsegs): ring po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang / rin po che'i srung ba rnams kyis spel cing / thams cad yang shing ta la'i 'phreng bye bas sbrel to// de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskub na/ 'di lta ste dper ma
286a1(dkon brtsegs): rol mo sil sman brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung // gzho ru'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes/ rdzing de'i steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzangs
286a2(dkon brtsegs): der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya bting bar gyur to// gang du rgyal bu gzho na bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po
286a3(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun las byas pa/  'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa/ bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to// khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog bor nas a ga rus gdugs shing / 
286a4(dkon brtsegs): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed do// gser gyi lda ldis bre so// gser gyi pad+ma rab tu sbyang so// mu tig dang nor bu'i dra ba bre so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byaso// rin po
286a5(dkon brtsegs): che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu sbyang so// rin po che'i shing ljon pa tham sa cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya sbyang so// bskyang mos tshal du/ na tu yang nor bu rin po che 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ 'bum phrag dgu
286a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal den bya'i tshogs mi'i sangu smra ga ne tso dang ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang / khu byug dang / 
286a7(dkon brtsegs): rma bya dang / rang ba dang dra pa dang / kun la dang / lajigs shang shang te'u 'khod do// de dag skang 'byin cong sgra sgrog/ na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'thung // ga du long spyod kyi phyir/ 
286a8(dkon brtsegs): 'i rnam pa thams cad phun tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to// de'i cha gzhon lo bcu drug lon na lo nyi shu lon pa'i steng dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams ca
286b1(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsu // thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang 'chog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der bcung
286b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bya ba byi'o// nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal pa'i mis bye ba dang rgyal po thams cad kyis bu bo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa
286b3(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa sha sta go// thams cad kyang mtsho lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa gar mkhas pa/ dgod mkhas pa skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa drang ba gzhon pa/ mnyen pa yan lag 'jam pa/ 
286b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang bar smra ba bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba ha cang yang mi thu da// ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom ga ha cang yang mi dkar ba
286b5(dkon brtsegs): sa cang yang mi bsngo ba kha nas me tog ud pa la'i gsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid tu 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa glu dbyangs len pa de dag ni
286b6(dkon brtsegs): na na/ rgyal bu gzho du bsod nams kyi 'od zer gan so// gru dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de las kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongasu nyams par byed pa byung ste blta bar mi bya'o stsag
286b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems bskyed// de de'i cha 'di lta ste dper na/ gsang bar bya ba'i mis mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed ba de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams 'od zer yang / bud med dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzer to// 
286b8(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer de la yang grogs dang ldan cig ngo mtshar dumi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig mami mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i dmamar 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod
287a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / nges bdag thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtoms par// nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri
287a2(dkon brtsegs): mdang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha ga'o dur mi rol to// dgyes par mi mdzad// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smra so// 'phags pa nga
287a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// bam po gsum pa// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan/ rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu
287a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong la sa mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ mya ngan gyis sa la skyel to// de sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la
287a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcing smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa ngal ltos shing / spros// nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim na yang sa la skyel// su mi sa khyod mi dga' byas de myu rang la spros// de 'dir de'ur chad pa chem
287a6(dkon brtsegs): gcad par bya// khyod kyi che dungs 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa// lha'i khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer deng ltos shig/ 'ong la yan lag ma tshangs ci yong de myur spos// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/ 
287a7(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// lha'i bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de ngag rnams dang de ring rtses// ci phyir zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbya
287a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes// khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga mdab rgyas skyed mos tshal// 
287b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs steng bzhag lnga'i sna tshogs shing rta 'dra// soms shig khyod kyi mchod 'din thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dag 'a gyis// khyod kyi khrus cheng rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/ ud pa lang ba
287b2(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang / pad+ma rnams kyang rung ba rgyas pa mchog brgyan// de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang ba rma byan co khu byug ri skegs dang / ka la bing ga gang shang te'u dang kun la// yid 'ong sna
287b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan gangs ce spos dang ldang 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang bai DUR+Yas smras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog
287b4(dkon brtsegs): ngab pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra sman pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil sngan sgra bsgrags pa// khyod kyi che du srang rnamasu yang sprin rgya che// bu mo stong dag glu mchog
287b5(dkon brtsegs): sbar ba'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha'i bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba snod/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci'i phyir// rnam par g.ye nga ba'i sems kyis dga' mo byed// gzho na khyod kyi rtse grogs lnga'i
287b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ bu po de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas rnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i long spyod don mi gcer/ yon tan bas
287b7(dkon brtsegs): bsring ba'i skyon mthong nges smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar pa don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod
287b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon 'an mos ma lags/ nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byedas/ sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dgal// bdud kyi lags pa yon tam
288a1(dkon brtsegs): ba g.yangs che// rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar spang // sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsab ci phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag lpags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus
288a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gcer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyis/ dga' ba rmi la
288a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa sreng gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis/ ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs lol// shing lkug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na// dpon dung shing ltar 'gyur
288a4(dkon brtsegs): te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad da ba shig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// sred pa
288a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dong // 'dod rgyus phan tshun ga/ song ba'i 'gro la bltas na su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis/ mi bskyod bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / 
288a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyes min// bdeg cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur pag yong mdzod// mi dbang ngang la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ci'i chu ljar
288a7(dkon brtsegs): myur 'gro cor mi rung / 'dus byas 'di zad glog spyir 'dra ste cir mi rung // rgyal po mkhas la sringad gsum 'dod la chags pa dan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yong 'gyur gyis shig / byang chub sems dpa' yum
288a8(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brtses sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur gyis// rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yong ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba// nga ni/ 
288b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams chung za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi// skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs byin gyur// khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gsheng ma 'dra// zag dang bcas
288b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// rab tu gsal gnas 'bar ba na mkha' lta bu dang // 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba
288b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la bdas bltas nas/ rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gzhing logs par bgyi dang nang pa gso ba dang // zug dru rtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur nga sbyar/ 
288b4(dkon brtsegs): chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol bar bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// / ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang ga don par bgyi// long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i khri shing bskam par bgyi/ 
288b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas// de yis sr-i nga gsum gar la lta ba 'dra mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying baHsnying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin// sems can de 'brug lhag mthong
288b6(dkon brtsegs): grog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun dra ba yis// 'gro ba kun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag ni dran gyur nas 'dir mchis ste// bdag ni 'dus byas kun la 'dos pa smom
288b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ byang chub don gnyer sems can che du 'dir spyang bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni sring la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhag dgra khyod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam
288b8(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro mig dang ldan pa su rig 'din g.yang sar ltung // byang chub lam shes nas ni sung zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyur 'gro dag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mo nus/ lcung
289a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i rtsaras rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro yi// bangs 'dir 'dong ba rnams kyis ying dag 'di lnga min pa rgyal po ngam pa rang galen thabs gcig myur nga bzung / yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad
289a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la stsol/ gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/ bud med tshogs kyi nang du banas pas byang chub dang // grub bde zhi ba bla med
289a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub ba rnyes pas ma/ bdag ni ringang chags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gson bsod nams kyi 'od zer/ khang bzangs
289a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du ying byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud me de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing / de spyod lam gsum gyis gan so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'greng ba dang 'gro ba dang 'dug pa
289a5(dkon brtsegs): ste rmugs pa dang gnyid yongasu spang so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyang la gnas nas/ de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dru kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngag brgya
289a6(dkon brtsegs): cher brjod cing bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba tho so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gtso nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur
289a7(dkon brtsegs): nas mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas/ lha rnams la tshig su bcang spras pa/ lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal te skye mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar bgyi// su mi yon
289a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing bar snang 'di nas bzhung // tshib 'di thos nas bdag 'dir ying ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu g.yo ru bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshig su bcad pas slar spras pa
289b1(dkon brtsegs): duthong cisasas rgyas thos paras gyur ngas nga srung zlazhes byas skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs/ de bzhin spyong ba khas bsod nams shes rab yos mchog de ying ge 'dun phrag khrig spobs bgrubs sa
289b2(dkon brtsegs): gtar pa// bsod rams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal ba blta 'tshal de'i gzugs ci 'dra// de'i kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba/ 
289b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gno nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigasu bcad pas slar smras pa// de'i gtsug tor ri'i rtsal gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'jam
289b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing mdze so la g.ya su 'khyil pa ste// de'i mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ma lam ma lta// nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yasu 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud pa la sngon po 'dra// mi
289b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang sang+ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i spros// sems can ldan ga 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgya sa par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de yi tshems
289b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag/ bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi// de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khengs// rgyal
289b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste// tshangs sbyangs shin tu rigs pa sil slar stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'jom pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung
289b8(dkon brtsegs): ri lnga'i sgra skang tshim byed ba/ yon tan sna tshogs tshangs pa byang chub yan lag mthun// chos kyi phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa// sil spar dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu khams dga' ba// mi ci ka la bing ka wa/ 
290a1(dkon brtsegs): zug ngur ba dang // rma bya dang ba sgra su kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmang byung
290a2(dkon brtsegs): shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// skul ba 'dul ba 'gyur ba sbyor ba dga' 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang mthun pa zhus na tshim byed pa// chos kyi dbang phyug de'i gsung gi yon tan 'di ka ston pa'i
290a3(dkon brtsegs): mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing bapung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring nge'i bdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum// rgyal ba de'i sku ni bco ma'i gser gyi mdog kha spu g.yas
290a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'khyil zhing gyen du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbungs rta'i 'dra// rang byung e ne'i byin pa glang po'i sA 'dra'i brla/ zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtshan
290a5(dkon brtsegs): glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stabs seng+ge'i rtsal gyi stabs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas// mkha' las me tog char bab me tog gdug su gyur// gsheg
290a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de'i rma du byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra
290a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'i sems can med// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing // chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas// tshim zhing mgul
290a8(dkon brtsegs): yid mas shing rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang mi bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bug 'o nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra/ 
290b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ngo dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / ngo'i slob ma bur sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang byas pa mi gzod
290b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang
290b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag mod pa spangs pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams tshogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming
290b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mche drug dbugs 'byin pa/ med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongasu ma shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam bar smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar
290b5(dkon brtsegs): sreng pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las la/ byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcang dka' ba
290b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ji ltar dga' ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rje su mi srung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par
290b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa// sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga'
290b8(dkon brtsegs): ba byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nu
291a1(dkon brtsegs): ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lhag la 'gyur su mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgonas byung nas ni nye du'i
291a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis bar chad byas 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchong su mo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsong nams kyi 'od zer/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la
291a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de logs phyogs s+ho/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di ska du// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs shen de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgong su gsol zhes
291a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang spraso// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos bya ngag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu
291a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi 'od zer la rego// 'od de las kyang pad+ma mdab ma brgya sto nga yod pa shing rta'i phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang / 'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba des rgyal bu
291a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
291a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas don grub blo ngag la ba de phog su thal mo sbyar ba btu sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes lan gsum che du brjod pa che du brjod// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo ngas 'ong brtul
291a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gno rung sdong bo bcang ba skyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gtso ru bsod rnams kyi
291b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigasu bcing gsol pa/ bdag mi ring nas na ste ring nas gdod/ tshogs ches smar ba'i rgyal po khyod re // ji ltar de bde gshegs bstan la
291b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon pos bstan du gsal/ 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bas
291b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu/ lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig/ dam pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan ka/ g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shi
291b4(dkon brtsegs): dbul por gyur pa dag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng sgrol mdzod// som nyi bcad pa'i yid gnyis gcad gsol/ byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la
291b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gru ba bstan du gsol// bur ba bdag la sgron ma mdzad gsol/ rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzadadu gsol// spa ba'i rgyal po bang ga gi zug rngu phyung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro dog las bdag thar mdzad
291b6(dkon brtsegs): srid bar dmigs pa 'dzin pa bcad gsol// yan lag brkyang ba'i lam gyi lam chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung // dge ba bar chang mang po 'byung ba ste/ 
291b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod rams rngam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub// bdag gis ngal ba gdol rnyed gcig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba
291b8(dkon brtsegs): bring ba'i 'chings las thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgoran po de dag bdag lung ston// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhi gshegs pa don grub bros rgyal bu gan ru nga song dmas kyi 'ang zer gyi ldog pa'i bas
292a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu ga'o na bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngos
292a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor mngon par gtor to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las
292a3(dkon brtsegs): babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngor grub blong la tshig su bcad pas mngon par bstong pa// mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal// gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdul bral khyod 'dra sring
292a4(dkon brtsegs): ba gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen can khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'a di na ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma
292a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smir mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzig sa pa// spyan mchog bzang po ud pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba ni
292a6(dkon brtsegs): med spyan la phyag 'tshalo// ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'breg/ nga yis rang gi gal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chams
292a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu sboms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam sman pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma
292a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du brlag/ e ne'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po'i rma byas
292b1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i skabs// bcom ldan gca' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyan pa ste// khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba
292b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang spyir ba kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rje
292b3(dkon brtsegs): byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshalo// khyod ni sprin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni bzod dang btson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/ 
292b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tsha'o// khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du bsgrogs/ khyod ni smar ba'i rgyal po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga'
292b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// thub pa sku gsung thubs ni rnam par ngas/ pad+ma chu ltar srid ba gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyad sa ka la bing ka'i skang // sring gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag/ 
292b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsha'o// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / gar la lha dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa'i bskye ba med ba'i tshul/ 
292b7(dkon brtsegs): ma shes pas na 'gro ba' khyamo 'gyur te// thugs rje babs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nang mang brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro
292b8(dkon brtsegs): la rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel zhing // zla med sma pa lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa rgyas// rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba
293a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongasu 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnamasu// 'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/ glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon
293a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// de la lam gyi ngab pa stor pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu
293a3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la yidu 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgying pa// dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bden dang dra ba mi zad thabs tshul
293a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ longs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi
293a5(dkon brtsegs): yis thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phar bgying ba// phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dang bskye da pa ni// gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog/ 'gro la
293a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu po kun byed pa// rinam chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshangs pa brgya byid 'jig rten bdag po dang // yongasu dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang // ga
293a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa// mnyam med khyod la mchog dang mthong ba dang // thos pa yang ni de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga
293a8(dkon brtsegs): shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa// 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'god // 
293b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni ka bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/ 
293b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par
293b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mngab rgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngag
293b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phreng ba ni// bde gshegs rnams kyi 'khor tu rtag par spro gas// rims nang bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' bu thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi bzhi dgyes pa
293b5(dkon brtsegs): pi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bdag gis rgyal bakhyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur
293b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas so
293b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phang thob por shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshar mo de'i nam mangs pa dang // rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi gzho nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thoso// thos nas kyang byur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong
293b8(dkon brtsegs): khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song so byin nas 'di skad ces smraso// khyed ci'i phyir dung dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gno ru bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gang ba'i spangu'o// yul 'khor skyong de ras rgyal po 'ang re
294a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan gzho nu'i phyir/ shing bcang ba sgyel pa ltar sa la sgyel te// langs nas ngu shing grong khyer der lan stong du yongasu btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang
294a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal po chen po gzho nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyer bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logasu song ngo // yul
294a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzho nu btsal ba'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ shar gyi phyogs la ga la ba der sob ste/ de bzhin
294a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyon grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sra la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ phyogasu gcig tu 'dug// phyogs
294a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom/ ldan 'das la tshig su bcad bas mngon par bstod pa// srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis// sems can
