316b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du yang rnyed par dga' ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni bya sla ba'o// 8nga/ tu byung ba ni byang/ 'a ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni rgyun phyog su / ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni rgyun las bzlo ste 'gro ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mu
316b6(dkon brtsegs): bo'o// rab tu byung ba ni gzing so// khyimar garas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i chu bo'o// rab tu byung ba ni zam pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni tshu rol gyi ngog so// phung 'i tshang tu ma ma phyi ng+gA'i blags pa la/ rab tu byung ba ni ma glags pa'o// khyim na gnas
316b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni shar ga'ar ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni shar gnyer bzhi pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal po'i nan thur bzhin du byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa mi nyam thag pa'o// rab tu
316b8(dkon brtsegs): byung b.ri lang zag pa med pa la/ khyim na gnas pa ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni bde ba 'byung ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni spang bu'o// rab tu byung ba ni zab mo'o// khyim na gnas pa grags mong ba'o// rab tu byung / 
317a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni grogs dgon pa'o// khyim na gnas pa'i chung ma dang 'grogs pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni mos pa dang 'grogs pa'o// khyim na gangs pa ci rgya dang 'dra' ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni rgya dral pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gzhan la gnod
317a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed po gcesu rtsi ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni gzhar la phan 'dogs pa gces rtsi ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni zang zing gi sbyin pa ched cher 'dzin pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni chos kyi sbyin pa ched cher 'dzin pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin
317a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni sdug bsngal gyi gzhi'o// rab tu byung ba ni sdug bsngal gyi gzhi yang dag par 'jom pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni phung po 'phel ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni phung
317a4(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad nges par 'dor ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni thibs po'o// rab tu byung ba ni thibs po las thar pa yin te/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar bya'o// des yang 'di ltar gal te
317a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis nyi ma du mar gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod sbyin byas ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar byas pa de dag thams cad mi gas par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis
317a6(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis non to smrab du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag ma ngang ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / chom rkun dang / gdol ba dang rgyal po'i bkrabs pa dang / blon po yang sbyin pa spyir bar byed de/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni
317a7(dkon brtsegs): dman pa yi no// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas 'di ltar bdag gis ni sbyin pa'i snying pos chog par mi bya'i// bdag gis ni tshul khrims dang thos pa dang mtshungs par spyod pa yang snying por bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par
317a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma la phyag bya'o// de dag la phyag byas nas 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur bar bya ba dang / sems can
317b1(dkon brtsegs): kha spring brtse ba'i phyir/ bdag gi lus kyang byin gyis brlang pa dang bdag kyang ji ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs
317b2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las 'dar bar bya ba de ltar bslab cing de ltar nam tan bya ba'o snyam pa'o// de gtsug lag khang du zhugs na des dge slong mang du thos pa ni gang dge slong chos brjod pa ni gang / dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa ni gang
317b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma mo 'dzin pa ni gang / dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa ni gang dge slong dgon pa pa ni gang bsod snyoms pa ni gang / phyag dar khrod pa dang 'dod pa chung ba dang / cho ga shes pa dang rab tu dben pa ni gang / dge slong
317b4(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor spyod pa ni gang dge slong bsam gtan pa ni gang / dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ni gang / dge slong lag gi bla ni gang dge slong zhal ta byed pa ni gang / dge slong dpon sna byed pa ni gang yin zhes dge
317b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi ngag 'dun gyi spyod pa thams cad la rnam par brtag par bya'o// des de dag gi spyod pa la rnam par brtags nas thams cad dang mthu na par 'jug pa'i phyir/ ci rigs par mthun par gnas par bya'o// 
317b6(dkon brtsegs): des gzhan gyi mdun du spyod pa gzhan bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gtsug lag khang du ni grong gi gsang // grong nga ni gtsug lag khang gi gas // ngag gi las shin tu bsdams pa des grong du gtsug lag khang gi gsang dang
317b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khong du grong gi gsang bsrung bar mi bya'o// dge slong gang chos gos ma tshang ngam lhung bzed ma tshang ngam/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ma tshang ba de la des ji ltar gzhan dag gshe ba 'am/ khro ba skyed par mi 'gyur ba de
317b8(dkon brtsegs): lngar sbyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi kun tu sbyor ba ni phrag dog dang ser gA yin te/ de bas na so so'i skye bo rnams la ni rab tu bsrung bar bya'i/ dgra bcom pa la ni ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so'i skye
318a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams las ni nyes pa skye'i// dgra bcom pa rnams la ni ma yino// de bas na mang du thos pa la bsten te/ thos pa yongasu btsal ba la brtson par bya'o// chos brjod pa la bstan te/ rnam par nges pa'i
318a2(dkon brtsegs): gtam la brtson par bya'o// 'dul ba 'dzin pa bsten te/ nyes pa 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la brtson par bya'o// ma mo 'dzin pa la bstan te lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa la brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
318a3(dkon brtsegs): sde snong 'dzin pa la bstan te pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang thabs mangs pa la brtson par bya'o// dgon pa la bsten te rab tu dben pa la brtson par bya'o// bsod snyoms la bsten te rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang ma grags
318a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bstong pa dang / spang ba dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi stsal pa la brtson par bya'o// phyag dar khrod pa la bsten te/ chos gos kyis cha ba dang / rgyan la mngon par mi dga' ba la brtson par bya'o// 'dod
318a5(dkon brtsegs): bachung ba la bstan te/ 'dod pa chung ba la brtson par bya'o// chos shes pa la bsten te/ chog shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rab tu dben pa la bstan te/ rab tu dben pa la brtson par bya'o// rnal 'byor spyod
318a6(dkon brtsegs): la bstan te/ nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong tshul bzhin yid la byed pa nang du yang dag 'jog pa la brtson bar bya'o// bsam gtan pa la bsten te/ nyon mongs pa bsal ba la brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
318a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa la bsten te/ sbyin pa dang sman par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnams la brtson par bya'o// lag gi bla la bsten te/ ji ltar dngos po yongasu gtong bar spro ba la brtson par bya'o// 
318a8(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta byed pa la bsten te bya'o// chog byed pa la 'artson par bya'o// dpon snga byed pa la bsten te/ yid yongs mi skyo bar bya'o// khyim bdas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje
318b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa la brtson par bya'o// dge slong gang yang dag pa skyon med pa la ma zhugs pa chos gos kyis sdud pa 'am/ lhung bzed kyis sdud pa byed na des dge slong de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bzhug
318b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zang zing gis sdud pas chos kyi bsdu ba skyed pa'i gnas yod pa'i phyiraro// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dge sbyong gi spyod pa la mkhas par bya'o// des yang dge sbyong mi 'dum pa
318b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi snga mas kyang bya'o// dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa na des srog kyang yongasu gtang zhing dam pa'i chos kun tu gzung bar bya'o// khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dge slong na ba zhig mthong na/ nges
318b4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sha dang khrag gis kyang dge slong de nang de las gso bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gtong zhing sbyin pas gzhan dag la mgron du gnyer bar bya ste/ byin nas kyang 'gyod pa'i sems mi
318b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sngon du yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro bar bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems pa pa' khyim pa khyim gyi sa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ba
318b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byed pa yin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams yongasu mi nyam so// tshe 'di la yang kha na ma tho ba'i las med cing gzhan du yang bye brag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dang khyim
318b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan de dag gis kyang mgrin gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
318b8(dkon brtsegs): ra gnas pa'i las pa dang / sdom pa dang spyod pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'dir khyim na gnas pa la zhes pa'i skyon chags
319a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji sbeng ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon mtha' yas pa mngon sum du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams rab tu byung ste/ bde bar gshegs pas legs par bshad pa'i chos
319a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba la bslan par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams rab tu 'byung bar dka' ste/ spyod pa shin tu rnam par
319a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsgrub par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba yang 'byung bar dka' lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang
319a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba'i slang skabs dbye bar gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la nan tan gyis sgrub par 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de dag la rab tu
319a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i skabs phye ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sa// mas dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa tha/ mas cad rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam
319a6(dkon brtsegs): ba khyed gnyis kyis khyim bdag 'di rnams rab tu phyung la bsnyed pa rdzogs par gyis shig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khyim bdag dgu stong rab tu phyung // byang chub sems dpa'
319a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas ni khyim bdag bdun stong rab tu phyung // byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i rgyun bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags stong du tshang ba dag bla na med pa
319a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po gsum pa
319b1(dkon brtsegs): de ras bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyis dang / khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa dag ni bshad lags na
319b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gtogs pa rnams kyi rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad spungs pa dang / spyod pa dang / cho ga phur supa
319b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa de legs par bshang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na legs par bshad pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang ldang ba dang / thal mo
319b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba dang 'angang pa'i las don ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dra gshul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod gang de
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad spungs pa dang spyod pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa kun 'dri ba ni leg so lag so// khyim
319b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag de'i phyir legs par rab tu lon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshod// bcom ldan 'das lag
319b7(dkon brtsegs): so lags zhes gsol nas khyim bdag drag shul can/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung
319b8(dkon brtsegs): bas 'di ltar bdag su'i cheng la khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung snyam du gzhal bar bya ste/ des mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du ye shes yongasu btsal ba la/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// de de ltar
320a1(dkon brtsegs): yong su 'jal bas thog ma'i du 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la rab tu gnas shing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang
320a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la rab tu gnas pa yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ chos gos ngan
320a3(dkon brtsegs): don gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de chos gos kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi bya'o// chos gos ma rung na yang yi mi 'chad cing yongasu gdung ba medo// chos gos rlung na yang chags
320a4(dkon brtsegs): ba med rmongs pa med dga' ba med zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa ste/ dra par spyod de/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzim pa de bdag la mi
320a5(dkon brtsegs): stong cing gzhan la mi spong ngo // khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub se/ sa dpa' rab tu byung ba ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chogabar 'dzin pa yin/ bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i
320a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de bsod snyoms kyi phyir tshul dang mo 'dra bas tshol bar mi bye // bsod snyoms ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing yongasu gdung ba medo// bsod snyoms rnyed na yang chags pa med rmongs
320a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med/ dga' ba med zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/ bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi stod cing gzhan
320a8(dkon brtsegs): la mi spong ngo // khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mal cha ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ mal tsho nga ngon gyis chog pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de mal cha'i phyir tshul dang
320b1(dkon brtsegs): nga mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed// mal cha ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing yongasu gdung ba me // mal cha rnyed na yang chags pa med rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te nyes dmigs mthong la
320b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/ mal cha nga don gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni na ba'i gsos slar
320b3(dkon brtsegs): dang yo byad ngar ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de na pa'i gso so smar dang yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi
320b4(dkon brtsegs): byang ra ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing yongasu gdung ba medo// na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnyed na yang chags pa med rmongs pa med dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur
320b5(dkon brtsegs): gas dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med/ par spyod de/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis cho// ga par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi sdod cing gzhan la mi spong ngo // spong ba la
320b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yang yin te/ song ba la mos shing spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtso mo// de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams spangs pas dga' bar 'gyur te ma spangs pas ni ma yin// de bsgom pa la dga' ba yin
320b7(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtsono// dge ba'i chos bsgoms pos dga' bar 'gyur te/ ma bsgoms pas ni ma yino// spong ba la dga' ba spong ba la mos pa spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa bsgom pa la dga' ba
320b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa la mos pa/ bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa de bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod do// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la gnas
321a1(dkon brtsegs): yino// ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs shes bya zhe na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'di la gnas pas de'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs shes bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon la dga' ba bcus chos gos lus la bcang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pas dkri ba dang / sha sbrang dang sbrang bu dang / rlung dang nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba
321a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yog pa dang / dge sbyong gi kha dog dang rtags bstan pa dang / ngur smrig de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yin snyam nas mchod rten gyi phyir yang dag par gzung bar bya ba dang de dag ni yid 'byung ba dang / 
321a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral bas kha dog sgyur ba yin te/ 'di dag ni 'dod chags kyi sa kha dog sbyar ba ma yin pa dang / 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba dang mthun pa yin gyi/ 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa 'bar ba dang mthur ba ma yin pa dang / 
321a5(dkon brtsegs): ngur smig 'di dag gis dkris shing g.yogs nas sdig pa las ldog/ bar bya ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba dang / chos gos kyi sa tsha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa ma yin pa dang ngur smrig/ 'di dag ladag
321a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam gyi tshogs dang / mthun pa yin par shes nas ci nas skad gcig la yang rnyog pa dang / 'grogs par mi bya bar ngur smrig rnams bcang bar bya ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon la dga'
321a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bcu po de dag gis chos gos lus la bcang bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa gtang bar mi bya ste/ bcu
321a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rang dbang du gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho bar bya'i// gzhan la rag lus pa ma yin pa dang sems can gang dag bsod snyoms 'dod pa la bsod snyoms byin pa de dag kyang dkon mchog gsum la bkod de/ phyis
321b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms blang bar bya ba dang / sems can gang dag bdag bsod snyoms 'dod pa la bsod snyoms mi ster ba de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ sems can de dag gtong ba la gzung ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsam par
321b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bya ba byas te bsod snyoms bza' ba dang / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun par byas par 'gyur ba dang / dgang sla zhing gso sla bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis rgyu bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / 
321b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis nga rgyal bcag pa bsten par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba'i dge pa'i rtsa ba bstsags par 'gyur pa dang / bdag mthong nas de bzhin du slob par 'gyur zhing bdag skyes pa dang
321b4(dkon brtsegs): bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo la bsten par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsod snyoms yang dag par blang ba'i spyod pa yang bdag sems can thams cad lnga sems sboms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs su
321b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas bar yon bcu po de dag mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa mi gtang bar bya'o// gal te de la la
321b6(dkon brtsegs): thig gis 'gron du bos na nges lhag pa'i bsam pa dang dang ba dang dang ba bskyang ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/ 'dring pa dang 'chos pas ni ma yi no// gang la la bsod snyoms blangs te bdag dang gzhan gyi ngor rdzogs
321b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed nus na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' de 'gron du 'gro bar gan // khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu thong nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du smar bkrus pas chog shes par bya ste/ 
321b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi ngor lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsten par 'gyur ba dang / bdas mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes sor
322a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ro bro ba la chags pa yang bdag gis tshogs chung ngus spangs par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so'i skye bo thams cad bdag la yid ston par 'gyur ba dang / 
322a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kha zas bsrungs pa mngon du gyur bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag la smar yongasu tshol ba'i phongs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sems la yon mongs pa'i nad kyi gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar zhugs na myur
322a3(dkon brtsegs): du nyon mongs pa'i nang dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du sman bkus pas chog shes par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan
322a4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bachu song nas/ ji sring 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa yongasu mi gtang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'am rangs dang bdag gi
322a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / nga'i ba med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mal cha ltu ga par gtong ba dang dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba dang ma bral ba dang / gnas rnamasu don nyung zhing byed pa nyung ba dang / g.yog gi chog
322a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dor zhing lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / dben par dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yongasu spong ba dang / las byas pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon yongasu gtong ba dang / ting 'dzin dang mthun pa'i sems rtse gcig pa dang / yid la
322a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa bla gab med pa yid la byed pa sgrib pa med pa ste/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas/ ji sring 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du gon pa la gnas pa yong du
322a8(dkon brtsegs): gtang bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa chos nyan par 'angad dpa/ slob dpon dang mkhan po blta bar 'dod dman 'dri ba'i phyir grong grong gi gan su 'ongs nanges dgong su sngar ldog par bya ba'i phyir/ 
322b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de gal te lung gnong ba dang kha ton bya ba'i gzhan la rab las te/ gzhug lag khang na gnas na yang des dgon pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyis gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dang / chos
322b2(dkon brtsegs): tshol bas mi ngoms pa de nyid dgon pa la gnas pa yin snyam du bsam mo// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas/ 'di ltar bdag ci'i phyir dgon pa la gnas dgon pa ra gam shi'i ni dge sbyong ma
322b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'dir nim byang ba ma smras pa ma dul ba mi 'grus pa/ rab tu mi brtson pa 'di lta ste ri dgas dang / spre'u dang bya mang po dang chom rkun dang gdol pa dag kyang mang duganas te/ de dag kyang dge sbyong gi yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pas
322b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir bdag dgon pa la gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ dge sbyong gi don de yongasu rdzogs par snyam du brtag par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang shes bzhin
322b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang byams pa bston pa dang / snying rje bsten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang sgyur ba dang // pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad
322b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongasu mi gtong ba dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes bsgom pa dang sems can bsdu ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongasu mi gtang ba dang / rjesu dran pa drug rjes
322b7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang thos pa dang brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba dang / tshul bzhin du chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yang dag par rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa rnams shes pa dang skyon med pa la 'jug par gnas pa
322b8(dkon brtsegs): ngang ngam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas yang dag par lta ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu chad pas yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston
323a1(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa'i ngag dang las zang pa yongasu rdzogs pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub
323a2(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pas yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasasu thob pas yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi skrag pa dang / mtshan ma
323a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa la mi zhum pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi 'gong pa dang / bsams bzhin du ye shes kyis srid pa yongasu 'dzin pa dang / don la rton gyi yi ge la mi ston pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi ston pa dang / chos la
323a4(dkon brtsegs): ston gyi ni gang zag la mi ston pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la ston gyi drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi ston pa dang / thog ma nas ma byung zhing mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mi rtog pa de ni khyim bdag byang chub
323a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don ces bya'o// khyim bdag gan/ ra yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa med pa mang du bya'o// des 'di ltar yang bdag ni sems can dang 'dre
323a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya ste/ bdag gis sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par me bya'i bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o sum du brtag par bya'o// de lta mod kyi khyim bdag byang chub sems da
323a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
323a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rim gro bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'grogs pa med pa dang 'grogs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnas
323b1(dkon brtsegs): bye/ khyib bdag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa las rnam par grol bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa na gnas pas/ bdag ci'i phyir dgon par 'ongs sum
323b2(dkon brtsegs): du rtag par bya ste/ des yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir dgon par 'ong so// ci zhig gis 'jigs shing skrag cen 'du 'jis 'jigs shing sbago// 'grogs pas 'jigs shing skra go// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
323b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gti mug gis 'jigs shing skrago// nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / 'chab pas 'jigs shing skra go// chags pa dang phrag dog dang ser snas 'jigs shing snga go// gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing
323b4(dkon brtsegs): skrag go// phung po'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skra go// nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi sa 'jigs shing skrago/ 'chi bdag gi bdud kyis 'jigs shing sku go/ lha'i bu'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skra go// mi rtag pa la rtag
323b5(dkon brtsegs): par phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing sngago// sdug bsngal la bde bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrago// bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin/ ci log pas 'jigs shing skrago/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar byin
323b6(dkon brtsegs): ci log pas 'jigs shing skrago// sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas 'jigs shing skrago// sred pas 'jigs shing skrago/ 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrago// sgrib pa dang chod pa dang kun nas ldang bas 'jigs shing skrag
323b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jim tshogs la lta bas 'jigs shing sbago// bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrago// rgod pas 'jigs dashing skrago// 'gyod pa dang the tsom gyis 'jigs shing sgrago// sdig pa'i grogs pos
323b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs bsnga go// rnyeng pa dang bkur stis 'jigs shing skrago// mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrago// ma mthong bar mthong snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrago// ma thos par thos so sbam du 'dzin
324a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing sngago// ma dran par draro snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrago// bye brag ma phyed par bye brag byeng snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrago// mi shes par she so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag
324a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi bribs 'jigs shing skra go// gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skra go// 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyis 'jigs shing skra go/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thams
324a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe 'pho dang skye bas 'jigs shing sgrago// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jigs shing skrago// mi khom pas 'jigs shing snga go// mdor na mi dge ba'i chos thams
324a4(dkon brtsegs): bing la byed pas 'jigs shing skrag ste/ bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag gis 'jigs nas dgon par 'ongs te khyim na gnas pra dang / 'du 'ji la gnas pa dang mi 'grus shing rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa
324a5(dkon brtsegs): nga tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa la gnas pas ni 'di lta bu/ 'i 'jigs skrag pa de dag las yongasu thar bar mi nus te/ gang ga 'das pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
324a6(dkon brtsegs): de ga thams cad kyang dgon pa las gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa zab bo// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'thung ba'i byang
324a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob par
324a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyug/ gang dag ltar byung ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las
324b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo// de bas na bdag kyang 'di la 'jigs shing skrag ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las ni shin tu 'da' bar 'dod mi 'jigs pa ni
324b2(dkon brtsegs): rjesu thob par 'dod pas dgon pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du yongasu dpyad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i gnas la gnas pas 'di lta ste gang cung zad
324b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las skye so// bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang bdag tu yongasu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gis bzhi dang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta
324b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gi gnas dang bdag yongasu rtog pa dang / bdag bsrung ba las skyes te gal te dgon pa la gnas la bdag tu 'dzin pa yongasu ma spangs bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu yongasu 'dzin pa dang bdag gi gzhi nga
324b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la sred pa dang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba lte ba/ ra len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang bdag gi gnas dang / bdag tu yongasu rtog pa dang bdag srung ba yongasu ma spangs na ni bdag dgen pa la
324b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa don med par 'gyu ro snyam du bslab par bya ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa medado// gzhan du shes pa la yang medo// ngar 'dzin pa dang nga'i ra 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa la ni dgon pa la
324b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mdo// dmigs par lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa mdo// phyin ci log tu lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med de khyim bdag mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes pa la yang yang dkon pa la gnas pa med na/ chon
324b8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad kyi 'du shes can lta ci smos/ khyim bdag dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la mi sten par gnas pa'o// chos thams cad la mi 'dzin par gnas pa'o// mtshan ma thams
325a1(dkon brtsegs): la mi chags par gnas pa'o// gzugs thams cad la mi rten par gnas pa'o sgra nga dring ro dang reg bya thams cad la mi ston par gnas pa'o// chos thams cad mnyam pa cid mi 'gal bar gnas pa
325a2(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu spangs par gnas pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pas mi 'jigs par gnas pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas chu bo las rgal bar gnas pa'o// brtan par gnas pa'o// 
325a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan ngon gyis chog shes par 'dzin cing 'dod pa chung bas 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o// dgang sla zhing gso slabs chog par 'dzin par gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin la sbyor
325a4(dkon brtsegs): bas thos pa la gnas pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la so sor rtogs pas thar par gnas pa'o// bcings pa bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o// rten cing
325a5(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthur bas ma dul ba rnams nye bar zhi ba ra gnas pa'o// shin tu rnam par dag pas bya ba byas par gan/ sa pa'o// khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na/ dgon pa la rtswa dang shing gel ba
325a6(dkon brtsegs): dang nganags tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa med cing skrag par mi 'gyur// khyim bdag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang lus la rtswa dang / shing gel bar smra rtsig pa dang / shing dang
325a7(dkon brtsegs): mig yor lta bu dang sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'di la su zhig 'jigs par 'gyur 'di la su zhig skrag par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de 'jigs shing skrag pa lta na 'di
325a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar lus 'di la ni bidag gam sems can nam srog gam/ skye ba po 'am gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am shed bu med de'ang ltar 'jigs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin/ 
325b1(dkon brtsegs): bkun brtag pa yin gyis bdag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa de la brtag par mi bya'o snyam du lus la tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o// des ji ltar dgon pa la rtsa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nags tshal gnas
325b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams nga'i ba med pa yong su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nga'i ba med pa yong su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad dgon pa nyi ngo snyam du shes nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
325b3(dkon brtsegs): dngon pa la gnas pa ni khon mongs pa gcod pa ste/ nga'i ba med pa yongasu 'dzin pa meng pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang mthun pa'o// dgon pa
325b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa ni ting 'dzir gyi phung po la gzhol ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni shes rab kyi phu mo tshogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'grub pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba
325b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chu ba kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rab tu bsten pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon ta bcu gnyis po dag sdud pa'o// con
325b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa ni bden pa rnams rtogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni phung po rnams yongasu shes pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni khams rnams chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par 'jal ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa
325b7(dkon brtsegs): ri skye mched rnams sel ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni stong pa nyid la sor rtog pas skrag pa med pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni chos kun tu 'dzin pa'o// 
325b8(dkon brtsegs): dkor ba la gnas pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chung mi gzon pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngags pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstong pa'o// dben pa la
326a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis bkur ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsten pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i
326a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsren pa'o snyam du bslab par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshigs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
326a3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub
326a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim byangag grang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs
326a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yor tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la rab tu gnas nas/ sdom pag/ sum gyi yang dag par bsgrub ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par
326a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung
326a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni sems la gnod sems med cing sems can thams cad la byams par byed la/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bzod pa yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bzod pa'i
326a8(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs rdzogs par 'gyur
326b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag dgon pa 'di las ldog par mi bya'o snyam du slob ste/ de ltar dgor ba la gnas pa de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
326b2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim
326b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dkor pa la gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ sems can yongasu smin par byed pa yang yal bar mi 'dor la 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsab
326b4(dkon brtsegs): yang soms par 'dong pa yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon
326b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo pa yongasu rdzog sa par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' ra ba tu byung ba ni 'di la lus ji lta ba dgon pa yang de bzhin// lus
326b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba byang chub kyang de bzhino snyam du slob cing / de bzhin nyid kyis mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag
326b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi dang ldan na dgon
326b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas par gnang ba yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba mang du thos pa yin te/ thos pa 'dzin pa chos rnam par nges pa la mkhas pa tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson
327a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / chos dang chos kyi rje su mthun pa sgrub pa des dkon pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshon mongs pa shas chen des/ nyon mongs pa
327a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa med par dgon pa la gnas par bya/ des nyon mongs pa tshar gcad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob
327a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yir te/ des lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byul sangs rgyas kyis dgon pa la gnas par
327a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal par shes nas dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ der dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsabs nyes par brtan nas phyis grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / 
327a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor dang po brang 'khor dag tu zhugs te chos bstan pa/ rabya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshe/ sa bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dgon pa la gnas par gnong // khyim
327a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba lung dang kha ton mnod pa'i phyir tshogs kyi nang du 'jug na des der gus pa dang bcas par bya ste/ slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams dang gnas brtan par ma dang / dge slong
327a7(dkon brtsegs): gsar bu rnams la shes dang bcas par bya/ tshul mkhas par bya'o snyom las meng bar rang gis bya ba dang // gzhan la gdung ba med par bya'o// des bsnyen bkur la gdung bar mi bya'o// des 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
327a8(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang zam ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
327b1(dkon brtsegs): du bcas pas/ mchod sbyin gnasu gyur pa de yang sems can thams cad la gang las kyang rim gror bya ba bdag gir mi mdzad na/ bdag cag ma bslabs pa slob 'dod pa rnams lta ci smos te/ bdag gis ni sems can
327b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i/ gang las kyang bsnyen bkur bya ba bdag gir mi bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag dge slong bsnyen bkur la bsdu ba ni yon tan gyi chos rjesu bzung ba chung gsen
327b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ des gang zag sdud pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni bsnyen bkur gyi phyir sdad kyi chos kyi phyir ni ma yino snyam ste/ de bdag nyid kyi dad pa chung gson to// gang dag de la bsnyen bkur byed pa
327b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa de dag gi yang don chen por mi 'gyuraro// 'bras bu chen por mi 'gyuraro// de slob dpon dang mkhan po'i gan du 'gro na yang slob dpon dang mkhan pos ma ngang pa'i bag gang yang rung ba zhig las
327b5(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas bdag la lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang rjes bstan bas phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus dang sem/ sa la su rung ba dang / sems cad shes pas 'gro bar bya'o// des
327b6(dkon brtsegs): lung mnod pa dang kha ton gyi phyir lus dang srog la yang mi blta bar bya'o// chos 'dod pas slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// yon tan don du gnyer bas rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang
327b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung mnod pa dang kha ton bya ba don du gnyer bas gzhan dag las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa tsam mam sbyor ba
327b8(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang ldan pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs spogs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa su las
328a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhan tam lung mnos sam/ blangs pa'i slob dpon de la nges chos kyis gus par bya'o// ming dang tshig dang yi ge ji srid kyis tshig su bcad pa bstan pa de srid kyi bskal bar gal te slob
328a2(dkon brtsegs): dpon da la g.yo med par rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang mchod pa thams cad kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas kyang / khyim bdag da dung slob dpon du gus par bya ba rdzogs pa ma yin na chos ma yin pa'i gus pas lta ci
328a3(dkon brtsegs): smos/ khyim bdag dad pas mnyan cing bsgom pa dang kha ton la 'jug pa de'i sems dang / sems las byung ba dge ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa 'am/ chos dang ldan pa 'am dge 'dun dang ldan pa 'am skyo
328a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa 'am/ byang ba dang dul ba dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa gal te de snyed kyi bskal dpar slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byasu zin kyang / khyim bdag da dung
328a5(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon la slob dpon du ri mo bya ba rdzogs pa ma yino// khyim/ bdag rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med cing ye shes khong du chud pa tshad med pa de ltar rig par
328a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// khyim bdag de lta bas na rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med po dang / ye shes khong du chud pa tshad med pa dris pas bdag gi slob dpon yang tshad medo snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpas chos la ri mo chang
328a7(dkon brtsegs): med par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la
328a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims yongasu dag pa thob na de la slob ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i rigs
328b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med par dpon pa la gnas pa ste bzhi pa
328b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus bsdams pas lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag bsdams pas ngag mi dmigs pa dang / 
328b3(dkon brtsegs): yid bsdams pas yid mi dmigs pa dang / lta ba dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen par sems skyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yong su dag pa bzhi ste/ 
328b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gang zhe na/ ngar 'dzin pa spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa bor ba dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral ba dang / rten pa'i chos la 'jug pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o// khyim bdag
328b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa ba'i ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la 'byung ba dang / 'jig par rtog pa dang / khams rnams la chos kyi dbyings yong su 'jal ba dang / skye mched
328b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la grong khyer stong par 'du shes pa dang / tha snyad btags pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yong su dag po bzhi ste/ 
328b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med par 'du shes pas bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan mi dmigs pas gzhan la mi spong pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pas rlom sems med pa dang / chos thams cad mtsham pa
328b8(dkon brtsegs): ching pas g.yo ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ ba'i gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mi skrag pa
329a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba dang / bdag med pa la bzod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung
329a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ting 'dzin yongasu dag pa thos na de la slob ste/ ting 'dzin yongasu dag pa de gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtsol ba med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas gnyisu dbyer med pa dang / sems la su
329a3(dkon brtsegs): rung ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang sems nges par 'byung ba dang / sems mi 'phro ba dang / sems kun du mi rgyug pa dang / sems mi gnas pa dang / sems nges par sems par byin gyis rlob pa dang / 
329a4(dkon brtsegs): sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / sems 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la mi chags pa dang / sems chos la sgyu mar so sor rtog pa dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ji ltar mi skye
329a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung zhing / mnyam pa nyid pa de ltar/ khyim bdag bya chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ting 'dzin yongasu dag pa/ la so sor rtog go// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dang
329a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa thos na de la slob ste/ shes rab kyi yongasu dag pa de gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar sor rtog ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du shes pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba
329a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa shes ste/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba shes rab yongasasu dag
329a8(dkon brtsegs): ba la sor rtogo/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'di la shes rab 'di ni lus med pas thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid // rgyu ba med pas gzung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid // skye
329b1(dkon brtsegs): bamed pas gnas pa med pa'i mtshan gi // nam kha'i ngo bo nyid pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid sum du rab tu slo'o// khyim bdag de ltar na gang 'di ltar chos la so sor rtog pa 'di ni byang chub
329b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i rab tu byung ba bsgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgyad stong gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sam
329b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyod// khyim bdag de dag thams cad las bal cher ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu tho'o// srog chags sus khri nyi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par
329b4(dkon brtsegs): dag go// de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dga' la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' nas mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ brgya stong dri ba'i ras bcos bu'i zung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol
329b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dang / kha'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la stsal to// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi
329b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ji ltar bcas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rnams
329b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
329b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos du zhig dang ldan na/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la
330a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ khyim bdag
330a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa mi lta bar dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pas rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / khyim
330a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa tshangs par spyod cing gtsang ba yin te/ yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa mi spyod na mtshan gnyis spong ba 'am/ yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos pa dang / 
330a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa yang / dgra pa skyon med pa la mi reg cing / khyim stong par zhugs nas thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang
330a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa// sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa la brtson pa/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung bar brtson 'grus rtsom pa
330a6(dkon brtsegs): dang khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa bdag kyang dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin cing / gzhan yang dam pa'i chos la sbyor bar byed pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa
330a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gash+ye
330a8(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshalo// rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob bo// chos mnyam pa nyid 'di lta bu la yang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdza do ka 'di ni sangs rgyas
330b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
330b2(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ de dag gis 'jig gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnamasu 'od kyi snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log
330b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
330b4(dkon brtsegs): bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'a dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma
330b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis par ming bzhin gshegs pa 'dzub pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa ma dzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
330b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kur dga' bo khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ chos bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa mthong ngam/ gsol phra bcom ldan
330b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das mthong lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de
330b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la rim gro byeng bar 'gyu'o// bsti stang dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyu ro// dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyuraro// rtag tu yang khyim bdag tu gyur nas rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnaso// de ba'i
331a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i byang chub de yang rgyas par byed par 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smraso// khyim bdag rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis gang khyim na gnas shing
331a2(dkon brtsegs): rdul la gnas pa la dga' bar byed/ drag shul can gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo rdul ni rdul cung zad kyang med de/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag bde ba la mi re ba yin ka btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' ni
331a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir kyang bzod de/ sems can rnams yongasu mi gtong // de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyim
331a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag drag shul can 'di khyim gyi sa la gnas nas bskal pa bzang po 'di la la/ sems can rab tu mang po yongasu smin par byang bar 'gyur te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong
331a5(dkon brtsegs): du yang de ltar mi nuso// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyim/ bdag 'di la yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sem sa dpa' stong la yang medo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
331a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di drag shul
331a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa bsgrub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma la baspen bkur bya ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam
331a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang / chos mang po rab tu 'thob ste/ brtson 'grus zhan pas bskal pa brgyar tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pas ni de lta ma yino// kun dga' bo de
331b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas na bdag kyang 'dil brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dongad pa dang / gzham sang brtson 'grus la gzung bar 'dod pa dang / bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa cing mas cad la gnas par 'a'ong ba dang / ga' yang yod tan gyi chos mnyam pacing bang
331b2(dkon brtsegs): la dgod par 'od pas/ chos kyirnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ kur chub par bya klag par bya/ gan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o// kun pa 'bo ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod la yo
331b3(dkon brtsegs): suga'ado ga ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i phyiraro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa de sangs rgyas
331b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thung ba dang mi 'dra'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan tam/ 'dzin tam klog pa dang / mi 'bral ba de sangs rgya des 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'dra'o//  ci'i phyir
331b5(dkon brtsegs): me ma kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'du sa shing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bslab pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon can thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rab tu bcang
331b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyiro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don duganyer ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes rab tu gang yang 'bogs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di maldan par bya// kun chub par
331b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o ku dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang ba tsam yang ri mor byas ste/ slob pos laphul nas ches kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa bya'o// kun chub bar bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dang
331b8(dkon brtsegs): gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che las sor bya ste/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du byung ba'i yo byad thed kyi
332a1(dkon brtsegs): bsrer bkur byed cing / gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bran dang / slob mar khas blangs te/ bsrer bkur bya sa
332a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'dzin mi 'chang / mi klog kun chub par mi byed/ 'jug par mi byed cing / bsgrub pa 'di la yang mi gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
332a3(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhir gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chas kyi rnam grangs 'di ldan cing kun chub par byed pa/ dam pa'i chos yun
332a4(dkon brtsegs): ring dug ras pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chang b.rabya ba'i phyir/ gsan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing / bsgrub pa 'dis ngaganas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sa rangs 'das pa dang ma 'os
332a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sang+yas bac+doMs rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ gus pa dang bcas pas bstan bkur byas par 'gyur// bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dpa' bo dang / khyim pangs drag shul can dang / da slong ngas dang / 
332a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub bde de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i jig rten ying ras te/ bac+doMs kyis gsus pa la mngon par sto // 'ad kha do pa chog 'dreg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le sbyong brag brgya ba las/ 'ag pa dra shubam gri 'u gle ba ste du rje
x1a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhes bya'o// deng 'gro ba ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ skyes bu ngam pa/ rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnamaso// de ci'i phyi nan/ brtson 'grus spyong pa'i lam/ 
x1a2(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs pa ni/ de lta'i'i skyes bu dam pa ngag dang / sangs rgyas rnams so// gang la la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can sems can thams cad ni gnas gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ ngan song du gzhol ba dang / ngan
x1a3(dkon brtsegs): song du 'bab dang / ngan song du bab pa ste/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / mang du thos pa ma gtogs par mngon par 'byung ba'i chos gzhan gang yang med do// skye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni nga zhes zer ba'i tshig
x1a4(dkon brtsegs): gis las la gnas pa ste/ las ma yin pa la gnas so// kye ma 'o sems can 'di dag ni/ nga zhes zer ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ le lo can no// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
x1a5(dkon brtsegs): ni las ma yin pa la gnas pa'i sems can/ le lo can dang ma dza' bar mi byed/ sten par mi byed de/ gzhan du na byang chub se mas dpa' 'thun par spyod pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang sten par
x1a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam par byang ba la mos shing / brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bdag gi lus 'ba' shig nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems
x1a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas/ khong du chud par byed/ ston par byed/ skul bar byed/ 'dzin du 'jug/ 'phags pa'i lam drang du 'dzud de/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems
x1a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshig su bcang ba 'di dag gsungs so// mdung ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu yang dag 'phags par 'gyur// mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa'
x3a1(dkon brtsegs): sogs gang 'jug pa rang/ shing 'i srog shing lta bur 'jug pa'am/ shing lo lha'u byung ba'am/ sbag bur gyi gyung mkhyim par gyur sa/ mngal byin dadas kyi bram skyes
x4a1(dkon brtsegs): thar to// ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha spu'i glong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nang thams cad
x4a2(dkon brtsegs): la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing / rnam par sbyong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba mdongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig
x4a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od
x4a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par bar zini/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshe su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par skul ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med
x4a5(dkon brtsegs): bar lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig gi mthus// sman gyi lha'i 'khor
x4a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/ 
x4a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgro dag nas// sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grel// sa
x5a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad+mo snang ba zhes bya
x5a2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhug so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan 'thun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den
x5a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugaso// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba sked 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po
x5a4(dkon brtsegs): che thams cad kyi kha dog du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de ba bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
x5a5(dkon brtsegs): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spros kyi snying po rdo rje nargyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong
x5a6(dkon brtsegs): zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhug so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i bad mos rab tu brgyan pas shin tu drim
x5a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu sgeg pa'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde bskyed pa zhes bya ba
x5a8(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma dang
